story:
Johnnie Walker My Edition

Our passion for whisky has pushed Johnnie Walker forward for more than 150 years.  Today, that passion continues to inspire us to continually experiment, always pushing the boundaries.

My Edition is a new product concept, currently in development from our Futures team - bringing together the expertise of our master blenders, digital designers and cutting edge technology experts  - plus your own unique tastes and preferences to produce the perfect whisky for you.

By backing this project you will help us to take the product from concept to reality - and you’ll be one of the first to receive the product once it hits the market.

What is My Edition? 

Johnnie Walker presents My Edition: your very own Scotch whisky, tailored to individual tastes, presented in a bespoke bottle personalised by you.

 

Johnnie Walker has access to some of the best whiskies across Scotland that allows us to craft the perfect whisky to suit your flavour profile – from the shores of Islay where distilleries such as Caol Ila and Lagavulin produce smoky, peaty flavours to the rolling hills of Speyside and the Cardhu distillery that gives its rich, fruity notes. All of our whiskies are matured in oak casks before being crafted by our expert blenders to suit your tastes.

Your own My Edition will be crafted by carefully combining these different whiskies to produce a blend that is perfectly matched to your unique taste. Once you’ve crafted your personal whisky, you’ll be able to customise the packaging it comes in, with a range of bespoke design options to craft a bottle that reflects your unique style using the latest technology.

 

Why you'll love My Edition

 

Right For You - Discover your perfect, flavour-matched whisky blend through our new digital blend tool: tell us about yourself and we’ll help you find the right blend for you.

Personal Touch - Design one-of-a-kind bottles that express who you are through customised labelling, sleek engraving and deluxe packaging options.

Unique Gift - A new kind of whisky gift tailored to your recipient’s unique taste and personality: from bespoke blending and personalised bottling to gift-boxing services.

 

How it works

 

Step 1: Bespoke Blend Tool

A unique online experience that will not only help you discover more about your personal whisky preferences, but can also help you craft your personal whisky by flavour.

Once we launch, you will receive a unique link to access the My Edition platform, including our Bespoke Blend Tool and a suite of services to craft every detail of your My Edition.

Step 2: Customised Labelling

A personal whisky needs a personal label, so we’re creating a beautiful label design for you to add a name, a dedication, a story, or any other personal message to make your whisky truly special.

Step 3: Cutting Edge Engraving

Cutting-edge bottle engraving technology enables you to leave a lasting mark on our iconic bottle by adding a unique message or image.

Step 4: Limited Edition Presentation Box

With a blend this special, it needs to stand out on the shelf at home.  So we’re working with a series of world class artists and designers to create a range of limited edition presentation boxes that will make your My Edition a work of art.

 

My Edition: A new kind of whisky gift

From the celebration of an epic achievement to a heartfelt 'thank you', there's a My Edition for every occasion and person.

Design your My Edition to commemorate every kind of special celebration:

  • The Perfect Birthday Blend
  • Special Anniversary Blend
  • Happy Graduation Blend
  • The Family Heirloom Blend
  • And many more

 

Perk Options

We have a range of perks available, so My Edition is accessible for everyone.

Once we’re ready to launch, we’ll send all of our backers a link to our brand new online platform. You’ll have access to this platform before anyone else in the world, an Indiegogo exclusive.

You’ll be able to craft every detail of your My Edition, from the blend to the bottle, to the delivery address and gift-wrapping options.  In the meantime, if you already know what you’d like to include on your bottle then let us know when you select your perk, and we’ll do our best to make sure our initial designs cater to your needs.

Your Impact

Johnnie Walker is one of the world’s most iconic whisky brands. We’re constantly striving to push the boundaries to produce world-class whisky. We’re taking the next step on that journey, and we are looking for your input to help us shape this unique proposition.

By backing this project, you will not only be one of the first to own an individually numbered My Edition, but you will also have the chance to join our Founder Panel - a group of whisky pioneers who will help us shape this product now and in the future. We’re excited to work with you to keep pushing the boundaries of whisky.

 

Please be aware that we are currently at concept stage, and therefore cannot guarantee delivery. However, if we do not hit our funding goal or are otherwise unable to fulfil orders, we will refund all of our backers the full amount they originally paid.

Please drink responsibly and do not share with anyone under the legal drinking age.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions:

 

General

What is Johnnie Walker My Edition?

My Edition is a new product from Johnnie Walker - one of the world's most famous whisky brands. It is a blended whisky crafted just for you, matching your personal flavour preferences, in a beautiful bottle that you've personalised, delivered straight to your door.

 

How long until I can get my Johnnie Walker My Edition?

We're still in development, but by backing our campaign now you'll be guaranteed priority access to My Edition when we launch. That means later this year, you'll be the first to use our digital platform to create your very own Personal Edition and get it delivered straight to your door.

 

Can I purchase these perks as a gift?

Yes, that's a great idea! We have a gift-wrapping option available, simply select the 'this is a gift' option when you're choosing your perk and we'll do the rest. Or you can go all out and select our "Gift Edition" Perk to give a truly special, innovative whisky gift to that special someone.

 

Why do you need my support?

My Edition is inspired by individual whisky lovers, and we want you to be involved in making this product amazing. By backing this campaign, you'll get exclusive membership of our My Edition Founder Panel, a group of makers, creatives and innovators who will have the chance to help us shape this pioneering new product in the months and years ahead.
 

 

What is the Founder Panel?

We love working with pioneers and early adopters to shape the products we develop. To make that possible, we're putting together a group of innovators just like you who are keen to shape the future of whisky. This might mean helping us to test new products, it might be helping us to improve our existing products and it might be collaborating with us to launch new businesses. To participate, simply back this campaign and we'll be in touch!

 

12 Month Edition

How many blends will I be receiving?

You'll receive six whiskies over the course of a year, with a new one delivered every two months.

 

Who will select the blends I'll be receiving?

Every 2 months we will be selecting the whiskies to match the time of the year for you the enjoy. 

 

Are the bottles personalised?

Yes - each bottle we send will include a a personalised label designed by you using our online personalisation suite.

 

Event Edition

Are all the bottles the same blend?

Yes, with this perk you'll have the opportunity to craft the perfect whisky for your event and have them all delivered at a reduced price.

 

What personalisation options are available on the Event Edition?

Each bottle we send will include a personalised label and engraving, designed by you using our online personalisation suite.

 

Shipping

Where can Johnnie Walker My Edition be shipped?

We are looking into shipping options across various markets.

 

What are the shipping costs?

We have discounted shipping costs as an Indiegogo exclusive, but please see the specific charges that may apply to your order at checkout.

 

When will you be shipping My Edition?

We hope to ship at the beginning of December 2017, in time for Christmas, but we'll keep you fully updated as we progress over the coming months.

story:
Join us in making dinnertime an epic saga, an enduring tale of survival and fortitude on the ice planet Hoth.

It’s an age-old story: A loyal Tauntaun sacrifices itself to provide life-saving warmth for a future Jedi in its steamy entrails.

Now recreate the legend at your own dinner table. The Tauntaun—faithfully played by the baked potato on your plate—serves himself up to a young Jedi master, aka a lump of butter frozen into a Luke-like shape using the included freezer mold. Reenact the fateful moment when Han eviscerates the beast: slice open your erstwhile companion and insert Luke inside.

Add some salt, a sprinkle of The Force (or sour cream), and enjoy your mouthwatering dinner.

You thought they smelled delicious... on the outside!

Each Baked Potauntaun Kit Includes:

  • A single tauntaun headpiece
  • Two tauntaun haunches
  • A Luke butter mold
  • Lightsaber butter knife!
How It Works:

1) Prepare a potato of your choosing.

2) Using your thumb and index finger, firmly insert Tauntaun head piece into top of potato by pressing down on head until plastic stabber is fully emerged in potato.

3) Affix tauntaun haunches to left and right sides of the potato, using the non-invasive "soft-grips" and the same fingers described above.

4) Place potauntaun in standing or lying position on your plate.

5) Remove Butter Luke from the carbonite mold in your freezer.

6) Wield your awesome lightsaber knife, so awesome it's worth this entire Indiegogo project alone.

6) Use lightsaber knife to make lateral 2-4" incision in potauntaun, felling the once glorious snow beast.

7) Insert Butter Luke into opening, allowing Jedi to melt thoroughly within the potato.

8) Enjoy!

Features
  • Dishwasher-safe
  • Manufactured in the USA -- or China. Designed in California.
Compatibility
  • Works with any potato
Process

Funds will be used to finalize our CAD models; manufacture the food-grade, dishwasher-safe components; negotiate official licensing with Lucasfilm -- because like any well-bred beast of burden, we want Baked Potauntauns to be legitimate; and ship these beauties to you in quality packaging.

Perks

Artist's rendition by Jillian Eittreim
Risks and Challenges

Our team has expertise in product design and development, manufacturing and fulfillment, technical illustration, graphic and packaging design.

We have established relationships with the partners who will manufacture our Potauntauns, knives and butter molds. As this is not rocket science -- it's not even potato science, heck it's not science at all -- we do not foresee any issues with this process. We have doubled our estimated timeframe as a just-in-case precaution.

There is a risk that the fine folks responsible for Lucasfilm licensing will choose not to work with us, although they have licensed the beautiful Tauntaun for many other items and products. It is likely that Lucasfilm will appropriately desire/require input into the design and function of the product, which may change some of the features as depicted above.

Incredible video by Andrew Schlussel, andrewschlussel.com

story:
I worked for over 40 years as an Engineer and Project Manager on large industrial projects, most of the time in a big office with hundreds of other engineers, designers, and other specialists. Every day at lunchtime most of us would rush out for an hour or so to a local eatery, have a quick lunch, and hurry back to work. There were always a few folks who stayed back at the office, having brought leftovers or a pre-packaged meal. 

I never thought about it much until I had to have a knee replaced [apparently 50 years of golf will do that - who knew?] and found myself bringing my lunch to work while my knee recovered from surgery. And I discovered why some people preferred to bring their lunch. The office was nearly empty, it was quiet and calm, people were relaxed and amicable, some even took quick naps, and that was the single most pleasant hour of the day. I became a bring-my-lunch-to-work person too, and that's when I soon discovered there was a downside to bringing your lunch,

Most people brought food that needed to be refrigerated until lunchtime, and then heated up for consumption. The company provided refrigerators and microwaves on every floor for this, usually in the coffee bar area. But these were always overused- the fridges were jammed full every morning, and I had to find a spot to stuff my lunch in and subsequently dig it out later. And the microwaves were even worse. Since it took a few minutes to heat a meal, there was always a wait in line until my turn, and the microwave always had a blend of food odors from the last few users that was often, well, let's just say "unappetizing".

My office didn't allow mini-fridges or personal microwaves, and they took up too much room anyway, so we all just endured the situation. Then I had an idea. I remembered a friend who had a little travel cooler, about 6-pack size, that plugged into the car cigarette lighter, and realized I could get one of those and a voltage converter and hide them under my desk and keep my lunch cool there instead of the company fridge. I did that, and it worked. I had to package my food so it would fit, but it did the trick.  I used this for over a year, although I still had to use the office microwave.  

Two features of this little cooler were especially significant. It cools very quickly, and it doesn't require complex controls because it uses thermoelectric chilling, a simple heat-pump technology that produces very cold temperatures very quickly. Unlike conventional freon-cycle systems that require hours to cool down and must be run continuously I only needed to run it for a few hours in the morning. And TE chilling is self-limited in that it can only cool down 30-40 degrees below ambient [room] temperature, which works out to ideal refrigeration temperature.  TE chilling doesn't scale up economically, so it's not used for full size or compact refrigerators or air conditioners, but it's perfect for small duties such as this. It's used in electronics, travel coolers, and even small wine coolers. It uses direct current [DC] instead of AC [alternating current, like in a home]. Cars use DC, but to use a DC device indoors, you need a DC/AC converter.

The following year, I retired early due to health issues, and found myself thinking about those lunches at work, and came up with the idea for this product for both chilling and heating a single meal serving in a common, compact desktop-sized appliance. Combining 2 well-established technologies into a right-sized enclosure would be a modest design effort, and the final product wouldn't be expensive. So although there wasn't any real need for proof-of-concept, I went ahead and developed a prototype anyway, using the smallest microwave I could find, and adding the TE chilling feature to it, and it worked as expected.

So I applied for a patent, and asked a few colleagues their impressions of the concept and received enthusiastic responses, especially from those who like to bring their lunches. I hadn't thought about it much, but was reminded that bringing your lunch saves money too, so the device would pay for itself pretty quickly. I had bought all the components for the prototype for <$100, retail, including shipping, so this device shouldn't cost any more than that, especially if it's mass-produced.

So that's where it stands at present. With support from a few friends and colleagues, I got a bid from a specialty engineering design firm that will will work with me to complete the design, size and source the components, fit them into a properly-sized enclosure, and build and test a prototype. We'll also need to revisit and finalize the patent to include specific and new features. That will be Phase 1 and is the basis for this funding campaign.

Phase 2 will follow and, based in part on the response from Phase 1, will determine how best to manufacture the "Leftovers Lunchbox" -LLBox for short [help us choose a better name - see below] . The plan is to source the components internationally, and assemble the units in the USA. With international trade treaties so uncertain these days, we're going to keep this at home, even if it adds a few dollars to the cost.

From info in hand, it looks like we'll need ~$100,000 for phase 1. We're not setting a rigid goal for the campaign, as there are always unforeseen costs that arise, and estimates are notoriously inaccurate for development projects like this. We plan to proceed with whatever funds we raise, and supplement with our own funds as needed to get Phase 1 completed.  If we're fortunate enough to raise more, we'll just proceed directly into Phase 2.

We believe Phase 1 should take no more than about 6 months, and plan to proceed with all due haste into phase 2. The potential market for this product is so huge, the scale of the initial manufacturing effort will largely depend on the magnitude of the Phase 1 response. The best approach may be to create the initial assembly plant in a modest size and operate it awhile to fine-tune the operations and then look to scale up, but that's a decision for Phase 2.

So we hope you'll join us in this adventure. We think you'll enjoy your Leftovers LunchBox™ [or whatever it's final name is], and we think a lot of other folks will too.

 

AND LASTLY:

We realize "Leftovers LunchBox" is an awkward [although descriptive] name - but everything else we thought of was already trademarked. So if you think of a better name, please let us know by adding it to the "COMMENTS" tab above and we'll see which name contributors like the most.

The plan is to source the components internationally, and assemble the units in the USA. With international trade treaties so uncertain these days, we're going to keep this at home, even if it adds a few dollars to the cost.From info in hand, it looks like we'll need ~$100,000 for phase 1. We're not setting a rigid goal for the campaign, as there are always unforeseen costs that arise, and estimates are notoriously inaccurate for development projects like this. We plan to proceed with whatever funds we raise, and supplement with our own funds as needed to get Phase 1 completed.  If we're fortunate enough to raise more, we'll just proceed directly into Phase 2.We believe Phase 1 should take no more than about 6 months, and plan to proceed with all due haste into phase 2. The potential market for this product is so huge, the scale of the initial manufacturing effort will largely depend on the magnitude of the Phase 1 response. The best approach may be to create the initial assembly plant in a modest size and operate it awhile to fine-tune the operations and then look to scale up, but that's a decision for Phase 2.So we hope you'll join us in this adventure. We think you'll enjoy your Leftovers LunchBox™ [or whatever it's final name is], and we think a lot of other folks will too. AND LASTLY:We realize "Leftovers LunchBox" is an awkward [although descriptive] name - but everything else we thought of was already trademarked. So if you think of a better name, please let us know by adding it to the "COMMENTS" tab above and we'll see which name contributors like the most.

story:
Clean Wine Benefits Everyone

A quick look into the benefits of wine are pretty well-known-the top two being a reduced risk for heart disease and stroke. However, if you dig a little deeper you will find that many of the additives used by many commercial wine producers are detrimental to your health. Topping the list are stabilizers (i.e. acetaldehyde, dimethyl dicarbonate) which can be poisonous, followed by sulfites (can cause a headache), and clarifiers. All of these are chemicals touted to preserve the quality of the wine. You then have pesticides such as carbaryl, daconil, imidocloprid, and countless others being sprayed routinely on the vines and fruit. They do their job, but some becomes mixed with stormwater runoff, and the rest goes into the wine we drink. Yuck.

I can speak as a 20-year veteran of the landscape industry that most of the pesticides we use today make their way into the food chain, and with dire repercussions for some. This is why I have chosen to start this initiative. Sound gardening practices start and end with what is native to the planet, and the wine produced here will be nothing more nor less. The result is a product that is safe, nutritious, healthy, and will go toe-to-toe with any mainstream wine produced.....but it doesn't stop there.

The entire complex needs to follow suit. For what good is it if the wine is organic, but the facility and processes to make it are polluting? This is why we aim to be fully sustainable in all areas from grape production to energy use to bottling. It's smart, responsible, and the simply the right thing to do.

What We Need & What You Get

$500,000.00 is the goal. It's what must be raised for this campaign to be a success. The image below contains both a complete itemized budget for each facet of the project, as well as a timeline for completion. The very first item on the list is the success of this campaign. In return for your contribution, some very generous perks have been developed (some of which are worth more than the contribution amount needed to qualify).

Our Impact

It only takes a spark to light a fire. Likewise, it only takes a vineyard to change an industry, and a changed industry to influence a culture. Your help can lead to a cleaner planet and an industry-wide renaissance to old-world winemaking where the final product is truly healthy.

Risks & Challenges

Producing the best grapes despite the risk of adverse weather will likely be my biggest challenge. My two decades of landscaping and horticultural experience will prove beneficial in how to properly care and nurture the fruit. My professional training via The GA Dept. of Agriculture has allowed me to learn these practices. You can verify my certification at  http://www.kellysolutions.com/ga/applicators/ . I plan on consulting with one of the state's viticulturists via my local GA Extension offices should problems extend beyond my level of expertise.

Pressing Q & A

Q: Why isn't wine a perk?

A: Per Indiegogo's Terms of Use, no form of alcohol can be issued as a perk.

 

Q: Where in the South Piedmont Region of GA do you want to establish the vineyard, and why?

A: We feel the best location to be in Henry County, GA due to the climate, soil conditions, and topography. Economically, it is in one of the fastest growing regions in the state, and is in close proximity to both the cities of Atlanta and Macon.

 

Q: What kind of wine do you plan on producing?

A: Blanc du Bois, Norton, Lenoir, Merlot, and Muscadine will be our initial offerings for table wine.

 

Q: I don't want to invest in something that may fail. How do you plan on sustaining a profit if you have a bad year (i.e. Inclement weather decimates the grape crop)?

A: Additional means of revenue will be available such as guided tours, and renting out the grounds as an event space. Wine tastings will be offered upon the release of our first wines.

 

Q: I've heard of people using crowdfunding contributions to line their own pockets, and not follow through with the project they presented—thieves! I want to contribute, but trust needs to be established. How can I trust you?

A: For each leg of this project, at least two update videos will be posted—one at the start, and one upon completion. Additionally, I understand that from the backer's point of view that no one wants to be swindled. So here you go....If I for any reason do not follow through with this project upon receiving funding, feel free to proceed with legal civil action against me for fraud. My word is my bond.

 

Q: What about permits, licensing, marketing, and administrative costs?

A: These costs are included in the budget for each leg of the project. An example would be that the land budget of $300000.00 includes the cost of the land, closing costs, planning & zoning fees, all taxes, and any other real estate charges incurred.

 

Q: Does this project give back to help the local community in any way?

A: Yes! We plan on acting as a destination for local school districts to bring their students for educational field trips. Students would learn about agriculture, farming, sustainability, clean energy solutions, and mathmatics (among other topics) in a fun, hands-on environment.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you support this campaign but don't have the means to contribute, you can help by sharing what you've seen here with everyone you know. Your family. Your friends. Your coworkers. People at church. People at the cafe. People on the bus. Share on social media. Place our URL in your email signature and encourage support. Any and all help to make this initiative succeed is welcome. To all of you who support this project, I offer my very sincerest appreciation. Let's get this done.

Looking Forward to Success,

Benjamin Bodnar

story:
all in

Hey guys, Toshiro here not doing what I do best and trying to fundraise for my new project, tea&vegan, in Atlanta a high-growth concept that is the heir apparent to experimental te amo tea model. To help I am trying to raise a little bit of cash for future business expenses so I can finally quit my job and go all in. 

the past

As you might not have known I have closed the tea shop in Columbus, Ga. It’s crazy how I started that shop almost four years ago with my own cash from putting in really hard work at a hot warehouse in Alabama. I will never claim I came from a wealthy background so there wasn’t much family I could ask for help be it financially or for counsel so through my twenties I have had to learn some of the entrepreneurial things the hard way. The 20-hour days I had to work, the sleeping in my car, my body hemorrhaging with exhaustion, I loved every minute of it though and forever thankful for every person that stepped foot in my shop. The energy of the diverse community that was te amo tea will always exist in the universe.

my calling

I remember when I discovered my calling in life in 2014. It wasn’t a great year so far at that time until that fall when I walked into a Teavana with a friend in South Carolina and guy in Birkenstocks offered me a sample of tea. Albeit skeptical I tried it and was startled at the warmth and flavor of the minute swig. High on the experience, I left wondering where has this been my whole life?

 

the future

Contributing to my project by either donating or sharing would mean everything to me. It will show to me that all my hard work paid off and people believed in what I was doing at te amo tea. Although I know times are hard whatever you can provide would be fantastic.

I am looking to raise pretty much whatever I can from this platform to help with the buildout and operating costs of the new project. I have personally already invested a lot of my own cash so I know the risks, EITHER GO BIG OR GO HOME!

story:
Short Summary

Hello, We are running this campaign towards the dream of providing education to not so privileged children.Requesting to support my campaign supporting Akshaya Patra- providing food to hungry school children and enabling education for them. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our organisation strives to eliminate classroom hunger by implementing the Mid-Day Meal Scheme in the government schools and government-aided schools. Alongside, Akshaya Patra also aims at countering malnutrition and supporting the right to education of socio-economically disadvantaged children.

The Impact

Our partnership with the Government of India and various State Governments, along with the persistent support from corporates, individual donors, and well-wishers have helped us to grow from serving just 1,500 children in 5 schools in 2000 to serving 3000 children.

Risks & Challenges

By the time the Ministry of Human Resource Development - Department of School Health and Education extended its support to the initiative in 2003, Akshaya Patra was already reaching out to 23,000 children.Other Ways You Can Help

No one has ever become poor by giving. When courage, genius, and generosity hold hands, all things are possible. It is more rewarding to watch money change the world than to watch it accumulate.

story:
STORY

Hello, My name is Michael DePaolis, a Chef/ Entrepreneur/Health and Fitness enthusiast.  Nutrition in America is broken, more about that in a minute. I have spent the past nine years operating my company Paleo Power Meals, a successful gourmet healthy meal prep company servicing so many customers, mainly on the east coast! This includes everyone from Professional Athletes in every sport to the fitness industry to the everyday individual.  The time has come to take clean eating nationwide to each and every doorstep in the country!  

 

 

PROBLEM 

Back to the issue of Nutrition in America.  The U.S obesity epidemic is obviously a major issue but it is also complex.  Consumers are sent mixed messages when it comes to nutrition and portion control. Between larger portions, processed packaged food, mainly consisting of simple carbohydrates, sugar, and other shelf-stable products. Ads are constantly pushing the convenience of drive-thru meals typically branded as fast, cheap, filling, and delicious.  Now add Covid19 into the mix with social distancing, limited trips to the grocery store, not to mention working from home, and homeschooling your children, all of which leads to poor decision-making, opting for convenience over healthier alternatives.

Here are just some of the long term health effects of a poor diet and obesity:

Type 2 Diabetes

Weakened Immune system

Heart Disease

Certain Cancers

Depression

High blood pressure (Hypertension)

High LDL cholesterol, low HDL cholesterol, or high levels of triglycerides (Dyslipidemia)

Stroke

Sleep Apnea

Liver Disease

Gallbladder disease.

Osteoarthritis (a breakdown of cartilage and bone within a joint)

Along with so many other issues that will keep you busy with Doctor visits!

 

OUR SOLUTION

I created Just Eat Clean to help eliminate the confusion and guesswork of which nutritional lifestyle to choose from by focusing on just eating clean, healthy natural ingredients that come from the earth. Now you can have healthy clean fresh pre made delicious meals conveniently delivered free nationwide direct to your doorstep with no menu planning, grocery shopping, cooking, or cleaning. Meals arrive fresh, never frozen, and ready-to-eat in just three minutes. By eating this way, you can also drastically improve your overall health and well-being, thus helping decrease your risk for many of the health issues noted above. 

 

HOW IT WORKS

The ordering process will be very simple.  We will have the following Meal Plan options available for you to choose from:

Our menu changes seasonally and rotates weekly. There are always a wide variety of meals to choose from, keeping it interesting. All meal plans ship out weekly and can be changed up, put on hold, or canceled at any time. 

Italian Chicken Thighs with Garlicky Kale and Roasted Butternut Squash, Pulled Pork Carnitas with Red Slaw and Plantains, All Natural Ground Turkey and Broccoli Bowl, Meatloaf with Sautéed Broccoli and Cauliflower Mashed

 

10 Meal Plan

 

SCRATCH KITCHEN

We are a 100% Scratch kitchen, which means we do not purchase any premade items or ingredients.  We make everything from scratch. We know every ingredient used in preparing every meal, and so do you!

 

ALWAYS 100% GRASS-FED

Rest assured that all of our beef is always grass-fed with no antibiotics or hormones and always treated humanely for the best tasting meat.

 

100% Grass-Fed and Finished Beef

 

PASTURE RAISED POULTRY

Our poultry is raised in a manner consistent with how chickens would naturally live: in a pasture, with the ability to roam freely, scratch, and peck, which improves the soil at the same time. Pasture-raised chickens eat a diet made up of provided feed and foraged grubs and insects, the natural diet of healthy birds.

Pasture Raised Poultry

 

ALWAYS WILD CAUGHT

Wild-caught fish are caught by fishermen in their natural habitats — rivers, lakes, oceans, etc. Wild fish eat organisms found in their existing environment, which by nature, is far more diverse than what farmed fish get to eat regularly.

Additionally, wild-caught fish do not need to be treated with antibiotics because they do not have the same risk of disease or infection as farmed seafood does.

Wild Caught Seafood

 

ALWAYS ORGANIC

 

Organic Vegetables

 

ALWAYS CONVENIENT

 

Nationwide Shipping to your doorstep

 

STATE OF THE ART PACKAGING

We will also be utilizing a state-of-the-art vacuum skin packaging technology that ensures freshness by sealing out oxygen and keeping the meals as fresh as the moment they were prepared. This process will also extend the shelf life for up to two weeks while keeping the product intact during the entire shipping process eliminating spillage.

 

Vacuum Skin Packaging

 

WHATS IN THE BOX

Each box contains a weekly meal plan of your choice. Your shipment will come packaged on dry ice and ice packs.  We have done extensive testing to ensure that the meals stay fresh and at the proper temperature during transit.

 

 

10 Meal Plan

 

ALWAYS RECYCLABLE

All of our packaging, including the box, insulated liner, food trays, and gel packs, are 100% recyclable and can be disposed of at your local recycling program.

 

 

 

 

REWARDS

 

 

STRETCH GOALS

 

OUR TEAM

 

Risks and challenges

Risk of fulfilling orders: We will have two strategically located kitchens on both the East and West Coasts that have the capability to handle tens of thousands of meals. If it grows at fast rate we can add different shifts to accommodate the growth.

story:
My name is Duane Harper, I love coffee!

I used to work in the oil industry for over 35 years, I was laid off 3 years ago and discovered that it was time to make a change in careers (as there is no more jobs in that industry), at age 55 that is not easy. 

I have a passion for making coffee, and I love to drink coffee and try different kinds of coffee.  I first started making cold brewed coffee and discovered how good it was.  Then I heard about nitrogen infused cold brewed coffee and I had to try it.  I searched all over Edmonton to find some and discovered that no one makes it, most people haven't even heard about it.  So.... I did the research, found out how its made and bought all the equipment necessary to make it.  It's fantastic!  This is my new career, but I need to get it out there.  I sold coffee during the 2017 market season at Cheer events, the White Barn Market, at the Cannabis and Hemp show, Edmonton Night Market, Zoo Brew, at an Easters Seals event and at Canada Day at the Legislature grounds.

For the 2018 season I have a couple of events scheduled, but I need more.  Events and markets have entrance fees which are prohibitive to someone who is just starting out.  That is why I am asking for help with funding.  I have put a lot of time and money into this business so far and I think one really good season would help me grow.  I need $5900.00 to pay for entrance fees and to buy and inverter to power my equipment.

Any contribution you can make will help.  For every contribution of $10.00 I will send you a certificate for a free coffee, for any contribution of  $400.00 I will come to your event (wedding, grand opening, party, etc) and serve coffee.  If you can't make a contribution, please share with others about my campaign.

I have a passion for making coffee, and I love to drink coffee and try different kinds of coffee.  I first started making cold brewed coffee and discovered how good it was.  Then I heard about nitrogen infused cold brewed coffee and I had to try it.  I searched all over Edmonton to find some and discovered that no one makes it, most people haven't even heard about it.  So.... I did the research, found out how its made and bought all the equipment necessary to make it.  It's fantastic!  This is my new career, but I need to get it out there.  I sold coffee during the 2017 market season at Cheer events, the White Barn Market, at the Cannabis and Hemp show, Edmonton Night Market, Zoo Brew, at an Easters Seals event and at Canada Day at the Legislature grounds.
For the 2018 season I have a couple of events scheduled, but I need more.  Events and markets have entrance fees which are prohibitive to someone who is just starting out.  That is why I am asking for help with funding.  I have put a lot of time and money into this business so far and I think one really good season would help me grow.  I need $5900.00 to pay for entrance fees and to buy and inverter to power my equipment.
Any contribution you can make will help.  For every contribution of $10.00 I will send you a certificate for a free coffee, for any contribution of  $400.00 I will come to your event (wedding, grand opening, party, etc) and serve coffee.  If you can't make a contribution, please share with others about my campaign.

story:
Mallow is an organic drink made with ingredients specifically sourced to alleviate some of the symptoms of unintended heights. Whether it’s sugar, caffeine or THC, when you overindulge, things can get uncomfortable. And when that happens, you’ll want Mallow on hand, so we're bringing it to you. The Big Trip is a cross Canada Tour.

Disclaimer: Mallow does not contain any controlled substances. Mallow does not intend to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or illness.

Because we're over the shaming, stigma, and stereotypes of cannabis use. Cannabis users are high functioning, hard working professionals, we are creators and innovators, we are focused, driven, intelligent, and that is something to celebrate! With your help we will come out to your town and celebrate with our very own DJ, block parties, and general good times. 

With the legalization of cannabis in Canada, new and returning users are flooding the market. The products available today are not the same as weed from 70’s and 80’s. Today’s strains are much more potent and edibles are generally lacking in dosage instructions. We’re likely to see a lot of overconsumption in the short term.

 

Stats show that around 20% of Canadians have used cannabis in the last year and 40% are considering doing so once it's legal. So here we are folks, October 17th. The day some have been waiting for and others have been dreading. Whether you like legalization or not, with over 11 million Canadians already using or considering cannabis, this is something we can’t ignore. 

With little regulation involved in producing edibles, it's easy to over-consume and once that happens it’s too late, you’re in over your head. Sweating, heart racing, dry mouth, and panic. You’d do anything at that point to feel better. Before Mallow, you just had to ride it out.

 

We're asking for $30,000 to purchase and restore a vintage Airstream! This will get us from our hometown of Halifax, NS all the way to beautiful BC. 

We will spend $15,000 - $20,000 on the Airstream and then another $10,000 to $15,000 to restore and stock it will Mallow. 

We want to show our appreciation for each and every person who pledges to our page. If you donate $30 we'll take the time to write a personal note, saying lots of nice things about you, based on what we find on the internet. If you're wearing a cool hat in an instagram post, we'll be sure to let you know. All these letters will be written while sober, and of right mind.

If you want to make things more interesting...

Donate $50 and we’ll write you as lovely a letter as we can while drunk, we make no promises to boost your ego and we’ll probably regret it by the time you read it.

If your town/city donates $1,000 collectively, then we will make sure to visit on our tour! We want to meet all the incredible people supporting our vision, especially those who pledge to make it happen! Check out our interactive map to see how close your hometown is to being included on the tour!

If you just so happen to have an Airstream you would like to get off your hands, we'll come pick it up! Donate an Airstream and we will give you a life supply of Mallow.

 

 

Risks and Challenges 

We’ve got some start up experience under our belt, so we know how difficult and daunting it is to bring something to market, but when it involves a whole new industry that was just previously illegal… well you could say that’s a little intimidating. But we’re not backing down, we believe with the right information and openness to conversation, Canadians can embrace the cannabis industry for all that it is. Whether it’s for fun, health, or nostalgia.

While we are not a controlled substance and everyone and their dog could consume Mallow, we know there is a negative connotation to those who work in and alongside the Cannabis Industry, and that’s why we’re doing this!

story:
We have created the only design forward, smartphone connected coffee maker that cares about your entire day – not just your morning. 

To preorder the Bluprint coffee maker and bring this project to life, click Back. To learn more about what we are all about, read on!

 

 

 


We spent months talking to customers and coffee experts in our quest to design and build a top of the line coffee maker that not only looks amazing in your kitchen and is integrated with your lifestyle, but most importantly makes a great cup of coffee.

 

 

 



Schedule your brew time at night and wake up to hot, fresh coffee. It's that easy, we promise. 
No more manuals or tiny, confusing knobs. 

 


 

 

 

 

 

A great cup of coffee is part of your routine and signals the start to your day.

That’s why we created the ability for you to set micro-goals for your day on the Bluprint App.

 

 

 

Choose to make your goals public to our supportive community to give you encouragement and help you stay accountable, or find inspiration on new goals. Like, comment or share goals from your community! 

 


 



For us at Bluprint, coffee signals the start to our morning and a cue to tackle our goals for the day. To understand why, we dug into the science. 

 

Most people want to set daily goals and build better habits, but the majority fail because they do not have a simple, consistent cue.  

 


 

 



There is a simple neurological loop at the center of every habit, consisting of three parts: cue (triggers your brain), routine (action or behavior) and reward (prize). 

 

 

We know there is no better way to tackle our goals than with the cue of coffee.  

That is why we created the Bluprint app, which allows you to not only program and brew your coffee, but also set daily micro-goals. 

 




 

 

 

 

Feel good when you accomplish your goals, as even a 1% improvement compounded daily can lead to monumental change.

Choose to make your goals public to our supportive community. When your goals are shared with others, you’re much more likely to accomplish them.

 

 

 

 

After countless surveys, customer interviews, and consultation with leading coffee experts, we combined all of the top features to create a coffee maker that not only fits your lifestyle, but makes a really great cup of coffee. 

 

 


 

  • Brews with water at approximately 200-201 °F to ensure grounds are extracted to full flavor and strength potential.
  • Brews quickly, in under 8 minutes. Need a cup of coffee before brewing is done? We get it. Brew pause smart technology pauses brewing while you pour yourself a cup.  
  • Brews evenly, saturating all grounds in the brew basket thoroughly with 200 °F water in the first minute. 

 

 

 

No more soap and sponges. With just the click of a button you can set the "clean cycle" on the app. 

 

 

We designed Bluprint to be the centerpeice of your kitchen, while taking up minimal space.  At just under 14 inches tall, Bluprint fits under most kitchen cabinets.  

 


 

 

 

 

Bluprint Coffee Maker (Your choice of color: Blue, Mint Green, Rose Gold, White)

 

 

Premium access to the Bluprint App

 

Permanent washable filter and pre-measured coffee scoop 

Double-walled stainless steal carafe that keeps coffee hot (and fresh!) for up to 4 hours

 



Before starting Bluprint, we were not coffee aficionados. We were working professionals that found happiness in our morning coffee routines. 

Once we started working from home, we were looking for an upgrade to our coffee maker. After several hours of reading countless Amazon reviews, we were paralyzed by too many choices and no brand that really spoke to the emotional attachment we had to our morning coffee routine. 

That's why we created Bluprint, a direct-to-consumer drip coffee maker featuring minimalist design and smartphone integration for simplified programming. No more confusing knobs and buttons.

 

 

 

After countless design iterations in our quest to create the perfect coffee maker, we finally completed the prototype testing and now we are are ready to start on tooling and production.

 

 

 

 

After our successful Indiegogo campaign we will immediately begin tooling which will take approximately 6-8 weeks. Following production and quality assurance we plan to ship by end of October 2021.  

 

 

New to Indiegogo? We are here to help. Follow these simple steps to get your Bluprint:

1. Create an Indiegogo account or log in to existing account

2. Navigate to the Bluprint page (you're here now!)

3. Click the "back this project" button

4. Select your reward

5. Complete your payment

6. We will reach out to you to confirm your color choice (Blue, Mint Green, Rose Gold, or White)

 

After countless surveys, customer interviews, and consultation with top coffee experts, we are confident that we have the best coffee maker features you are asking for. We haven’t rushed through design nor initial prototyping, which has allowed us to perfect the product.

We are confident with our estimated ship dates, but in this current environment things can change. Who would have thought that a ship would block the Suez Canal and cause delays? What we can promise is communication! Any updates, any changes, any delays, will be conveyed to you, so you are always in the loop.

story:
ZenMug: the Italian hand made stylish mug

What is ZenMug? It's a handmade, 100% Italian mug. But, more than this, it's, basically, our idea of relax. It's more than just a mug, it's a fusion of sensations, where the outer wood part, warm and natural, meets the ceramic shiny inner part, in a melting pot of feelings on your hands and lips. The taste of coffe, tea or your favorite beverage is now accompanied by a new range of sensations!

ZenMug is completely customizable and every single mug is unique and intimately yours. You can choose your wood between different types (we actually have linden and teak, but more are coming!) and every single mug is carved from a different raw piece so none is similar to another. The inner cercamic part and the top cap, both hand made in ceramic, can be chosen in different colors (white and black so far, but we are working to have new pigments soon) to have your own combination of wood&stone. 

Your ZeMug will be unique, in every single part, like you. Are you ready for your new ZenMug?

Who we are

We are three young professionals with proven, exceptional skills in our daily job that want to bring something different to market.

It's our first campaign but we have great experience in delivering products on the international market with success, mixed with a great enthusiasm and a passion for design, handmade and tradition.

How ZenMug is made

The wood, outer part. It's an absolutely natural wood cleavered carved with high precision tools. Those videos are noisy, sorry, but after all  ZenMug will be clean, smooth an quite!
 

 

The ceramic handwork, the Inner part:

It's made in Italy, in Florence, by a local family business with years of experience in small and high quality  production for well known brands of the luxury market

 

As you can see from videos, we are really ready for full production and shipment, all the molds have been realized and wood in in stock! Let's start production together supporting us with this campaign!

 

How the mug works:

Tappo:

It's the ZenMug cap, made of ceramic and available in different colors (coming soon!)

Interno:

This is ZenMug Inner part. It's handmade in ceramic and available in different colors. It's easy to remove and wash, even in dishwasher, and can be used in microwave. The Interno can be easily changed to let you switch from a color to another one to match your feeling, or replace it in case you breake it.

Tazza:

"Tazza" means mug and is the Outer part of ZenMug. It's made of wood, carved from a solid block and it's purely a piece of art. Designed with an eye to ergonomics and one to style, it really attracts you to grab the mug with full hand and feel the real wood on skin. All the used woods come from fairly trade market and we invest part of our company income in reforestation project to keep ZenMug sustainable. The outer part is available in different woods (so far, linden and teak)

story:
Overview

Green Pet is a 100% plant-based cruelty-free dog food. It is hypoallergenic, cholesterol-free, and eco-friendly. Green Pet helps dogs have a healthier and happier life.

Dogs are omnivores, like human beings, so their diets can be completely based on vegetables.

Studies have shown that dogs fed with vegetable-based diets are much less prone to have skin allergies, heart diseases or digestive problems.

We are working on a prototype of the food, and our plan is to start producing it during 2019.

 

 

Meet Green Pet, the healthy and eco-friendly food for your furry friend

Green Pet is the first 100 % super-premium vegetable-based dog food made in Uruguay.

What are our expectations as owners towards our furry friends? To help them be happy and have a healthy life!

 

Many investigations carried out by important organizations such as PETA state that 100 % vegetable-based dog food is much healthier than regular dog food based on meat and preservatives, because dogs fed with vegan food are less prone to suffer from skin, heart, or stomach diseases, or even cancer.

https://www.peta.org/living/animal-companions/v...

 

 

 

What is your contribution?

Our formula is already tested and validated, so with your support, we will be able to start producing and distributing Green Pet in Uruguay. However, our aim is to export our product, in order to meet demands from the international market.

 

What is Mucho Bicho?

Mucho Bicho is an animal shelter that rescues stray dogs and helps dogs suffering from cancer, as many required treatments are really expensive or are not provided by some veterinarians, due to lack of knowledge.

We would like to support this shelter action, and you can join us! Click on Mucho Bicho donation perk, and 10 % of your contribution will go for Mucho Bicho!

Visit them on: https://www.facebook.com/muchobichotacuarembo

What are our investment goals?

First, we will give Mucho Bicho the money raised to help them assist dogs in need, and then, we will send you perks to thank you for your support.

With the rest of the money, we will be able to produce, distribute, and advertise our product.

What will happen if we do not meet the fundraising goals? We will produce Green Pet, but in a lower scale, and the marketing objectives will be reduced as well.

We are absolutely convinced that our project will be successful and revolutionary!

 

Project timeline

For two years, our team of entrepreneurs and professionals has been searching for innovative and sustainable ideas to improve our dogs’ health and lifestyle, as well as to reduce the environment damage caused by the pet food industry, and after a long time of hard work, we came to the conclusion that vegan dog food is the best option!

Not only do we believe that Green Pet will help dogs be happier and healthier, but we also believe that owners will reduce their expenses on veterinary care.

 

 

ORT University in Uruguay is currently supporting the project. ORT University is based in almost 60 countries and is always supporting entrepreneurs.

You will be contributing to produce a completely verified product, as the formula has been tested and validated by the Departamento de Nutrición Animal, Facultad de Veterinaria (Universidad de la República).

 

 

So join Green Pet in this revolution to make a better world! Please give us your support or share this project with your beloved ones! We will be totally grateful!

 

The team

Our professional members of the team are experts on applied biology, environmental issues, marketing, business management, logistics, and communication.

Carolina works in food marketing. She studied at Facultad de Ciencias (Universidad de la República), where she learnt applied biology and environmental issues.

Juan is an international trade specialist. He has expertise in business management, logistics, and technology.

Natalia has expertise in communication. She is the customer service manager and the social media manager.

 

 

 

 

Follow us on:

 

 

 

Create a buzz by sharing Green pet on social media, just click one of the buttons below!

Carolina works in food marketing. She studied at Facultad de Ciencias (Universidad de la República), where she learnt applied biology and environmental issues.
Juan is an international trade specialist. He has expertise in business management, logistics, and technology.
Natalia has expertise in communication. She is the customer service manager and the social media manager.
 

 

 
 
Follow us on:

 

 
 
Create a buzz by sharing Green pet on social media, just click one of the buttons below!

story:
Here is our story

 

My name is Sébastien and I have been in the restaurant industry for 31 years now. I started as a dishwasher when I was 14 and now after having suffered through a very bad experience, Traiteur Le Vrai Nord was started. We are beginning our journey and urge you to lend us a hand. 

I found that, being a single father, I wanted to improve the quality of life for my children. The goal for the company is to bring good, healthy, local and sustainable food to your tables. We are offering chef at home services, party planning, meal planning, cooking classes and most likely more to come. 

 

I am a certified Red and Blue seal trained chef, and have always been passionate about food, its history, its provenance and the techniques that come with all of it. I believe that the purer the food the better. We are going to offer all manner of artisanal preserves, meats, terrines and the likes.

What I am looking for from all of you , is a little help in getting equipments. There are a few things we are missing to get fully going.

I am also asking for some funding that will act as a security blanket in the slow time.

Food I believe is one of those comforts none of us they do without. It is a labor of love and passion. Food brings us all together, brings us a sense of family. So please give us a hand.

Thank you very much.

story:
We LOVE PROTEIN BARS, but we think they can be better! Protein bars have the potential to be delicious, organic, and have real healthy ingredients in creative and exciting ways!

How do we plan to do that? By giving protein bars the treatment and attention they have always lacked! 

Our protein bar recipes are NOT formulated using factory-farmed cows and artificial ingredients. We use real ingredients like organic clover honey, grass fed whey protein, organic coconut oil, and organic nuts.

OutClass Nutrition believes having simple ingredients is the healthiest way to make a protein bar! Each ingredient is selected to provide a great tasting bar. Our bars provide natural ingredients with a purpose. The bars are free of artificial colors and flavors. They are gluten free, certified organic, contain Grass Fed Whey Protein (WPC80), have no preservatives or sugar alcohols, and are non-GMO.
 

Our 3 FLAVORS are Cashew Raisin, Chocolate Peanut Butter, and Chocolate Almond.

 GOAL: To create organic grass fed whey protein bars that are delicious and healthy!

We believe a bar with simple ingredients is all you need to eat to provide your body with the right nutrition!

With 18g of protein, our bars have less ingredients than store brought protein bars, are organic, have grass fed whey and all natural ingredients, With essential vitamins and minerals, these bars are a guilty free snack that you can eat everyday. It is a great feeling knowing that these bars taste great and are actually healthy for you!

  • Organic Cashews
  • Grass Fed Whey Protein Concentrate
  • Organic Clover Honey
  • Organic Soluble Tapioca Fiber
  • Organic Raisins
  • Organic Coconut Oil

 

  • Organic Peanuts
  • Grass Fed Whey Protein Concentrate
  • Organic Clover Honey
  • Organic Soluble Tapioca Fiber
  • Organic 100% Cacao Chocolate Chips
  • Organic Coconut Oil

 

  • Organic Almond Butter
  • Grass Fed Whey Protein Concentrate
  • Organic Clover Honey
  • Organic Soluble Tapioca Fiber
  • Organic 100% Cacao Chocolate Chips
  • Organic Coconut Oil

 

 

 

By supporting our 1st production run, you will receive your Organic Grass Fed Whey Protein Bars at a special Indiegogo discount and get it shipped to you for ONLY $5!!

Unlike our protein bar peers, OutClass protein bars have far more organic ingredients, fewer ingredients, and are non-GMO. Also, our source of protein in our bars is grass fed whey concentrate.

  • Organic Ingredients
  • Few Ingredients
  • Grass Fed Whey Concentrate Protein
  • Free from preservatives, artificial color or flavors, no chemicals
  • Low Sodium
  • Non-GMO
  • Real Food
  • Gluten Free

OutClass Protein Bars have whey protein exclusively from pasture-raised, free-range cows. Not only is this process more humane, but it also allows us to give you a more natural, nutritious protein, with no added hormones or antibiotics. Grass Fed Whey Protein is known to be better than standard Whey Protein. Just take our word for it!

  https://www.foodmatters.com/article/not-all-whe...  

 https://perfectketo.com/grass-fed-whey-protein/  

  • These animals are raised on organic pastures and eat natural, plant-based diets.
  • Grass Fed Whey contained more beta-lactoglobulin, lactoferrin, and lysozyme than conventional whey.
  • Raising grass fed whey cows is better for the environment.
  • Supports a better immune system and overall health.

OutClass protein bars are for you! Any workout or just normal life, bring an OutClass protein bar along with you! Our protein bars are great when you are:

  • At work: You’ve been sitting all day and just want to have a healthy snack.
  • Pre/Post Workout: You’re feeling pretty good about your work out. Why not give it the fiber and protein you actually needs after a hard workout?
  • On-the-go/traveling: You’re going to be in a car/train/plane for multiple hours. You haven’t been getting enough protein in for the day. Do you wish you could feel healthy while on the go?
  • Snacking: If you want a healthy snack while you are on a bike ride, resting after a run or hike, we have the bar for you.

The feedback has been very positive from individuals that have sampled our bars, and as people inquire as to where they can buy our bars, we are determined to fill these requests.     We are excited to provide a brand you can trust!

  • Certified Organic 
  • All natural -  no artificial flavors or colors
  • High Protein - 18g of PROTEIN in each bar
  • Gluten Free
  • Real food only
  • No preservatives or chemicals in any of our bars.
  • Grass Fed Whey Protein

Grass Fed Whey Organic Protein Bars at a Special Indiegogo Discount, See perks!

 It has been a long road to get to this point, but OutClass has FINISHED the following:

  • Nutritional Bar Manufacturer
  • R & D is Complete
  • Organic Certified Complete 
  • FDA Approval of Protein Bars
  • Custom Wrapper Design is Finished 
  • Large Scale Efficiency Testing Complete

We are at the stage of manufacturing the protein bars and WE NEED YOUR HELP!

With feedback that we received from those who have sampled our bars, we want to continue to have the ability to offer these great Grass Fed Whey Organic Protein Bars for people to purchase!

We've overcome challenges and are ready to go into production. Above is an estimated timeline for production. Funding will go towards protein bar manufacturing, packaging, and shipping. The majority of the cost, 81% of the funding, will be for the manufacturing of the protein bar flavors.

Upon successful funding of our project, we will go right to our protein bar manufacturer. The lead time for these bars is 7-10 weeks. If anything changes you will be the first to know!

In order for us to continue our mission, we are running a Indiegogo campaign. We need your help to generate funds to make it possible to continue to provide people with the best protein bars possible!

Our immediate focus will be to manufacture and provide our three flavors; Chocolate Peanut Butter, Cashew Raisin, and Chocolate Almond to our backers!

If this campaign is funded, the manufacture lead time for the protein bars will be 7-10 weeks. All protein bars will be shipped out together! We will be shipping ONLY IN U.S.!

Any questions, please make a comment or email me at outclassnutrition@gmail.com.

PLEASE SUPPORT US and THANK YOU!

story:
Short Summary

Founders:

Liam has been working in the hospitality industry for over 10 years with a wide variety of experience from fine dining, buffet service, security personnel, F+B operations, and now with one of the biggest hostel groups in the world.

Colin has 4+ years of experience in developing and maintaining dynamic web and Android applications. He has a passion and eye for design that he applies in his code.

SelecTable was born from the fact that Liam couldn’t figure out how the industry could best serve its customers in the wake of the Covid-19 restrictions handed down by the government bodies.

SelecTable’s platform provides the user with a simple yet modern user interface designed around engagement and efficient functionality. The platform will be based on an IOS and Android application supported by a web dashboard. This will give the hospitality industry a dynamic digital presence and give end-users a pre-experience of their venue before arriving. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our funding goal is €375,000.

We are offering 29% of the company.

We will spend this investment to cover further development, staff, and marketing.

Milestones we have reached Phase 1 & 2 developed. Android and web widget and admin panel are all completed and are being tested. IOS version is due for completion in July 2021.

The Impact

The hospitality industry like many others is taking a huge hit and how it bounces back is yet to be seen. Our app is a roadmap for how businesses in this industry can begin to reopen and recoup what has been lost. No one else in the industry is offering the capability to preview and select your seat just like you would at the cinema or on an airplane. This provides an industry-first marketing tool for the restaurants in addition to a pre-experience for their customers to have control over where they sit. Whether it's a 30th birthday, first date, business luncheon, or you are just picky where you sit, now you can select your table with SelecTable. 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge we have had this past year was the COVID and restrictions on the Hospitality and Tourism industry. Those are easing up now and we are ready to enter the market with a brand new and dynamic product.  Our biggest challenge going forward will be to compete in an established and volatile market post COVID. Funding will allow us to capitalise on marketing and further development to help us scale and enhance our current product offerring.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if can't contribute to our campaign, you can still contribute to the success of SelecTable. Use Indiegogo's share options to follow and share us on all your social media. The more noise the better as we will be hitting the market with a bang.

story:
About

Woerden Designs

We aim to help you create Michelin quality delicacy at home by using Woerden professional kitchenware. 

With the success of our last titanium rolling pin project, we decided to introduce the world's first solid 100% Titanium sushi plate!

We brought our prototype to a Michelin 3 star restaurant in Kyoto and they loved it!

Sushi is the first thing that comes to your mind when you think of Japanese culture. It defines the cultural milieu of Japan and the creative effort that goes into making every single roll of Sushi. 

Now, we are helping you create Michelin quality sushi at home with the world's first solid Titanium sushi plate - a single piece of solid 100% Titanium.

Our Titanium plate made my food stand out in the restaurant. Everyone who stopped by my table naturally asked about it and urged to touch and try it. It generally made the food tasty, fresh, and irresistible.

 

What's so special about Titanium?

  • Remains the original taste of any food, used extensively in high end kitchenware 
  • The most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body 
  • The only element that your body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it 
  • Excellent resistance to corrosion, nearly equivalent to platinum 
  • Named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense strength 
  • Less than half the density of steel, perfectly weighted for a quality feel
  • Durable, a true heirloom piece to last generations

CNC milled from a single piece of solid 100% titanium. Highly-polished by hand. 11*22cm (4.3*8.6 inches).

Stainless steel sushi plate gives a metallic smell and taste, wood breeds bacterials, and ceramic is brittle. Solid Titanium fixes all these problems. It preserves the original taste of food and gives perfect results every time.

Keep it in the refrigerator! Titanium is actually a good heat insulator for a metal.

The solid titanium plate can keep the perfect temperature twice as long as stainless steel. It keeps your sushi fresh and keeps the original taste and flavor.

Beveled edges and solid metal. It's easy and comfortable to hold.

A single piece of solid titanium presents your sushi in an elegant way, keeps the original taste and adds a Michelin star to your sushi.

We tried many different shapes and sizes. After choosing the perfect material (Titanium), we decided on a minimalist and modern design.

About Sushi

The origin of sushi is believed to have been during the second century A.D. in Southeast Asia because of the need to keep meat fresh without refrigeration. They would cure meat and fish and wrap it in rice to preserve its freshness. 

The idea eventually spread through China and then to Japan, where fish is a food staple. The Japanese would ferment their cured-fish-and-rice sushi with Japanese rice wine, or sake.

About ten centuries later, people started adding vinegar to their sushi to aid in the fermentation process. In the past 20 years, as sushi is being recognized as a healthy alternative, sushi restaurants have flourished in the United States. To qualify as a sushi chef, you need 10 years of apprentice training. Sushi is a symbol of Japanese craftsmanship.

Pledge now and help us bring this world's first solid 100% Titanium sushi plate to life! Get your Titanium sushi plate, and add a Michelin star to your sushi.

Thank you to BackerPoints for supporting our campaign, they are awesome!

Risks & Challenges

Our Indiegogo project: Woerden solid titanium rolling pin has been shipped out more than one month earlier than we expected. We have a good and stable cooperation with one factory who always manages to finish the production on time with high quality. We have the sample already. 
Hopefully, when we succeed with the help and support of you all, we can start the mass production and you will receive your world's first solid Titanium sushi plate on schedule!

Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ

story:
Kara’s Organic Chimichurri – Delicious & Wholesome

Whether you are looking for something healthy to snack on or something savory to satisfy your cravings, you can serve up Kara’s Chimi Chimi anywhere. A knockout at parties, chimichurri is the perfect sauce that you probably have never tried yourself.  Originating from Argentina, chimichurri is made from parsley, garlic, vinegar, and other natural ingredients. Chimichurri is widely known for marinating meats and serving alongside meat dishes. Kara’s Chimi Chimi brings meat dishes to life and can be used for dipping chips and vegetables too. It can also be served as a spread or a condiment on tacos, salads, sandwiches and so much more. 

Tired of the same old sauces giving your foods the same old flavors? We were too, and that was why we set out to make something different, our very own chimichurri that we could use as a universal sauce.

What makes our Chimichurri different?

Unlike most Chimichurris you find at stores, Kara's Chimi Chimi is 

  • Refrigerated
  • Organic 
  • Creamy (dairy free!)

A zesty and garlic-y compliment to all of your grilled meats, sandwiches, dips.

Introducing: Kara's Chimi Chimi

The story is a familiar one that moms across the world can relate to. Armed with a passion for good food and natural ingredients and most importantly 3 picky eaters, Jean set out to make a chimichurri sauce; with a twist.

Her daughters who began eating her cheese sticks, vegetables, pita chips dipped in this sauce loved it so much she put some into containers to give to her friends to help them also eat their vegetables.

And so Kara’s Chimi Chimi was born.

Following her daughter's creativity, Jean in addition to serving her own unique blend of all natural ingredients as a condiment to grilled meats, started making sandwiches, salads, tacos, eggs - pretty much anything that benefited from a flavor kick - to her friends and their kids with such an enormous response she decided to begin sharing this with the rest of the world.

Currently carried in local small markets and butcheries but can be ordered online.  Hopefully will be in a grocery store near you.

Certified Organic

We have gone through the extra steps in order for Kara's Chimi Chimi to be USDA Certified Organic.  So if you like to know where your food is coming from and what standard the ingredients are held to, you can have the utmost confidence when enjoying this sauce. You never have to feel like you are going into the kitchen (or the grocery store) blind again, every container of Kara's Chimi Chimi carries the USDA Certified Organic seal so you know that we're using the best ingredients.

Vegan, Kosher, Halal, Keto-Friendly

Not only is Kara’s Chimi Chimi superior in taste and texture, it is also meets all the dietary requirements above…jam packed with so much goodness!

You can enjoy it on anything – without worrying that you are crossing any of your own personal boundaries.

Non-GMO

Of course, this would go without saying, USDA Organic Certified also means Non-GMO. From the start, we have wanted this sauce to stand for quality and the values that we seek out in food ourselves.

Gluten-Free & Dairy-Free

Even though our Chimichurri is creamy, it is completely dairy free and gluten free so you can rest assured that you can fearlessly enjoy. 

Made to Share

Each container of Kara's Chimi Chimi features a wide mouth, making dipping and sharing easy. On the go, in the office, or at home with your loved ones, Kara's Chimi Chimi is just the sauce that you want to have stocked in your fridge, something that everyone can enjoy together – totally guilt-free! 

What We Need & What You Get

Right now, we are turning to you to help raise funds to manufacture, market, and distribute Kara's Chimi Chimi on a larger scale.

We've made great strides in the last few months but still need some help to get the word out.

Our goal through this campaign is to raise $5,000 to cover costs that we are facing as we take this special sauce and bring it to the Organic foods world.  One of the greatest challenges that we currently looking to solve is getting it into retail outlets so it's easily available for pick up anytime.

To show our appreciation for all your support, we are honored to offer special discounts to Kara's Chimi Chimi exclusively through this campaign.

An Entrepreneurial Dream -The Female Trio


 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please let all your friends and family know what Kara's Chimi Chimi is. We want to spread the word about this sauce far and wide, and we know that social media is the way to do that.

Please follow us at

https://www.facebook.com/karaschimichimi

https://www.instagram.com/karaschimichimi

https://www.amazon.com/Organic-Chimichurri-Cert...

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about our plans.

Risks and challenges

Anytime you launch a food product, safety is the number-one concern, we are working with reputable kitchens and manufacturers for the production of Kara's Chimi Chimi. We will work hard to keep the standard of quality high even as we scale up. If any other logistical challenges arise during the manufacturing and distribution processes, we will figure out a way to innovate and move forward all the while keeping our contributors updated regarding our progress.
story_txt:
Kara’s Organic Chimichurri – Delicious & Wholesome
Whether you are looking for something healthy to snack on or something savory to satisfy your cravings, you can serve up Kara’s Chimi Chimi anywhere. A knockout at parties, chimichurri is the perfect sauce that you probably have never tried yourself.  Originating from Argentina, chimichurri is made from parsley, garlic, vinegar, and other natural ingredients. Chimichurri is widely known for marinating meats and serving alongside meat dishes. Kara’s Chimi Chimi brings meat dishes to life and can be used for dipping chips and vegetables too. It can also be served as a spread or a condiment on tacos, salads, sandwiches and so much more. 
Tired of the same old sauces giving your foods the same old flavors? We were too, and that was why we set out to make something different, our very own chimichurri that we could use as a universal sauce.
What makes our Chimichurri different?
Unlike most Chimichurris you find at stores, Kara's Chimi Chimi is 

Refrigerated
Organic 
Creamy (dairy free!)

A zesty and garlic-y compliment to all of your grilled meats, sandwiches, dips.
Introducing: Kara's Chimi Chimi
The story is a familiar one that moms across the world can relate to. Armed with a passion for good food and natural ingredients and most importantly 3 picky eaters, Jean set out to make a chimichurri sauce; with a twist.
Her daughters who began eating her cheese sticks, vegetables, pita chips dipped in this sauce loved it so much she put some into containers to give to her friends to help them also eat their vegetables.
And so Kara’s Chimi Chimi was born.
Following her daughter's creativity, Jean in addition to serving her own unique blend of all natural ingredients as a condiment to grilled meats, started making sandwiches, salads, tacos, eggs - pretty much anything that benefited from a flavor kick - to her friends and their kids with such an enormous response she decided to begin sharing this with the rest of the world.
Currently carried in local small markets and butcheries but can be ordered online.  Hopefully will be in a grocery store near you.
Certified Organic
We have gone through the extra steps in order for Kara's Chimi Chimi to be USDA Certified Organic.  So if you like to know where your food is coming from and what standard the ingredients are held to, you can have the utmost confidence when enjoying this sauce. You never have to feel like you are going into the kitchen (or the grocery store) blind again, every container of Kara's Chimi Chimi carries the USDA Certified Organic seal so you know that we're using the best ingredients.
Vegan, Kosher, Halal, Keto-Friendly
Not only is Kara’s Chimi Chimi superior in taste and texture, it is also meets all the dietary requirements above…jam packed with so much goodness!
You can enjoy it on anything – without worrying that you are crossing any of your own personal boundaries.
Non-GMO
Of course, this would go without saying, USDA Organic Certified also means Non-GMO. From the start, we have wanted this sauce to stand for quality and the values that we seek out in food ourselves.
Gluten-Free & Dairy-Free
Even though our Chimichurri is creamy, it is completely dairy free and gluten free so you can rest assured that you can fearlessly enjoy. 
Made to Share
Each container of Kara's Chimi Chimi features a wide mouth, making dipping and sharing easy. On the go, in the office, or at home with your loved ones, Kara's Chimi Chimi is just the sauce that you want to have stocked in your fridge, something that everyone can enjoy together – totally guilt-free! 

What We Need & What You Get
Right now, we are turning to you to help raise funds to manufacture, market, and distribute Kara's Chimi Chimi on a larger scale.
We've made great strides in the last few months but still need some help to get the word out.
Our goal through this campaign is to raise $5,000 to cover costs that we are facing as we take this special sauce and bring it to the Organic foods world.  One of the greatest challenges that we currently looking to solve is getting it into retail outlets so it's easily available for pick up anytime.
To show our appreciation for all your support, we are honored to offer special discounts to Kara's Chimi Chimi exclusively through this campaign.
An Entrepreneurial Dream -The Female Trio

Please let all your friends and family know what Kara's Chimi Chimi is. We want to spread the word about this sauce far and wide, and we know that social media is the way to do that.
