story:
The Project X Wine Experiment

This is a collaboration of a team of young and upcoming winemakers that are currently under the tutelege of the most renowned winemakers in Napa Valley.  We are fulfilling a vision to make the biggest and boldest Cabernet Sauvignon of the 2014 harvest.

The fruit is from the Rutherford region of Napa Valley, widely regarded as the most desirable Cabernet grapes in California.  The 2010 Cabernet from this estate currently sells for $125 per bottle.  

You too can be part of this rogue winemaking team.

By supporting our project you become a member of the team too.  Watch the lifecycle of a fine wine being made through:

  • Personal blog updates about the progress of the wine as it moves from the vine to the bottle.
  • Lab analysis results and what they mean about the wine and its character.
  • Get your name on the label and share your own Rutherford Cabernet with your friends!
The Value

With an average packaged production cost of around $25 per bottle this could possibly be the best Napa Valley wine value of the 2014 harvest.

The Skinny

We're doing this for fun, and we want our partners to have fun too.  Get involved, have some fun, and drink some damn fine wine along the way.

story:
Hello All…..

My name is Kiauna Terrell and I am a Personal Chef/ Caterer and food truck owner from Washington, DC. Food has always been my passion and I have been blessed to make it my career. I spent a lot of time with my grandmother who had a catering business for over 30 years. As a child growing up I was exposed to many different types of food and it was heaven!!! I knew since I was 5 years old what I wanted to do when I grew up. Rather than going outside to play I would sit on the kitchen floor at the door waiting for my Grandmother to ask me to help. As I got older I was able to go on catering jobs …I can remember watching the peoples pleasurable reactions while eating my Grandmothers food and thinking to myself "If only I can be half as good as her and bring smiles to peoples faces through food". After years of hard work, blood, sweat, and tears I have been able to live my dream and feed many people and watch that same reaction time and time again!!! I now have 20 years of catering/food experience under my belt and am learning and loving this business more and more each day.

Ever think about investing in a small town on the rise? Rocky Mount NC, has a lot of history and charm and some amazing properties that are ready to be bought!!!! The construction for The Rocky Mount Event Center is underway and it is unlike any event center in Eastern NC.(As televised on HBO's Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel) The 160,000 square foot facility costs $36and a half million dollars to build and is going up in part of the downtown undergoing a revitalization. The city manager says once open it will bring an economic impact to the city of about $264 million dollars in the next 10 years. Along with the revitalization of Down Town Rocky Mount, these two big projects are going to bring in new residents and visitors alike…….And I want to get in on the ground and be apart of the growth!!!

About a year ago I moved from Washington, DC with my two pups and my Food Truck for a new start in this charming little town and fell in love. Upon doing some research I learned that one of the biggest sports centers in Eastern NC has started construction and is set to open in 2018. This huge project is going to bring in visitors from all over along with plenty of revenue and jobs to this town and I want to be apart of it. The new center is being built a few blocks from downtown Rocky Mount on Main St. and the buildings are dirt cheap!!! I came across this empty lot in the center of Main St. and immediately a light bulb went off and my creative juices started flowing!! This would be the perfect spot for an Alfresco Wine/Beer and Food Garden. Picture this…… A beautiful outdoor space with plenty of fresh flowers and greenery some cool quirky seating a pleather a of local beers and wine and of course the savory sweet smells coming from Sassy Sandwiches Food Truck….A perfect gathering space for the community after work, on the weekends and it could also be rented out for special occasions…And of course, it will be dog-friendly!!! There is nothing like this in Rocky Mount and I would be the first to bring this amazing concept to town!! 

 

The city of Rocky Mount is giving business owners many incentives to build and bring their businesses to the Down Town area. The lot that I found is $35,000. This 2,396 sq. ft. lot sits between 2 existing buildings. The construction of this project will consist of building a back wall along with large wood/steel sky beams, A floor, and a High front security gate. Sassy Sandwiches would be located towards the back and next to it a manufactured building for storage and prep work with plumbing and electricity. A second manufactured building will hold a unisex restroom with plumbing and electricity. I would need to install year-round seating and tables and of course, no garden is complete without beautiful greenery landscape and flowers. This will be a simple yet very inviting cool space for the community and a contributing factor to the revitalization of Down Town Rocky Mount. I have been looking for the perfect spot for my food truck, And this is it!!! I can't wait to share my talents with this community and help bring Rocky Mount back to the once vibrant town it use to be. 

Thank you so much for your consideration in helping my dream come true!!!

 

Risks and challenges

There are definitely risks and challenges that come with starting any business and I do expect to have a few. But I have done all of my homework. I have my builders and contractors in place, My food truck is fully licensed and I am in the process of obtaining my liquor license. All I need is this lot and some financial back up to make this project a dream come true and a huge success.

story:
Who Are We:

The Kate’s Chocolate idea has come from a short film produced in 2016 by Martin Pennell and Len Evans. From this we both decided to take it to the next level after we discovered there was an abundant market for this type of product.

 

Our Campaign:

Our aim is to produce a chocolate brand that is suitable for anyone including Vegetarians, Vegans and Diabetics. We have found that there is not much alternative choices available and have the passion to cater for the select clientele. We also aim to set up a foundation where a percentage of the profits will go to charitable causes.

What we need:

Campaign Goal: £35,000 contributions will get:

  • Produce the chocolate in small batches
  • Create the Kate’s Chocolates Brand with merchandise
  • Marketing and Advertising costs
  • Pay fees for production and trade shows (VIP & Press Launch, Public Launch and Chocolate Conventions)

Once we have reached our goal from the first campaign we aim to raise awareness of the brand and will continue to grow the business.

We have begun to receive orders and are now in discussion of productions, that's why we need your help to make this moment happen.

The Impact:

With health risks at an all time high, Kate’s Chocolates is offering an alternative way of enjoyment, that is not only sugar-free but guilt free. As Diabetes is one of the main culprits and is rapidly growing in our society, this is a prime opportunity to tackle the market.

 

By spreading the word about Kate’s Chocolates, you can help too by sending it to everyone you know.

story:
After 8 years in the humanitarian field mostly in African countries, I decided to return to Greece - my home country - and set up a new green business. At first, I envisioned a normal juice bar, inside a store, but the costs were too high and the bureaucracy prohibiting. 

 

Juice Bike - a bike with a juice cart - will be stationed in two strategic locations to start with, such as the busy Acropolis and Monastiraki areas. The cart will use a solar panel to provide energy for the juicers. Fresh Juices and fruits salads will be prepared on the spot and will be offered to tourists and passers-by. Also on offer will be tea, traditional Turkish-Greek coffee, and modern Greek Cold Frappe . My aim is to provide healthy alternatives in the busy lifestyles of Athenians, helping their cells grow and their systems fight off disease. 

 

If Juice Bike proves a success, I will expand it by placing juice bikes in more central Athenian locations and by franchising the idea to other areas of Greece, helping young people to escape unemployment. After years in countries suffering from war and poverty, I believe entrepreneurship is the most promising way forward. 

 

Progress: 

At the moment, I am in the process of  securing a permission from the local authorities so the bikes can legally be stationed in a central area near Acropolis or Monastiraki. So far I have communicated with the manufacturer of the bike cart, the local authorities of the Town Hall of Athens, machine suppliers and fruit suppliers. 

With your help, the funds raised will be used for the construction of the two bikes (€12,000); buying the proper equipment/machinery (€8,000 ), and arranging the legal paperwork and permissions needed, included "rent" for the street spot  (€5,000). The remaining (€5,000) will be used for marketing the idea and for the supply of fresh daily produce. 

My vision is to help Athens turn more 'green', but I also want to assist young people around the country by giving them the opportunity to own a Juice Bike wherever they are. The country is struggling with a high rate of unemployment and I think ideas like these can prove important.

story:
eat:em bar

We've developed a natural, tasty and healthy cricket bar. The recipe is simple: crickets, cocoa beans, cashews, almonds, dates and coconut oil. We now need your help with funding for the first batch. We promise to deliver an honest bar with a great purpose. Back us!

3 reasons to eat crickets

1. Crickets are efficient protein factories

 

Crickets need a very small area to grow. This makes them easy to include in already existing agriculture. It is also possible to feed them plants that are not sold to humans because of their blemishes. Crickets are also over 10x more efficient than cattle when it comes to converting feed into protein.

2. Crickets don't eat sprayed food

A lot of the food we eat everyday are being sprayed with chemicals. The food our crickets eat are not sprayed with insecticides because that would kill them. Crickets therefore contains less toxins than most of the vegetables we eat.

Well then, what does crickets eat? Non-sprayed carrots, ecological food waste and other vegetables. So fresh!

3. Crickets are like meat - without being like meat

 

Crickets are rich in protein, iron, zinc, vitamin b12, magnesium and calcium - exactly as meat. These are minerals and vitamins you need to feel good and stay healthy. But the best part is that eating crickets doesn't have the same drawbacks as red meat, which increases the risk of cancer and cardiovascular disease.

Ingredients

Risks and challenges

Our main challenges is to grow and develop products without outside investors. We believe that independence is crucial for us in order to be focus on sustainability and health over profits. This  campaign is very important for our future independence.

We are certain that we will be able to deliver bars if the campaign is successful. The recipe is ready, production is ready. We just need help with funds for the first batch.

Rewards

Bar (45g)

T-shirt

story:
Do you know that about 500 billion disposable cups are used around the world every year while, on average, it takes only 15 minutes to drink a coffee? However, these 15 minutes of holding a cup of coffee in your hand are extremely costly since they require large quantities of raw materials, crude oil, wood, water, energy etc. All of these are needed for production of a disposable cup. What is more, the energy used to produce these billions of cups contributes to global warming. In the end, after these 15 minutes, the coffee cup ends up in garbage and pollutes the environment.
 

 

 

It cannot continue like that. Something has to be done.

We all understand that replacing disposable cups with reusable ones is of paramount importance for our future. However, reusable cups are usually oversized and quite hard to fit into your purse or backpack.

I committed myself to the idea of finding a solution that would be sustainable and eco-friendly and at the same time stylish, comfortable and space-saving. And here it is: we-kupp! I want people to experience the wonderful feeling of joy over their decision to preserve our planet’s resources simply by choosing to use our beautiful cup and our stylish coffee cup sleeve (transport case).

 

 

I truly believe that every single person can change the world for better by making the right decisions. Each of us can invent, achieve, create and support something special and extraordinary! Together, we can make our planet a better place to live in!

 

 

With the help of a new sealing technology, we have succeeded in developing a telescopic, collapsible drinking cup made of stainless steel. In addition to this and due to a new safety technology, it cannot collapse inadvertently while you drink.
 

As a highlight, we have developed an innovative and beautifully designed transport case for stowing the cup away when collapsed. At the same time, the transport case serves as a thermo-insulating heat sleeve for the cup when expanded and ready for use.

Patents and trademark pending.

 

 

First we decided to raise money for the final optimization and improvement of the prototype. Only when we are convinced that the prototype meets the highest requirements we want to bring it on the market. In this phase we need your support very much. It depends on you whether we continue with we-kupp and whether we-kupp appears on the market.

We have to put a higher price on our cup and set a high funding goal to keep our backers from being disappointed. Our goal is to produce we-kupp cups in batches while providing affordable pricing on our product.

All crowdfunding line cups will have a special sign engraved on them distinguishing its owner for making it possible for we-kupp to be produced!

Besides, more and more coffee shop chains are opting for sustainability and will reward you with a discount if you bring your own reusable cup (in Austria and Germany, you will get a 50-euro-cent discount (approx. USD 0.55) per beverage). The purchase of a we-kupp cup will therefore pay off in a few months.

 

 

When collapsed, the cup is just 1.06 inch high (27 mm) and 1.2 inch high with the lid on (30 mm).

When expanded, the cup is 4.37 inch high (11,1 cm). This version holds 12 fl. oz (355 ml).

 

 

In addition, we have developed an innovative coffee cup sleeve (transport case) for coffee cups which can also be used for other reusable and disposable cups. It protects the hands from both heat and cold in cases of warm or cold drinks. Moreover it's very pleasant to touch due to special materials. The sleeve has been designed in a minimalistic style and is available in different colours. Because of its small size you can always take it with you. It contains an additional compartment for various cards, which you can always use when ordering. The sleeve is reusable and durable, which means that the number of paper sleeves for disposable cups can be significantly reduced.

 

 

If you are on the go and can’t clean your cup right away, simply shake out the rest of your beverage, collapse the cup, put the lid on and store it in the transport case. When at home, you can wash your cup either by hand or in a dishwasher - just extend it before you do it. This means that the cleaning procedure is no different from the one you usually go through to wash dishes.

 

 

 

Disposable cups: Their production is resource-consuming; moreover, all the resources used for the production end up polluting the environment. They can hardly be recycled. Sooner or later, policy makers will enforce a ban on disposable products made of plastic. Disposable cups will be driven out of the market permanently. Consequently, more and more people are starting to overthink their consumption habits.

Production: The production of disposable cups is resource-consuming and requires large quantities of raw materials, crude oil, wood, water, energy etc. To produce 16 billion paper coffee cups, 4 billion gallons of water are used and 6.5 million trees are cut down.

Disposal: Less than 1% of the disposable cups produced can be recycled. The rest are sent to landfills, incinerated, or pollute the environment. Disposable paper cups contain 5% polyurethane plastic which helps prevent leaking. This makes composting and recycling of disposable cups extremely difficult because it is a mixed material and not 100 % paper.

Use: The use of some types of disposable cups may have a negative impact on human health.

Other collapsible cups: On the one hand, the range of collapsible cups is not wide at all. On the other hand, the quality of the existing cups made of stainless steel is barely satisfactory, and they aren’t really suitable for hot beverages because they are not leak-proof and may collapse accidently when used for drinking. Moreover, none of the existing cups is properly heat-insulated to protect your hands.

Reusable cups: Other reusable cups won’t catch on as they are cumbersome and not really space-saving which makes it uncomfortable to carry them around once you’ve finished your beverage.

Deposit-refund systems: Deposit-refund systems are difficult to implement widely; at best, they can be implemented regionally. No standardized concept is possible.

 

 

we-kupp is not only sustainable and eco-friendly but also stylish, comfortable and compact. We committed ourselves to the development of a cup that would be an eco-friendly alternative to disposable coffee cups, on the one hand, and would impress with its distinctive lines and modern design, on the other hand. We want people to experience joy over owning an innovative cup with a perfectly matched stylish transport case that would fit in a backpack, in a purse or even in a pocket.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges:

We have worked on the development of our product for more than three years. During this time, we invested considerable time and effort, financial resources and personal commitment. Our prototypes were developed in cooperation with experts and engineers and went through several testing stages. We urgently need your help and support for final optimization of our cup.

The fact that we-kupp is an innovative and entirely novel product is both its strength and weakness, and accounts for all the risks that are usually involved in the development and production of such inventions.

Final prototyp optimization is a complex process and involves many people, resources and tools. We ensure transparency for our backers and are willing to communicate with them when necessary.

In terms of the final prototyp optimization of we-kupp cups, we have additional massive challenges ahead of us due to the worldwide outbreak of the COVID-19 pandemic. We have to take into account delays in all the processes and appreciate your patience should it come to unplanned delays.

First we decided to raise money for the final optimization and improvement of the prototype. Only when we are convinced that the prototype meets the highest requirements we want to bring it on the market. In this phase we need your support very much. It depends on you whether we continue with we-kupp and whether we-kupp appears on the market.

Only if the prototype optimization is successful, we can manufacture we-kupp. The more you support us financially, the higher the probability of successful series production of we-kupp and the delivery to you.
story_txt:
Do you know that about 500 billion disposable cups are used around the world every year while, on average, it takes only 15 minutes to drink a coffee? However, these 15 minutes of holding a cup of coffee in your hand are extremely costly since they require large quantities of raw materials, crude oil, wood, water, energy etc. All of these are needed for production of a disposable cup. What is more, the energy used to produce these billions of cups contributes to global warming. In the end, after these 15 minutes, the coffee cup ends up in garbage and pollutes the environment.
 



 


 
It cannot continue like that. Something has to be done.
We all understand that replacing disposable cups with reusable ones is of paramount importance for our future. However, reusable cups are usually oversized and quite hard to fit into your purse or backpack.
I committed myself to the idea of finding a solution that would be sustainable and eco-friendly and at the same time stylish, comfortable and space-saving. And here it is: we-kupp! I want people to experience the wonderful feeling of joy over their decision to preserve our planet’s resources simply by choosing to use our beautiful cup and our stylish coffee cup sleeve (transport case).
 

 
I truly believe that every single person can change the world for better by making the right decisions. Each of us can invent, achieve, create and support something special and extraordinary! Together, we can make our planet a better place to live in!
 


 

With the help of a new sealing technology, we have succeeded in developing a telescopic, collapsible drinking cup made of stainless steel. In addition to this and due to a new safety technology, it cannot collapse inadvertently while you drink.
 
As a highlight, we have developed an innovative and beautifully designed transport case for stowing the cup away when collapsed. At the same time, the transport case serves as a thermo-insulating heat sleeve for the cup when expanded and ready for use.
Patents and trademark pending.
 

 
First we decided to raise money for the final optimization and improvement of the prototype. Only when we are convinced that the prototype meets the highest requirements we want to bring it on the market. In this phase we need your support very much. It depends on you whether we continue with we-kupp and whether we-kupp appears on the market.
We have to put a higher price on our cup and set a high funding goal to keep our backers from being disappointed. Our goal is to produce we-kupp cups in batches while providing affordable pricing on our product.
All crowdfunding line cups will have a special sign engraved on them distinguishing its owner for making it possible for we-kupp to be produced!
Besides, more and more coffee shop chains are opting for sustainability and will reward you with a discount if you bring your own reusable cup (in Austria and Germany, you will get a 50-euro-cent discount (approx. USD 0.55) per beverage). The purchase of a we-kupp cup will therefore pay off in a few months.
 

 

When collapsed, the cup is just 1.06 inch high (27 mm) and 1.2 inch high with the lid on (30 mm).
When expanded, the cup is 4.37 inch high (11,1 cm). This version holds 12 fl. oz (355 ml).
 



 
In addition, we have developed an innovative coffee cup sleeve (transport case) for coffee cups which can also be used for other reusable and disposable cups. It protects the hands from both heat and cold in cases of warm or cold drinks. Moreover it's very pleasant to touch due to special materials. When at home, you can wash your cup either by hand or in a dishwasher - just extend it before you do it. This means that the cleaning procedure is no different from the one you usually go through to wash dishes.

story:
You Asked For It

This campaign was requested by our customers. They want more bars. So this campaign will make it happen - or not. It's up to you.

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding to produce, label and ship the bars to the distributor. From there we need postage to ship them.

Why This Campaign Is Important

We are the only truly Keto bar that will not spike your insulin. Other bars may have Keto on the label but they aren't Keto.

Risks & Challenges

The only risk is that we do not get funded in which case your money will be refunded by Indiegogo.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't buy a box of bars, you can contribute something anyway to help make it happen.

story:
Pancho Bigotes Salsa is going to change the World.  Once you taste it, you will agree.  Soon, Pancho Bigotes Salsa will find a place on your breakfast, lunch and dinner table.  It goes great with tacos, chips, sandwiches and just about any entree.

The recipe for Pancho Bigotes Salsa is a closely guarded secret.  Originally conceived in the beautiful city of San Luis Potosi, Mexico, it quickly assumed prominence as a regional favorite.  One short year ago, we decided to bring this recipe to the United States.  The reception has been fantastic and we have many good problems.  Our primary reason for crowdfunding is to raise capital for marketing and other operations.

story:
Overview

I create this campaign with all my hope that i would find angels that will help me to start my dream project:

Hi my name is Achraf i'm glad to introduce myself to you ...

Not like other childrens ! i have spend my childhood with difficulty because my family is poor but anyway this is one of my motivations, to save myself my family and my environment,i have always wish to help others will all my power, helping others gives you positive energy it's very beautiful to see someone happy because of you, anyway i try to help myself first to help others.

I have left the school for financial reasons i'm 19 y.o, i decided to start my project to save my life before it's late, and to go back to school i have real intention and energy to change my life and help me family i need little to start!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Let me explain my business what it is:

500€ is my goal ! I'm not intend to gain real money from the good people, i asked help for capital and this five hundred is enough for me to start, there is others needs help more than me.

With all my humility, i'm good marketer i have worked on E-commerce for a while i'm really have magical touch on Marekting, it's sourced from my little experience on my work

200€ to buy two used motorcycle for delivery / 100€ to start the first promote campaigns / 100€ to fulfill the first orders.

The Impact

Your contribution will make great difference, i will never stop until i start this business and make it bigger, your investment will not be in vain:

With this project i'm plenty sure that i will turn my business into big company of this category service,and i intent to make great delivery and employees team based on youth energies i have intent to hire many youngs that needs help their families and themselves like me right now, just imagine that your contribute will make all of this.

I already worked with delivery services it's glad to make the daily needs near to someone busy!

With the good investment and planing, i'm plenty sure that i will make from this five hundred dollar a great business.

Note: i have already build website for my project https://sokhraa.com .

Risks & Challenges

The only problem that i have is financial support.

I already have some money inside to invest it, i'm help my father for my family needs that's why i have this problem but i'm very sure that i will never stop until start my project i don't know something called "Failure".

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that many of you have kind heart and will love my story but i also know that not all can help me, anyhow if you share my campaign it's will be good help for me you will be reason at latest for 10 persons that will see my story.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
I've been running a company that sells Taiwanese tea for six years and people have always asked me: “Why don’t you sell teaware along with the tea?” My answer: I would love to, but only if I can stay true to my company’s philosophy by visiting with the craftsmen in Taiwan and working together with them to create a custom set for Everlasting Teas. I wasn't just going to sell commonplace, wholesale sets. Granted, there's money to be made in that, but no uniqueness. 

So after years of searching and waiting, I finally connected with the perfect pottery house to create our Alpha Series when I was in Taiwan last spring. They have over 40 years of curating clays in Taiwan and we've worked together over the past 11 months to get to this point.  We've already produced and sold our first batch and now are ready for production for our second batch.

It's not uncommon these days to see people at their desk drinking tea, but it is rare to find them drinking loose leaf tea. Usually, they resort to a tea bag so they don't have to go through some complicated process with all sorts of steeping contraptions that create a mess. There’s a need for functional loose leaf teaware that actually looks good, can find a home on the workdesk, and be used for daily steeping.

So we did it: created a tea pot that ACTUALLY LOOKS GOOD, and is functional for work or home. Then, we made sure it was fit for the solo experience, yet adaptable for a shared experience. Finally, we wanted it to feel authentic, like a new beginning—so the name ALPHA was born.

KEEP IT LOOSE LEAF

Why settle for tea bags? (which are usually the dust that falls from the actual leaves being sifted). We drink loose leaf to get the full experience of what it means to drink tea. Tea farmers put countless hours and dedication into crafting a specific type of tea. To appreciate their labors, you gotta drink loose leaf. Experience the full aromas by letting the tea expand in your pot. Experience the strength of the leaves by steeping over and over again. Experience the beauty of watching the leaves unfurl. We believe that our Alpha Series is the perfect set for brewing loose leaf, and can be used by beginners and connoisseurs alike

 

If we wanted this piece to speak to both the novice and connoisseur and have it fully functional in the workspace, it needed to be one piece, which means no lid (I've seen a lot of lids break in my day when it gets busy). We also needed the person brewing the tea to be able to pour tea out of the pot without it becoming unbearably hot. Usually pots have some sort of bamboo piece attached to the pot so your hand does not get too hot. But because we wanted to use only clay and didn't want a handle on the pot, we flared the rim on the top so that extreme heat would not make it up to where your hand is resting. In conjunction with the flared rim, we placed the spout lower than the top of the pot, which does two things:

1. It prevents the pour from traveling close to the rim and thus keeps the heat lower than your hand. 

2. It allows you to know how much water to pour into the pot. Once you see water start to fill the spout, that is when you stop pouring. 

The Alpha design is also suitable for those who do not want to lose any heat during the infusion. We didn't want the hassle of a lid, especially in the workplace, so this is our version of a functional way to have a lid without a lid!  It works with both the Alpha Mug and the Alpha Pitcher.

Western culture likes mugs, but to be honest, I don't like most mugs very much. So if I was going to create a mug, it had to be one that I actually liked. So I came up with some ideas and ran them by my friends. These were our conclusions: medium size, just enough to hold a brew of tea, but small enough that I could actually steep another brew or two before ending my tea session.

Why The Pitcher?

When brewing tea in Taiwan, pitchers are always used when sharing tea. After the tea has been infused, since you will be using small share cups, you first need to decant the tea from the pot into the pitcher. Then with the pitcher, you will pour the necessary amount into the cups you are using to share. 

After designing the pot, it was easy to design the pitcher because we wanted them to be similar in look and size. The flare and the main body would look the same, so we just needed to design how it poured. We decided on just a slightly shallower indent in the clay for the pour than what you would normally see. We like this because it reminds us of water flowing from a waterfall.

The Alpha Share cups keep the same body shape as the rest of the series and although they are simple, they are well-balanced and great to hold.

The Alpha Legend pot was made with the serious connoisseur and pot collector in mind. We wanted to create a high-end pot that still kept the features of our Alpha Series (spout shape from the Alpha pot and handle style from the Alpha mug.  Because it's made for the collector, we wanted to do only a limited run of 100 of these.  

Clay Type - Taiwanese Stoneware - there is NO heavy metal leaching in the clay we use, and no toxins used in the process, so rest assured! 

Alpha pot - 200 ml filled to spout 

Alpha Share cup - 40ml 

Alpha Legend pot - 180 ml

We only ship to the United States.  Shipping price range will be $12 -$20, depending on which set you choose.  Because the fragile nature of clay, we need to ensure the packaging is sent as quickly and safely as possible. 

You should expect to receive your Alpha Set by Christmas.  The pottery house in Taiwan is awaiting our GO for the second round of production!

Our Indiegogo campaign ends on November 8th

Production will begin November 9th 

Shipments will arrive by air to New York December 10th.

Shipments will ship to customers December 13th.

With such a tight window to make a Christmas shipment, we can't predict if any obstacles will come our way, especially since we are dealing with crafting clay by hand.  We will update everyone accordingly if anything changes to the Christmas timeline.

story: !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Short Summary

Dig The Roots is the small company that my friend and I created. We started with selling our creations on the street to local customers. All started after I moved from Germany to the US and found out that there is no snack besides fresh fruit that I can eat. Through a metabolic disease called HPU (inherited) I'm unable to eat foods that contain Dairy, Gluten and Histamine. So I decided to create a snack which is not only delicious and allergy friendly but also enjoyable for everyone. 

The snacks are based on organic oats with different fruits, vegetables and organic sweetener.

Through this metabolic issue I was challenged to find new ways not only for cooking but as well for dealing with difficulties that emerge not being able to eat outside in a restaurant or café. And because I'm not the guy who sits cries and complains, I decided to do something about this uncommon problem. So I spend many hours in the kitchen creating this snack and to find the perfect consistence and taste. 

Through my love of cooking ( I cook every day and every meal) it was able for me to gather a lot of knowledge about foods which are free of gluten, dairy and histamine. Through that practice I was able to find ways to make these foods taste with only a few options. 

Additionally I want to make aware of this metabolic disease, give people with allergies the chance of enjoying foods delicious and allergy friendly. And I want to create employment not only through the Café but also with local farmers and crafters. With your help and my friend I want to create a space where you can eat, talk to friends or just enjoy a delicious snack with a cup of coffee. 

You can help to create the first Café that is Vegan, Gluten free and Histamine free. 

What We Need & What You Get

So my friends here it is, we need $17500 to build this beautiful Café in Los Angeles. With our own money and your help we are on a good way to our first location, the funds will be used to buy commercial kitchen equipment. An oven, dishwasher, cooler, kitchen supplies and dishes. We want to keep the cost low through hard work and doing as much as possible on our own and upcycling old furniture that will be used as café inventory. 

We have many different perks you can choose from. Starting at one free meal to some great Dig The Roots t-shirts and sweaters. We also offer you a booklet for allergy friendly cooking with different recipes. One year free food at our Café and a snack box send to your home every month for 12 months.

The Impact

When this project is up and running we will have opened the first HPU friendly Café. That processes not only organic foods but is also free of any type of additives, chemicals and unnatural flavors. Our mission includes to explore the foods that humans ate centuries ago but in a delicious and modern way. We want to support the thought of eating Vegan, Gluten free and Histamine free, not only for the lifestyle but for the need. 

Additionally we will set up a online store where you can purchase these snacks if your not living near LA. So everyone in this great country can enjoy them. 

Risks & Challenges

Our challenge is to get the Café idea to real life as it lives on paper. Every product is already finished, recipes are fixed. 

If something goes wrong and we need a little extra cash, we calculated a buffer and if that is still not enough, we will use our proven problem solving skills, hard work and dedication to get this project up and running. 

After I founded two small businesses in Germany (Film production and Clothing), I learned a lot and know what is important and how to get to an excellent result. My friend grew up building and working in a family owned restaurant so her knowledge combined with my work experience from working for 3 years in a restaurant and Bar helps us be aware of  difficulties and obstacles that we could come across.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate monetarily you can still lend a hand. By simply passing this campaign on to your friends and family you are helping us considerably. Thank you!!
story_txt:
Short Summary
Dig The Roots is the small company that my friend and I created. We started with selling our creations on the street to local customers. All started after I moved from Germany to the US and found out that there is no snack besides fresh fruit that I can eat. Through a metabolic disease called HPU (inherited) I'm unable to eat foods that contain Dairy, Gluten and Histamine. So I decided to create a snack which is not only delicious and allergy friendly but also enjoyable for everyone. 
The snacks are based on organic oats with different fruits, vegetables and organic sweetener.
Through this metabolic issue I was challenged to find new ways not only for cooking but as well for dealing with difficulties that emerge not being able to eat outside in a restaurant or café. story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Our first product, RootJack, has become a bit of a cult favorite in the pirate, rennie and steampunk communities.  Over the years people have constantly asked us, "When are you coming out with another flavor?"  Well, this is your opportunity to help make it happen.  YOU can be a part of making SteamJack a reality, and join the rarefied group we call the "Steam Press Gang."


What is SteamJack?

SteamJack is a Cream Soda with a hint of orange flavor and Guarana, plus a full daily dose of Vitamin C to help keep scurvy in check!

Check out the official website, SteamJack.com, for "The Unreasonably Magnificent Tale of SteamJack".


Why Now?

VooDoo Elixirs (that's us) recently found a new bottler.  It looks like a great place to handle our precious brew.  There is only one catch: the minimum run size is twice the amount we need and can afford.  However they'll let us split the run into multiple flavors, so it seemed like a great time to try something new.


Why SteamJack?

We hawked RootJack at a SteamPunk convention a few years back, and the people were so nice, and the event so much fun, it made sense to stick with it.  Plus, SteamPunk has pirates!  ...and we've owned the domain for SteamJack.com since the beginning.  Providence!


Why do we need $11k?

First off, just so you know, you cannot do a complete bottling run with $11,000... not even close.  Especially when you realize 4% of the money goes to IndieGoGo and a decent % goes to the rewards.  However the remaining amount of money allows us to do this larger run with SteamJack when added to the funds already available in the VooDoo coffers.


Perk: SteamJack Sticker

The SteamJack Sticker proudly displays the Steam Press Gang graphic exclusive to this IndieGoGo campaign, and lets everyone know that you are no one to be trifled with.


Perk: Steam Press Gang T-shirt

The Steam Press Gang T-shirt displays an enhanced version of the razor wings logo from the bottle to indicate the awesome power of the person wearing it.  This enhanced logo, the term "Steam Press Gang", and this t-shirt will only be available through the IndieGogo campaign.


Perk: Art Poster

Hal Loo at Mural Lab painted a scene from the SteamJack backstory, where Captain Astrea Valentine is fighting off the beast that killed her father aboard the airship Matanza.  We've had this beautiful work of art recreated as posters, making it available as a potential reward to IndieGoGo backers.

Sample of Art Creation.


Perk: Glorious Wooden Nickel

 *The "Glorious Wooden Nickel" is a special reward.  It signifies your maniacal support for SteamJack, RootJack and the VooDoo Crew.  Show it at any event in 2014 (AND 2015) where the VooDoo Crew is hawking, and buy your drinks for $1 a bottle, instead of whatever festival prices we're charging.  There is no limit.  The "Glorious Wooden Nickel" is also your pass to the Stretch Goal Party, for free food, drinks, music and fun.  It is a symbol of your conviction to fighting scurvy and will only be available to IndieGoGo backers.


We hit $15,000, and we're throwing a SteamJack release party.  Anyone at the Engineer Level or higher is invited, no extra charge.  We'll have music, food and obviously SteamJack.   Location is yet to be determined, but will happen somewhere in Indiana or Michigan.


Experience Mitigates Risks

Every production run has it's challenges, but luckily we've done this before. We will be using a production facility we have not used before, but our chemist has already been on site at this facility with another product, and everything looks great.

SteamJack is not any more complicated than RootJack, and many of the ingredients are shared. The formula is in its final stages (making sure it is the tastiest thing possible), graphics are already designed for the product labels, and vendors are on deck with flavorings, bottles and packaging.

Once this IndieGoGo Campaign is successful, all we will basically need to do is give all the parties the go ahead and schedule the production run. It's only seems simple because of our experience doing it.

It's only seems simple because of our experience doing it.

story:
The Inspiration

Viking Mead Ltd was founded by husband and wife team Alistair and Deborah Morgan. The couple live on a small farm on the Shetland Islands in the middle of the North Sea approximately 100 miles north of the Scottish mainland. Having brewed beer and wine as a hobby for some time, it was while touring some of the islands' ancient Norse settlements that inspiration struck. Alistair began researching the brewing techniques and ingredients used by the islands' ancient inhabitants, discovering the significance of Mead in Norse culture and mythology. The couple sensed an opportunity to bring this legendary drink to a modern audience and Viking Mead was born.

 

The Quest

Our mission is to make Viking Mead global. We want modern-day Vikings to join us on this adventure; to make mead the drink that embodies the courage, strength and wisdom of the Vikings.  Because Viking culture has a deep respect for the natural world and all it provides, we don’t want to just sell mead - we want mead to change the world...

 

 

Pollinators, which are necessary for 75% of food crops, are declining globally in both abundance and diversity.  Bees, in particular, are thought to be necessary for the fertilisation of up to 90% of the world's 107 most important human food crops.  As Viking Mead Ltd grows we will invest a portion of the company profits to establish and support a network of independent beekeepers and likeminded projects across the globe. Our beekeepers will contribute to the mission by selling us the quality raw honey needed to make exceptional mead and together we will help tackle one of the world's largest environmental issues.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking for £200,000 of funding for brewing equipment and to develop new premises.
  • This equipment will enable us to produce roughly 3000 litres of product per week.
  • The new brewery will be a converted school building. It has great potential to provide both a space for the brewery equipment and an area for visitors to come and enjoy what the brewery has to offer. We hope that by making use of this empty building we can bring employment opportunities and some life back to this rural community.
  • We have a range of unique and exciting perks. 
  • If we don't reach our entire goal we will make an assessment of how far the funds will get us and if we can continue the journey by trying to secure the remainder of the funds required from other sources.

The Need for Mead

  • Demand for honey is at an all time high but the number of beehives across the world has fallen. As a result, honey is currently one of the most adulterated food stuffs. Evidence from various bee farmers' associations suggests that for as much as 100 barrels of honey imported worldwide the equivalent of only one barrel may contain actual honey.  We want to work with bee farmers and support them to provide sustainable and high quality honey.
  • Your contribution will help to start us on our journey and provide employment opportunities to support a rural island community - and it won't stop there. We may only be a small group of people on an island in the middle of the North Sea but we have a vision. If the Vikings have taught us anything it's that a small group of people setting sail from these islands with a vision can leave their mark on history and we intend to do that again!

Risks & Challenges

  • Shetland is an inspiring, rugged and windswept environment and we are no strangers to the challenges of living on a remote island. The people who choose to live here have to be resilient, determined and creative. We understand the scale of our ambition and we embrace the challenge.
  • Key to achieving our goals will be building the right team. We will need to create partnerships and connections across great distances and we are confident that despite our remote location we will find the right crew to help bring Viking Mead to the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • We need you to tell everyone you know about Viking Mead and our global ambitions.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary:

  • I am a product leader with 17 years of experience in building tech products and delivering seamless customer experience. 
  • The customer problem we are solving is Grocery shopping trips. The small trips for breads, milk, eggs. Or, one needs to plan the entire week and stock up. Or, pay fees for online delivery. I want to solve this by having tech-enabled Hawker.  The Hawker van will consist of SKUs important to you. It will be like Fedex coming to your home every day and you can decide if they need to stop at your home. Once the Van is stopped you can choose to buy real-time.
  • By this contribution, you will help me get the concept of the ground and help me understand if there are enough backers for the concept. This will help us take on the giants in the retail space and kill their monopoly 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • To prove the concept, we need a rental van, inital Grocery SKUs, Operation executive and a tech platform to enable AI intelligence to pick the right SKUs.
  • The perk here is to get the equity in the start-up. Every 100 dollar will give you 100 shares of the company.
  • I will return the entire money if we dont get to 100K

The Impact

The impact here is big. Grocery could be one big way of employment but over time it has gone to retail giants. I want anyone to pick a van and become a Grocery shop.

Risks & Challenges

We may not be able to prove the concept if we don't raise enough money.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help on the engineering side, do reach out to me.

 

Thanks

Harsh

story:
Overview

I create this campaign with all my hope that i would find angels that will help me to start my dream project:

Hi my name is Achraf i'm glad to introduce myself to you ...

Not like other childrens ! i have spend my childhood with difficulty because my family is poor but anyway this is one of my motivations, to save myself my family and my environment,i have always wish to help others will all my power, helping others gives you positive energy it's very beautiful to see someone happy because of you, anyway i try to help myself first to help others.

I have left the school for financial reasons i'm 19 y.o, i decided to start my project to save my life before it's late, and to go back to school i have real intention and energy to change my life and help me family i need little to start!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Let me explain my business what it is:

500€ is my goal ! I'm not intend to gain real money from the good people, i asked help for capital and this five hundred is enough for me to start, there is others needs help more than me.

With all my humility, i'm good marketer i have worked on E-commerce for a while i'm really have magical touch on Marekting, it's sourced from my little experience on my work

200€ to buy two used motorcycle for delivery / 100€ to start the first promote campaigns / 100€ to fulfill the first orders.

The Impact

Your contribution will make great difference, i will never stop until i start this business and make it bigger, your investment will not be in vain:

With this project i'm plenty sure that i will turn my business into big company of this category service,and i intent to make great delivery and employees team based on youth energies i have intent to hire many youngs that needs help their families and themselves like me right now, just imagine that your contribute will make all of this.

I already worked with delivery services it's glad to make the daily needs near to someone busy!

With the good investment and planing, i'm plenty sure that i will make from this five hundred dollar a great business.

Note: i have already build website for my project https://sokhraa.com .

Risks & Challenges

The only problem that i have is financial support.

I already have some money inside to invest it, i'm help my father for my family needs that's why i have this problem but i'm very sure that i will never stop until start my project i don't know something called "Failure".

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that many of you have kind heart and will love my story but i also know that not all can help me, anyhow if you share my campaign it's will be good help for me you will be reason at latest for 10 persons that will see my story.

And that's all there is to it.
