I have left the school for financial reasons i'm 19 y.o, i decided to start my project to save my life before it's late, and to go back to school i have real intention and energy to change my life and help me family i need little to start!
 
What We Need & What You Get
Let me explain my business what it is:
500€ is my goal ! I'm not intend to gain real money from the good people, i asked help for capital and this five hundred is enough for me to start, there is others needs help more than me.
With all my humility, i'm good marketer i have worked on E-commerce for a while i'm really have magical touch on Marekting, it's sourced from my little experience on my work
200€ to buy two used motorcycle for delivery / 100€ to start the first promote campaigns / 100€ to fulfill the first orders.
The Impact
Your contribution will make great difference, i will never stop until i start this business and make it bigger, your investment will not be in vain:
With this project i'm plenty sure that i will turn my business into big company of this category service,and i intent to make great delivery and employees team based on youth energies i have intent to hire many youngs that needs help their families and themselves like me right now, just imagine that your contribute will make all of this.
I already worked with delivery services it's glad to make the daily needs near to someone busy!
With the good investment and planing, i'm plenty sure that i will make from this five hundred dollar a great business.
Note: i have already build website for my project https://sokhraa.com .
Risks & Challenges
The only problem that i have is financial support.
I already have some money inside to invest it, i'm help my father for my family needs that's why i have this problem but i'm very sure that i will never stop until start my project i don't know something called "Failure".
Other Ways You Can Help
I know that many of you have kind heart and will love my story but i also know that not all can help me, anyhow if you share my campaign it's will be good help for me you will be reason at latest for 10 persons that will see my story.
And that's all there is to it.

story:
"Tomato ideal" brand 100% tomato juice for the whole family

Lycopene in tomato juice is called "gold in plants"!

At present, tomato juice is popular in Europe, America, Japan, Hong Kong and Taiwan.

The antioxidant capacity of lycopene is 3.2 times that of carotene, 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.

"Tomato ideal" brand 100% Xinjiang tomato juice contains at least 20mg lycopene per can, which is equivalent to the lycopene absorption of 400 tomatoes raw!

 The price of drinks, the experience of nutrition!Just one can, protect your health!

 

 

Our bodies rust every day, you know?

Our car will be maintained regularly, but our most precious body is often ignored!It has become the norm for Chinese people to make money with their bodies when they are young and to buy their lives when they are old.Why don't you take good care of yourself when you are young?Make money at the same time must take good care of the body, if you ignore it, it will slowly betray you... Pro, must remember!According to the survey, although the life expectancy of Chinese people has been extended, about half of the people over 65 years old in China have been taking a variety of drugs due to different diseases. Most of the elderly spend their days in the hospital intermittently.

However, this is not necessarily the case. In fact, many people's suffering from diseases can be prevented through maintenance in middle age or controlled by nutrition adjustment now.

In the United States, there are more and more "senior citizens" who are in good physical and mental condition. They are always healthy and full of vitality. We can see them in tennis courts, adult education classes, gymnasiums, and sometimes even in professional places.Researchers have conducted research on these elderly people who have a good old age and found that the maintenance carried out as early as middle age is the cornerstone of their good health after old age!

 

It's better to keep in good health in advance than to spend money on treatment

When the ruddy complexion quietly fades away, the wrinkles of years climb up the woman's face; when the energy is overdrawn for a long time, the pressure of career makes men unable to do what they want; when the heart and brain function is failing day by day, parents always have to face the threat of vascular sclerosisWe can't help asking: what steals our health?

British scientists have pointed out: iron will rust, silver will turn black, in fact, the human body will rust.The aging process of human body is similar to that of cut apple, which is the result of oxidation.Many chronic diseases of human beings are caused by oxidative stress, that is, the human body is rusting every day. The "rust" produced is called "free radical" in medicine, which is the root of many diseases of human body.Environmental pollution, life pressure, radiation and other factors are "oxidizing" our bodies all the time, reducing human life expectancy."Oxidation" is the main culprit that deprives people of health in life, and it is an important factor that leads to human aging and health problems!Experiments show that animals with low oxidative metabolism rate and strong antioxidant capacity are not easy to get sick, stronger and have the longest life span.

With the increase of age, our self-healing ability becomes weaker, and the damage caused by free radicals is manifested, such as wrinkles, color spots, poor energy, organ aging, arteriosclerosis, diabetes, cataract, cardiovascular disease, Alzheimer's disease, arthritis, cancer, etc., which are considered to be related to free radicals.

With the improvement of living standards, the popularization of nutrition knowledge and the improvement of health care awareness, the harm of chronic diseases related to diet is not only valued by the state and society, but also aroused people's general concern. The concept of "prevention is more important than treatment" has gradually replaced the habit of "treating diseases only when they are sick".

Our goal is not to turn back the clock, but to live the best quality of life at the age of 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80 and even 100!

 

"Wolf peach" in South America becomes a new favorite of European and American family maintenance

Tomato, which is rich in nutrition and delicious, is known as the fruit delicacy and the ruby of green world.It is said that the hometown of tomato is in Peru and Mexico. It was originally a wild berry growing in the forest. It was originally called "wolf peach". The fruit is rich in nutrition and has a special flavor.According to records, in the 16th century, a Duke of England named orodala was traveling in South America. He liked tomatoes very much, so he brought them back to England as a gift of love to his lover Queen Elizabeth to express his love.Since then, the names of "love fruit" and "lover fruit" have been widely spread.Europeans began to plant tomatoes in courtyards and gardens, and as a symbol of love and friendship gifts between men and women.

 

Time of the United States selects the food that contributes the most to human health

American "time" magazine introduced many kinds of food which are beneficial to modern people's health, among which tomato ranked the first.Tomato is rich in antioxidants, which can prevent the damage of free radicals to the skin. It has obvious effects of beauty, anti wrinkle, anti-aging, improving energy, protecting organs, and can greatly reduce the risk of cancer.

Tomato juice is very popular in European and American countries. It is said that Americans who pay attention to health care should drink two things when they wake up in the morning and before going to bed at night: one is milk, and the other is tomato juice.According to statistics, the per capita consumption of tomatoes in European and American countries is more than 30 times of that in China. In particular, 100% pure tomato juice has become an essential maintenance product for the whole family in European and American families.Drinking a glass of tomato juice every day brings obvious benefits to the maintenance oriented European and American people.The old people often drink it to delay aging, protect heart, brain, prostate and other important organs. The men often drink it with vigorous energy, while the women often drink it to beautify and beautify the skin, remove wrinkles and spots.

 

200g tomato juice, supplement the whole body nutrition

At present, tomato has been proved to contain a variety of vitamins and nutrients, rich in vitamin C and a, folic acid, potassium these main nutrients.In particular, it contains lycopene, it really has the effect of love, can make girls more beautiful!We see that loving and scientific mothers tend to make their children eat more tomatoes.According to the nutritionist's research and determination: each person eats 200 grams of tomato juice every day, which can protect the human health system and meet the human body's needs for a variety of vitamins and minerals.

 Tomato juice is rich in vitamins, alkalis, cellulose and pectin, and is rich in lycopene. Lycopene is the strongest antioxidant, which can delay aging, beautifying beauty, improving energy and enhancing immunity. The higher the content of lycopene in human plasma, the lower the incidence rate of cancer and coronary heart disease.

 Tomato juice contains a variety of organic acids. In addition to protecting vitamin C from damage, organic acids can also soften blood vessels, promote the absorption of calcium and iron, and help stomach juice digest fat and protein, which is beyond other vegetables and fruits;

 Tomato juice also contains a kind of anti-cancer and anti-aging substance called glutathione. Studies have found that tomato juice can prevent some types of cancer, inhibit breast cancer, lung cancer, endometrial cancer, and also fight lung cancer and colon cancer;

 Lycopene has the effect of diuresis and inhibiting the growth of bacteria. It is an excellent antioxidant and can remove free radicals in human body;

 Tomato juice also has the effect of beauty, appetite, protein digestion, reduce stomach distension.Its characteristics are between fruits and vegetables, rich in vitamin A and C. due to the protection of organic acids, vitamin C can not be destroyed in tomato cooking.

 

 

Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant in nature

 

1913Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant found in plants in nature, was first found in cooked tomatoes.Its antioxidant capacity is 3.2 times that of carotene, 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.Science has proved that the free radicals in human body are the main culprits of human autoimmune system.Lycopene is more effective than other carotenoids and vitamin E in scavenging free radicals, and its rate constant of quenching singlet oxygen is 100 times that of vitamin E.It is of great significance to prevent skin aging, prevent cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, prostate diseases, remove garbage in the body, enhance the human immune system and delay aging.It can effectively prevent and treat various diseases caused by aging and immune decline.Therefore, it is concerned by experts all over the world.

 

Drinking cooked tomato juice is the best way to supplement lycopene

Lycopene is known as "gold in plants".At present, lycopene has been widely accepted in Europe, America, Japan, Hong Kong and Taiwan.A cup of cooked tomato juice every day has become the living habit of high-quality families, and cooked tomato juice has become the top maintenance product for European and American families!

Lycopene widely exists in various organs and tissues of human body.It is mainly distributed in human blood, adrenal gland, liver, testis, prostate, breast, ovary, uterus, digestive tract and other organs, in which blood, adrenal gland, liver and testis contain more lycopene.Moreover, the content of lycopene in human body is related to human life span.Lycopene can also inhibit the oxidation of low density lipoprotein and resist ultraviolet radiation.

The United States and Japan have produced lycopene as the main active ingredient of drugs, its main role is to reduce blood pressure, treat high cholesterol, high blood lipid, reduce the activity of cancer cells.Lycopene is used to prevent prostate cancer in the United States and France.Israel and Australia have products used to prevent ultraviolet burns, protect skin, strengthen skin and nourish beauty.

The human body can't make lycopene, so it needs to take it from the diet. Eating a raw tomato can only absorb 0.05 mg of lycopene; only the tomato juice with proper ripening degree can greatly improve the absorption of lycopene through wall breaking technology.

 

The strongest antioxidant in the plant world

Delaying aging and enhancing immunity

Beautify and nourish the face, remove the rubbish in the body

Protect the prostate, protect the heart and brain

 

Powerful tomato juice, you can't expect the maintenance effect

Tomato juice is rich in lycopene, which has a variety of maintenance functions. Many families in Europe and the United States take natural tomato juice for a long time. Many people at the age of 40 can have a 20-year-old body, and those at the age of 60 can have a 40-year-old body.

 

Delaying aging and enhancing immunity

The aging of human body is closely related to the lack of lycopene. At the age of 40, it is the best time to prevent the aging and physical diseases. The way is to supplement lycopene.One lycopene molecule in tomato juice can quench tens of thousands of free radicals, and its antioxidant capacity is 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.It can effectively eliminate free radicals in human body, maintain normal metabolism of cells and prevent aging.Lycopene is absorbed in the body through the digestive tract mucosa, enters the blood and lymph, distributes to the testis, adrenal gland, prostate, pancreas, breast, ovary, liver, lung, colon, skin and various mucosal tissues, promotes the secretion of hormones by glands, so as to keep the human body vigorous; eliminates the free radicals in these organs and tissues, protects them from injury, and enhances the immunity of the bodyPestilence makes people less likely to get sick.

 

Italy confirmed that prevention and inhibition of cancer

One of the important mechanisms of tumorigenesis is that tissue cells undergo gene mutation under the action of external mutagens. Lycopene in tomato juice can block this process, effectively quench free radicals, and achieve the role of tumor prevention.For the formed tumor, it can promote intercellular signal transmission, inhibit and differentiate, induce cancer cells, and make them correct.

In Greece, Italy and other Mediterranean countries, where residents often eat barbecue food, barbecue food is easy to induce cancer.However, the incidence rate of cervical cancer, prostate cancer and liver cancer is low in this area.Because local people often eat tomato products - tomato juice and ketchup.Tomato juice is a necessary drink for them to roast fish and meat.This diet method reduces the mutagen effect in fried and baked food, and greatly reduces the cancer incidence.One of the main reasons for the formation of cancer cells is the sudden malignant transformation of genes by tissue cells under the action of external mutagens.Lycopene can inhibit the mutation process and prevent cancer.

The Italy Medical Research Institute used Lycopene in tomato juice to prevent cancer. It has been proved that lycopene can reduce the incidence rate of various cancers, especially the decrease of esophageal, gastric, colon and prostate cancer.

A comparative study conducted by the University of Illinois in the US found that incidence rate of cervical cancer is 5 times higher in women with low lycopene content than those with high lycopene in vivo.

The researchers studied 93 cases of lung cancer patients and 102 cases of non tumor controls, and detected the concentration of lycopene in the blood. The results showed that the concentrations of various nutrients in the blood of the two groups were similar, only lycopene was different. The concentration of lycopene in the tissues of lung cancer patients was significantly lower than that of the control group.

In this study, 26 patients with prostate cancer waiting for surgery were divided into two groups: one group took lycopene extracted from tomatoes, 15 mg twice a day; the other group did not take lycopene.Three weeks later, I was surprised to find that in patients taking lycopene, the tumor size was significantly reduced, and some were almost eliminated.

Improving cataract and age-related macular degeneration

According to Marius palman of the University of Wisconsin in the United States, compared with people with low blood lycopene concentration, people with high blood lycopene concentration are 50% less likely to develop age-related macular disease

 

10 European countries found that the protection of heart and brain

Lipoprotein oxidation is a key factor in the development of atherosclerosis.Lycopene plays an important role in reducing lipoprotein oxidation.It can remove vascular garbage, regulate plasma cholesterol concentration, inhibit arteriosclerosis formation and protect LDL from oxidation.It can also repair and improve the oxidized cells, promote the formation of intercellular glia, and enhance the flexibility of blood vessels.

According to reports, oral lycopene rich tomato juice can reduce serum cholesterol to below 5.20 mmol / L, which can slow down the development of cardiovascular disease.According to the research reports of 10 European countries, it is concluded that the intake of 30 mg lycopene per day can significantly reduce the risk of coronary heart disease.

"News network" once reported the experiment of 150 heart disease patients in Cambridge University of England: if they were given lycopene supplement every day for 4 consecutive weeks, the patients' low density cholesterol was significantly reduced, and the side effects were reduced compared with the lipid-lowering drugs, which confirmed that lycopene had a significant effect on the prevention of moderate wind and cardiovascular disease.

 

Strong anti alcohol effect

The main metabolic process of alcohol in human body is redox reaction, which produces a lot of free radicals.Taking lycopene at ordinary times can increase the amount of alcohol; taking lycopene before drinking can relieve alcohol damage to liver; taking lycopene after drinking can relieve headache, vomiting and other drunken symptoms.

 

Improve allergy

Lycopene can greatly improve skin allergy, eliminate dry skin and itching caused by skin allergy, and make people feel relaxed and happy.

 

Protection of mucosal tissue

Lycopene is abundant in various mucosal tissues in the body. Long term administration can improve various discomfort caused by the destruction of mucosal tissues in the body.Such as dry cough, dry eyes, oral ulcer, protection of gastrointestinal mucosa tissue.

In addition, lycopene also has many physiological functions, such as preventing osteoporosis, lowering blood pressure and reducing exercise-induced asthma.

 

Little tomato juice protects men's prostate health

With the growth of age, the rapid decline or lack of lycopene in men's prostate and blood will not be able to resist the erosion of free radicals on cell tissue, especially the damage to prostate tissue.The rapid loss of lycopene is the core of prostatitis and benign prostatic hyperplasia, which is the key to the long-term treatment of prostate disease.Once the content of lycopene in men's blood drops, it is easy to have dysuria, low back and perineum, lower abdominal acid, distending pain, poor energy, insomnia, amnesia, decreased resistance and other systemic adverse symptoms.

There are many layers of reticular fibers outside the male prostate, which are difficult to have inflammation or bacteria, but common drugs are difficult to work after infection.Lycopene in tomato juice can break through the prostate absorption barrier and directly enter the gland to play a role.In the study of carotenoids, only lycopene has a clear protective effect.Lycopene in tomato juice is transported to all organs of the body through human lipoprotein, with the highest concentration in testis, prostate and adrenal gland.It can remove the toxin that invades the prostate, so as to effectively prevent prostate lesions.Lycopene can also regulate the prostatic fluid, keep the pH value at 6-6.5, provide a comfortable environment for sperm activity, enhance sperm activity and improve male fertility.

 

Multi country studies have proved that tomato juice is the best maintenance product for men

Studies have confirmed that prostate disease is closely related to the concentration of lycopene in human body.The results of a 30-year survey of 1899 middle-aged men by the University of Chicago School of Medicine showed that the lower the intake of lycopene, the higher the risk of prostate disease.

 

Canada:A six-year follow-up study of 14000 men since 1976 found that those who ate tomato juice more than five times a week had a significantly lower risk of prostate disease.

India:Doctors in New Delhi have shown that lycopene improves the quality of men's sperm.The experiment confirmed that 23-45 years old infertile men took tomato juice containing 20 mg lycopene twice a day. After 3 months, the concentration, vitality and shape of sperm were good.

U.S.A:A follow-up study of 47890 medical staff conducted by Harvard University also confirmed that a large amount of lycopene intake of tomato products had a very significant negative correlation with the risk of prostate cancer, and the risk of prostate cancer decreased by 21% (up to 34%).Taking tomato juice containing 20 mg lycopene every day can effectively alleviate the disease.

Italy:Statistics show that the incidence rate of prostate in southern Italy is significantly lower than that in other areas, which may be related to tomato juice and tomato paste.

britain:Five urologists from the Department of Biochemical Sciences at the University of Portsmouth in the United Kingdom randomly selected strong men with an average age of 42. They were asked to drink a glass of tomato juice every day for two weeks, during which their semen samples were collected.The results showed that the level of lycopene in semen, which can eliminate harmful chemical free radicals, increased significantly, ranging from 7% to 12%.Scientists infer that if a man drinks a glass of tomato juice a day, it will greatly enhance fertility.

 

Tomato juice is essential for women's beauty and skin care

Since the 1950s, the theory of skin aging has been widely accepted in the field of Dermatology and medicine. The theory holds that the culprit of skin aging is free radicals.Free radicals are unstable oxygen molecules that destroy cells by seizing electrons.Cherie ditre, assistant professor of Dermatology and doctor of dermatology at the University of Pennsylvania, believes that although the original intention of free radicals is beneficial - they can kill harmful substances such as bacteria - while they proliferate, the structure of the skin is also damaged, and such damage will soon show up.Nicholas Perricone, M.D., the author of the newly published Perricone prescription, said: "in the midday sun, it takes only 40 minutes for free radicals stimulated by UV rays to consume 80% of vitamin C stored in the human body."

Skin problems can not only rely on skin care products, but also pay attention to the internal. Women's body functions begin to weaken from the age of 35, and all kinds of toxins in the body gradually accumulate, which is difficult to be discharged from the body.The garbage produced by these free radicals is a kind of toxic substance, which is harmful to human aging.At this time, we need to supplement some nutrients to help alleviate the body's aging speed, such as tomato juice, rich in antioxidants, can delay the aging of human body.Nowadays, people pay more and more attention to tomato beauty, mainly because tomato juice not only has good health care effect, but also has strong antioxidant effect, which can protect our skin health and beauty.

 

German research has proved that 200 ml tomato juice per day can effectively inhibit aging

Beauty is an indispensable course in women's daily life. In the face of all kinds of life pressure and work pressure in modern society, it is difficult to protect their skin to achieve the best state.Many friends with long spots on their faces have tried a variety of freckle removal products, but they have no effect. It not only costs time, but also costs a lot of money.Beauty experts tell us that lycopene in tomato juice can quench the free radicals that invade the human body, form a natural barrier on the surface of the skin, effectively prevent external damage to the skin, and promote the combination of collagen and elastin in the blood, which can easily fade the spots and make your face look more lustrous, elastic and charming.In addition to anti-oxidation and freckle removing, tomato juice also has whitening, black eye circles removing, dead skin removing and other good effects on women's beauty, so it is loved by most female friends.When you get up in the morning, you can drink a cup of tomato juice to ensure a good appearance and start a new day's work and life.

Research by scientists in Germany and the Netherlands shows that if everyone eats 200ml of cooked tomato juice every day, the risk of sunburn will be reduced by 40%.

The researchers added 200ml of ripe tomato juice to healthy women for two months. As a result, the area and degree of erythema caused by ultraviolet light were reduced.It is confirmed that eating tomato juice can promote the antioxidant capacity of the body, improve the body's own immunity, promote the microcirculation of skin tissue, and repair the damaged skin tissue.

The 100% tomato juice with the exact cosmetic effect is the most economical and practical female maintenance product. It is suggested that all the women who love beauty can enjoy the anti-aging effect of tomato juice more.

 

"The ideal of Tomato" - the best care product for relatives

Tomato juice is an ideal antioxidant food, especially for men's vigorous energy, prostate health, women's beautiful skin and the elderly's heart and brain health. Keeping tomato juice at home is of great help to the health of the whole family."Tomato's ideal" brand 100% Xinjiang tomato juice meets the health needs of the whole family, each can contains 20mg lycopene and a variety of nutrients, as long as one can, supplement the whole day nutrition!

 

Hard work wife, youth beautiful drink back!

Nowadays, women are more tired than men. They have to take care of their work and family, the elderly and children,

Young man waist, middle-aged bucket waist, fishtail pattern, color spotCan only become a yellow faced woman?

To can the ideal tomato juice, resist skin oxidation, remove body garbage, drive away wrinkles and spots, drink back the beauty of youth!

There is a close relationship between the aging of women's skin and the lack of lycopene. At the age of 30-40, it is the best time for women to prevent the aging of the body and skin. Experts say that lycopene can help reduce the damage of ultraviolet rays to the skin and improve skin aging and age spots.Modern medical research has proved that: lycopene can also inhibit breast cancer, is an ideal product for women to keep young and beautiful.

 

Busy dad and mom all my life

My parents are old and young

We can't stop our parents from getting old, but we can make them grow old slowly. We can make them have a healthy mind and a high quality of life.

To can the ideal tomato juice, drive away the mental threat, enjoy the good time, let parents not only have a young heart, but also a young body!

According to the British Journal of nutrition, Finnish scientists designed a group of experiments in which the participants drank 400 ml tomato juice every day. After three weeks, the total cholesterol level of the participants dropped by 6%, while the low-density lipoprotein cholesterol level dropped by nearly 13%.According to the experiment, experts believe that tomato juice is an ideal food for the prevention and treatment of arteriosclerosis, hypertension and coronary heart disease.

 

A variety of natural nutrition can help children grow up healthily

According to nutritionists research and determination: each person eating 200 grams of tomato juice every day, can meet the human body's needs for a variety of vitamins and minerals.Tomato contains "lycopene", which can inhibit bacteria; it also contains malic acid, citric acid and sugar; it is rich in vitamin A, vitamin C, vitamin B1, vitamin B2, carotene, calcium, phosphorus, potassium, magnesium, iron, zinc, copper, iodine and other elements; it also contains egg white, sugar, organic acid, cellulose."Tomato's ideal" brand 100% Xinjiang tomato juice is rich in a variety of natural nutrients, which is very beneficial for teenagers who are in urgent need of a variety of nutrients!

 Lycopene has the effect of diuresis and inhibiting the growth of bacteria. It is an excellent antioxidant and can remove free radicals in human body;
 Tomato juice also has the effect of beauty, appetite, protein digestion, reduce stomach distension.Its characteristics are between fruits and vegetables, rich in vitamin A and C. due to the protection of organic acids, vitamin C can not be destroyed in tomato cooking.
 
 
Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant in nature
 
1913Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant found in plants in nature, was first found in cooked tomatoes.Its antioxidant capacity is 3.2 times that of carotene, 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.Science has proved that the free radicals in human body are the main culprits of human autoimmune system.Lycopene is more effective than other carotenoids and vitamin E in scavenging free radicals, and its rate constant of quenching singlet oxygen is 100 times that of vitamin E.It is of great significance to prevent skin aging, prevent cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, prostate diseases, remove garbage in the body, enhance the human immune system and delay aging.It can effectively prevent and treat various diseases caused by aging and immune decline.Therefore, it is concerned by experts all over the world.
 
Drinking cooked tomato juice is the best way to supplement lycopene
Lycopene is known as "gold in plants".At present, lycopene has been widely accepted in Europe, America, Japan, Hong Kong and Taiwan.A cup of cooked tomato juice every day has become the living habit of high-quality families, and cooked tomato juice has become the top maintenance product for European and American families!
Lycopene widely exists in various organs and tissues of human body.It is mainly distributed in human blood, adrenal gland, liver, testis, prostate, breast, ovary, uterus, digestive tract and other organs, in which blood, adrenal gland, liver and testis contain more lycopene.Moreover, the content of lycopene in human body is related to human life span.Lycopene can also inhibit the oxidation of low density lipoprotein and resist ultraviolet radiation.
The United States and Japan have produced lycopene as the main active ingredient of drugs, its main role is to reduce blood pressure, treat high cholesterol, high blood lipid, reduce the activity of cancer cells.Lycopene is used to prevent prostate cancer in the United States and France.Israel and Australia have products used to prevent ultraviolet burns, protect skin, strengthen skin and nourish beauty.
The human body can't make lycopene, so it needs to take it from the diet. Eating a raw tomato can only absorb 0.05 mg of lycopene; only the tomato juice with proper ripening degree can greatly improve the absorption of lycopene through wall breaking technology.
 
The strongest antioxidant in the plant world
Delaying aging and enhancing immunity
Beautify and nourish the face, remove the rubbish in the body
Protect the prostate, protect the heart and brain
 
Powerful tomato juice, you can't expect the maintenance effect
Tomato juice is rich in lycopene, which has a variety of maintenance functions. Many families in Europe and the United States take natural tomato juice for a long time. Many people at the age of 40 can have a 20-year-old body, and those at the age of 60 can have a 40-year-old body.
 
Delaying aging and enhancing immunity
The aging of human body is closely related to the lack of lycopene. At the age of 40, it is the best time to prevent the aging and physical diseases. The way is to supplement lycopene.One lycopene molecule in tomato juice can quench tens of thousands of free radicals, and its antioxidant capacity is 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.It can effectively eliminate free radicals in human body, maintain normal metabolism of cells and prevent aging.Lycopene is absorbed in the body through the digestive tract mucosa, enters the blood and lymph, distributes to the testis, adrenal gland, prostate, pancreas, breast, ovary, liver, lung, colon, skin and various mucosal tissues, promotes the secretion of hormones by glands, so as to keep the human body vigorous; eliminates the free radicals in these organs and tissues, protects them from injury, and enhances the immunity of the bodyPestilence makes people less likely to get sick.
 
Italy confirmed that prevention and inhibition of cancer
One of the important mechanisms of tumorigenesis is that tissue cells undergo gene mutation under the action of external mutagens. Lycopene in tomato juice can block this process, effectively quench free radicals, and achieve the role of tumor prevention.For the formed tumor, it can promote intercellular signal transmission, inhibit and differentiate, induce cancer cells, and make them correct.
In Greece, Italy and other Mediterranean countries, where residents often eat barbecue food, barbecue food is easy to induce cancer.However, the incidence rate of cervical cancer, prostate cancer and liver cancer is low in this area.Because local people often eat tomato products - tomato juice and ketchup.Tomato juice is a necessary drink for them to roast fish and meat.This diet method reduces the mutagen effect in fried and baked food, and greatly reduces the cancer incidence.One of the main reasons for the formation of cancer cells is the sudden malignant transformation of genes by tissue cells under the action of external mutagens.Lycopene can inhibit the mutation process and prevent cancer.
The Italy Medical Research Institute used Lycopene in tomato juice to prevent cancer. It has been proved that lycopene can reduce the incidence rate of various cancers, especially the decrease of esophageal, gastric, colon and prostate cancer.
A comparative study conducted by the University of Illinois in the US found that incidence rate of cervical cancer is 5 times higher in women with low lycopene content than those with high lycopene in vivo.
The researchers studied 93 cases of lung cancer patients and 102 cases of non tumor controls, and detected the concentration of lycopene in the blood. The results showed that the concentrations of various nutrients in the blood of the two groups were similar, only lycopene was different. The concentration of lycopene in the tissues of lung cancer patients was significantly lower than that of the control group.
In this study, 26 patients with prostate cancer waiting for surgery were divided into two groups: one group took lycopene extracted from tomatoes, 15 mg twice a day; the other group did not take lycopene.Three weeks later, I was surprised to find that in patients taking lycopene, the tumor size was significantly reduced, and some were almost eliminated.
Improving cataract and age-related macular degeneration
According to Marius palman of the University of Wisconsin in the United States, compared with people with low blood lycopene concentration, people with high blood lycopene concentration are 50% less likely to develop age-related macular disease
 
10 European countries found that the protection of heart and brain
Lipoprotein oxidation is a key factor in the development of atherosclerosis.Lycopene plays an important role in reducing lipoprotein oxidation.It can remove vascular garbage, regulate plasma cholesterol concentration, inhibit arteriosclerosis formation and protect LDL from oxidation.It can also repair and improve the oxidized cells, promote the formation of intercellular glia, and enhance the flexibility of blood vessels.
According to reports, oral lycopene rich tomato juice can reduce serum cholesterol to below 5.20 mmol / L, which can slow down the development of cardiovascular disease.According to the research reports of 10 European countries, it is concluded that the intake of 30 mg lycopene per day can significantly reduce the risk of coronary heart disease.
"News network" once reported the experiment of 150 heart disease patients in Cambridge University of England: if they were given lycopene supplement every day for 4 consecutive weeks, the patients' low density cholesterol was significantly reduced, and the side effects were reduced compared with the lipid-lowering drugs, which confirmed that lycopene had a significant effect on the prevention of moderate wind and cardiovascular disease.
 
Strong anti alcohol effect
The main metabolic process of alcohol in human body is redox reaction, which produces a lot of free radicals.Taking lycopene at ordinary times can increase the amount of alcohol; taking lycopene before drinking can relieve alcohol damage to liver; taking lycopene after drinking can relieve headache, vomiting and other drunken symptoms.
 
Improve allergy
Lycopene can greatly improve skin allergy, eliminate dry skin and itching caused by skin allergy, and make people feel relaxed and happy.
 
Protection of mucosal tissue
Lycopene is abundant in various mucosal tissues in the body. Long term administration can improve various discomfort caused by the destruction of mucosal tissues in the body.Such as dry cough, dry eyes, oral ulcer, protection of gastrointestinal mucosa tissue.
In addition, lycopene also has many physiological functions, such as preventing osteoporosis, lowering blood pressure and reducing exercise-induced asthma.
 
Little tomato juice protects men's prostate health
With the growth of age, the rapid decline or lack of lycopene in men's prostate and blood will not be able to resist the erosion of free radicals on cell tissue, especially the damage to prostate tissue.The rapid loss of lycopene is the core of prostatitis and benign prostatic hyperplasia, which is the key to the long-term treatment of prostate disease.Once the content of lycopene in men's blood drops, it is easy to have dysuria, low back and perineum, lower abdominal acid, distending pain, poor energy, insomnia, amnesia, decreased resistance and other systemic adverse symptoms.
There are many layers of reticular fibers outside the male prostate, which are difficult to have inflammation or bacteria, but common drugs are difficult to work after infection.Lycopene in tomato juice can break through the prostate absorption barrier and directly enter the gland to play a role.In the study of carotenoids, only lycopene has a clear protective effect.Lycopene in tomato juice is transported to all organs of the body through human lipoprotein, with the highest concentration in testis, prostate and adrenal gland.It can remove the toxin that invades the prostate, so as to effectively prevent prostate lesions.Lycopene can also regulate the prostatic fluid, keep the pH value at 6-6.5, provide a comfortable environment for sperm activity, enhance sperm activity and improve male fertility.
 
Multi country studies have proved that tomato juice is the best maintenance product for men
Studies have confirmed that prostate disease is closely related to the concentration of lycopene in human body.The results of a 30-year survey of 1899 middle-aged men by the University of Chicago School of Medicine showed that the lower the intake of lycopene, the higher the risk of prostate disease.
 
Canada:A six-year follow-up study of 14000 men since 1976 found that those who ate tomato juice more than five times a week had a significantly lower risk of prostate disease.
India:Doctors in New Delhi have shown that lycopene improves the quality of men's sperm.The experiment confirmed that 23-45 years old infertile men took tomato juice containing 20 mg lycopene twice a day. After 3 months, the concentration, vitality and shape of sperm were good.
U.S.A:A follow-up study of 47890 medical staff conducted by Harvard University also confirmed that a large amount of lycopene intake of tomato products had a very significant negative correlation with the risk of prostate cancer, and the risk of prostate cancer decreased by 21% (up to 34%).Taking tomato juice containing 20 mg lycopene every day can effectively alleviate the disease.
Italy:Statistics show that the incidence rate of prostate in southern Italy is significantly lower than that in other areas, which may be related to tomato juice and tomato paste.
britain:Five urologists from the Department of Biochemical Sciences at the University of Portsmouth in the United Kingdom randomly selected strong men with an average age of 42. They were asked to drink a glass of tomato juice every day for two weeks, during which their semen samples were collected.The results showed that the level of lycopene in semen, which can eliminate harmful chemical free radicals, increased significantly, ranging from 7% to 12%.Scientists infer that if a man drinks a glass of tomato juice a day, it will greatly enhance fertility.
 
Tomato juice is essential for women's beauty and skin care
Since the 1950s, the theory of skin aging has been widely accepted in the field of Dermatology and medicine. The theory holds that the culprit of skin aging is free radicals.Free radicals are unstable oxygen molecules that destroy cells by seizing electrons.Cherie ditre, assistant professor of Dermatology and doctor of dermatology at the University of Pennsylvania, believes that although the original intention of free radicals is beneficial - they can kill harmful substances such as bacteria - while they proliferate, the structure of the skin is also damaged, and such damage will soon show up.Nicholas Perricone, M.D., the author of the newly published Perricone prescription, said: "in the midday sun, it takes only 40 minutes for free radicals stimulated by UV rays to consume 80% of vitamin C stored in the human body."
Skin problems can not only rely on skin care products, but also pay attention to the internal. Women's body functions begin to weaken from the age of 35, and all kinds of toxins in the body gradually accumulate, which is difficult to be discharged from the body.The garbage produced by these free radicals is a kind of toxic substance, which is harmful to human aging.At this time, we need to supplement some nutrients to help alleviate the body's aging speed, such as tomato juice, rich in antioxidants, can delay the aging of human body.Nowadays, people pay more and more attention to tomato beauty, mainly because tomato juice not only has good health care effect, but also has strong antioxidant effect, which can protect our skin health and beauty.
 
German research has proved that 200 ml tomato juice per day can effectively inhibit aging
Beauty is an indispensable course in women's daily life. In the face of all kinds of life pressure and work pressure in modern society, it is difficult to protect their skin to achieve the best state.Many friends with long spots on their faces have tried a variety of freckle removal products, but they have no effect. It not only costs time, but also costs a lot of money.Beauty experts tell us that lycopene in tomato juice can quench the free radicals that invade the human body, form a natural barrier on the surface of the skin, effectively prevent external damage to the skin, and promote the combination of collagen and elastin in the blood, which can easily fade the spots and make your face look more lustrous, elastic and charming.In addition to anti-oxidation and freckle removing, tomato juice also has whitening, black eye circles removing, dead skin removing and other good effects on women's beauty, so it is loved by most female friends.When you get up in the morning, you can drink a cup of tomato juice to ensure a good appearance and start a new day's work and life.
Research by scientists in Germany and the Netherlands shows that if everyone eats 200ml of cooked tomato juice every day, the risk of sunburn will be reduced by 40%.
The researchers added 200ml of ripe tomato juice to healthy women for two months. As a result, the area and degree of erythema caused by ultraviolet light were reduced.It is confirmed that eating tomato juice can promote the antioxidant capacity of the body, improve the body's own immunity, promote the microcirculation of skin tissue, and repair the damaged skin tissue.
The 100% tomato juice with the exact cosmetic effect is the most economical and practical female maintenance product. It is suggested that all the women who love beauty can enjoy the anti-aging effect of tomato juice more.
 
"The ideal of Tomato" - the best care product for relatives
Tomato juice is an ideal antioxidant food, especially for men's vigorous energy, prostate health, women's beautiful skin and the elderly's heart and brain health. Keeping tomato juice at home is of great help to the health of the whole family."Tomato's ideal" brand 100% Xinjiang tomato juice meets the health needs of the whole family, each can contains 20mg lycopene and a variety of nutrients, as long as one can, supplement the whole day nutrition!
 
Hard work wife, youth beautiful drink back!
Nowadays, women are more tired than men. They have to take care of their work and family, the elderly and children,
Young man waist, middle-aged bucket waist, fishtail pattern, color spotCan only become a yellow faced woman?
To can the ideal tomato juice, resist skin oxidation, remove body garbage, drive away wrinkles and spots, drink back the beauty of youth!
There is a close relationship between the aging of women's skin and the lack of lycopene. At the age of 30-40, it is the best time for women to prevent the aging of the body and skin. Experts say that lycopene can help reduce the damage of ultraviolet rays to the skin and improve skin aging and age spots.Modern medical research has proved that: lycopene can also inhibit breast cancer, is an ideal product for women to keep young and beautiful.
 
Busy dad and mom all my life
My parents are old and young
We can't stop our parents from getting old, but we can make them grow old slowly. We can make them have a healthy mind and a high quality of life.
To can the ideal tomato juice, drive away the mental threat, enjoy the good time, let parents not only have a young heart, but also a young body!
According to the British Journal of nutrition, Finnish scientists designed a group of experiments in which the participants drank 400 ml tomato juice every day. After three weeks, the total cholesterol level of the participants dropped by 6%, while the low-density lipoprotein cholesterol level dropped by nearly 13%.According to the experiment, experts believe that tomato juice is an ideal food for the prevention and treatment of arteriosclerosis, hypertension and coronary heart disease.
 
A variety of natural nutrition can help children grow up healthily
According to nutritionists research and determination: each person eating 200 grams of tomato juice every day, can meet the human body's needs for a variety of vitamins and minerals.Tomato contains "lycopene", which can inhibit bacteria; it also contains malic acid, citric acid and sugar; it is rich in vitamin A, vitamin C, vitamin B1, vitamin B2, carotene, calcium, phosphorus, potassium, magnesium, iron, zinc, copper, iodine and other elements; it also contains egg white, sugar, organic acid, cellulose."Tomato's ideal" brand 100% Xinjiang tomato juice is rich in a variety of natural nutrients, which is very beneficial for teenagers who are in urgent need of a variety of nutrients!

story:
WHAT IS THE BUBBLECAP?

The BubbleCap Carbonator is the smallest and simplest tool that allows you to safely dispense carbon dioxide from a gas cylinder into any soft drink bottle.

Janne, the inventor, couldn't find anywhere a simple soda machine he was looking for.

WHAT DO THEY SAY ABOUT BUBBLECAP? ALL AROUND THE WORLD!

JOURNALISTS, NOTICE! link: BubbleCap Media Kit Folder

HOW TO USE BUBBLECAP:

WHY BUBBLECAP?

SAVE COUNTER SPACE IN THE KITCHEN!

Which one fits your kitchen?

MAKE ANY DRINK FIZZY.

Natural, fresh ingredients, pure flavor of fruits, what ever matters to you. Choose your own recipe, make healthy lemonades without sweeteners and preservatives!

The fizz brings forward the pure natural flavors of fresh strawberries.

Making fresh sparkling mojito at a picnic party.

There You go!

FOR HOMEBREWERS & OTHER USES

Re-fizz a flattened soda! Make sparkling wine out of white wine or rose! Make really crispy and lightweight waffles without baking powder! How about BubbleCapping your beer, directly from the fermentor, without needing to bottle ferment to get it carbonated?

IT'S PORTABLE!

Imagine carrying a soda machine with you while hiking, or for a picnic at the beach?

Cold, fresh water from a spring, carbonated with BubbleCap Portable Carbonator, in the pure deep woods of Finland.

SAVE THE ENVIRONMENT

The number of plastic bottles produced per year has doubled over the past decade to a staggering 500 billion bottles produced just last year! Sadly, less than 1/3 of these bottles get recycled. BubbleCap helps the environment by reusing bottles: each bottle reused is a bottle not produced!

We have already saved 10 million plastic bottles from production with BubbleCap!
Imagine how many bottles we can save if everyone had a BubbleCap!

LET'S MAKE IT HAPPEN TOGETHER!


WHY INDIEGOGO?

We are based on the edge of the world, Finland, which is a beautiful, but sparsely populated, country. We need a larger audience to make a difference with our small invention with big meaning! We want to have a vibrant, collaborative community at BubbleCap to help us with our exciting venture!

Although we have the molds to make the device, we need your financial support to make the molds for the handle. Launching a new invention is an impossible mission alone, but together we can make it! Please spread the word and join us!

Welcome to The BubbleCap Life, where sharing recipes, spreading good cheer, and creating innovative and simple solutions for the environment are our goals.

The money raised will mainly be used for tooling new molds and manufacturing perks.

With all the financial, mental, and spiritual support you show us, we can make your perks great! You will be the first people to have The BubbleCap Portable Soda Machine in your hands! The more support we get, the more we can offer you in rewards. We are very thankful for any help with our venture, and we warmly welcome you to join The BubbleCap Life!

BUBBLECAP

COLORS

Although our campaign photos were shot using a black device as the model, we want to bring some color to your life! Eve, our BubbleCap brand visual manager and core shape designer, has created 3 beautiful color themes for the product. We will keep the black BubbleCap as the fourth option.

PERKS


Our EU backers: VAT is included in the shipping cost, no surprises from the customs.

HOW TO BUBBLECAP?

PREPARATION

First, you need CO2 for the carbonization. You can use either the small BubbleCap cartridge, or a big tank, which are easily found all over the world. Please check the FAQ for more info!

Secondly, fill up a PET-bottle (any soft drink bottle).  1/5th must be left empty for the CO2 or the beverage won't get properly carbonated. Preferably use cold beverages, as CO2 dissolves better in cold drinks.

CARBONATION

Third, add the carbon dioxide to the water with a lever movement, until you hear the gas escaping from the three pressure-relief valve holes. Repeat the addition of gas 4 times and shake sufficiently in between.

We developed it to be one of the safest carbonator devices available. The overpressure valve restricts the pressure to a safe level in the bottle.​

TIMELINE

FAQ

How many bottles can you carbonate with a small BubbleCap CO2 cartridge?

One 33g (1.16oz) cartridge is enough to carbonate up to 10 (0.5L or 16.91 fl. oz.) bottles, depending on the preferred fizziness. With less densely carbonated drinks, one cartridge can last longer.

How many bottles can you carbonate with a big CO2 tank?

With a single 425g (15 oz) CO2 refill you can carbonate up to 120 (0.5L) bottles of drinks, depending on the preferred fizziness. With less densely carbonated drinks, one refill can last longer.

Where would I be able to exchange or buy refillable CO2 cartridges?

The refillable (big) cartridges for household use can be refilled at any supermarket that sells them. Here in Scandinavia, we have these refills in almost all stores, even the small ones, sold under various labels. They are also widely found online, on different sites like Amazon and eBay. In some areas, these tanks are very common. In other areas, they are not so common. We cannot guarantee that there is a supplier in your area for the big CO2 tanks, so please ask your local distributors or check your online options.

Where would I be able to get more small CO2 cartridges for portable use when I start using BubbleCap?

Once we get our production ready, we are going to make it very easy to get the small cartridges through Amazon, eBay, and our own webshop. By the time the Early Bird rewards are delivered, we guarantee we will have these small cartridges in stock and available at least on our own webshop. They fit into a letter-sized shipment in most areas because of their small size.

Can you refill the small CO2 cartridges?

Sorry, that is not possible. As described, the small 33g cartridges are disposable. They must not be refilled under any circumstance. When a disposable cartridge is empty, please put it in a steel recycling bin. It is 100% recyclable steel, a natural material and safe for the environment.

There is a lot of pressure inside a CO2 tank, is the product safe to use?

We have developed BubbleCap to be one of the safest carbonators on the market. It has no moving parts, which makes it very robust and reliable. It has an overpressure valve, so the bottle will never get too much pressure and explode. With a common PET-plastic soft drink bottle, there is a 3 to 4 times safety margin.

Can you use this with a reusable bottle?

You can use it with a standard PET-bottle which has contained any fizzy drink, like a normal plastic Coke bottle. These bottles are made for disposable use, but in our opinion they don't have to be disposable. They last one month with normal use (if washed well after each use, particularly the lip). The bottle holder is 1.1" wide, so you can measure to see if it is the same diameter as your bottle. We already have thousands of friends in 22 countries worldwide using the BubbleCap’s  first version, so we’re sure it won't be difficult to find a suitable bottle to use with BubbleCap.

BubbleCap uses plastic bottles, so how it can be sustainable?

There are 5 steps in sustainable living when it comes to consumption. From the top down, they are:

  1. Consume less
  2. Reuse (BubbleCap)
  3. Recycle (less than 30% of plastic bottles are recycled to make fleece cloth, shopping bags, etc.)
  4. Reduce energy use (heat power stations, burning trash)
  5. Send waste to landfills

As you can see, BubbleCap is the best choice for a carbonated beverage!

BubbleCap is used with a big, refillable CO2 tank to make inexpensive, sustainable, and healthy sparkling drinks at home on a daily basis. The small CO2 cartridges are for occasional portable use. One disposable cartridge is still a better choice for the environment than 10 disposable plastic bottles, as steel is easy to recycle, 100% natural, and safe for the environment. A plastic bottle lasts for 1000 years, ending up as microplastic fibers eventually, which never biodegrade.

TEAM

Risks and challenges

The BubbleCap Team has been designing and manufacturing BubbleCaps since 2011. We have extensive experience in dealing with suppliers and manufacturers. We have sold over 10,000 BubbleCaps in 22 countries around the world.

During this period, we have been in constant contact with users to help develop the device to fit the hopes and ideas of our active, early adopters. We have continually been making slight adjustments to BubbleCap in order to fulfill their needs, and we are happy to present you the most up-to-date device.

Our production line is only lacking the molds for manufacturing the handle for the small CO2 cartridges for portable use. We have developed the handle with dozens of prototypes and tests, and we are ready to start the tooling and manufacturing process.

Our manufacturing partnership is in place to start once we have the funding to move forward. With components coming from various suppliers, there is always a risk of delay. However, based on our experience with supplier-quoted lead times, we feel very confident that we can deliver a quality product on time.

Throughout the production process we will provide timely updates and will be available to answer any of your questions.

From the top down, they are:
Consume less
Reuse (BubbleCap)
Recycle (less than 30% of plastic bottles are recycled to make fleece cloth, shopping bags, etc.)
Reduce energy use (heat power stations, burning trash)
Send waste to landfills
As you can see, BubbleCap is the best choice for a carbonated beverage!BubbleCap is used with a big, refillable CO2 tank to make inexpensive, sustainable, and healthy sparkling drinks at home on a daily basis. The small CO2 cartridges are for occasional portable use. One disposable cartridge is still a better choice for the environment than 10 disposable plastic bottles, as steel is easy to recycle, 100% natural, and safe for the environment. A plastic bottle lasts for 1000 years, ending up as microplastic fibers eventually, which never biodegrade.TEAMRisks and challengesThe BubbleCap Team has been designing and manufacturing BubbleCaps since 2011. We have extensive experience in dealing with suppliers and manufacturers. We have sold over 10,000 BubbleCaps in 22 countries around the world.During this period, we have been in constant contact with users to help develop the device to fit the hopes and ideas of our active, early adopters. We have continually been making slight adjustments to BubbleCap in order to fulfill their needs, and we are happy to present you the most up-to-date device.Our production line is only lacking the molds for manufacturing the handle for the small CO2 cartridges for portable use. We have developed the handle with dozens of prototypes and tests, and we are ready to start the tooling and manufacturing process.Our manufacturing partnership is in place to start once we have the funding to move forward. With components coming from various suppliers, there is always a risk of delay. However, based on our experience with supplier-quoted lead times, we feel very confident that we can deliver a quality product on time.Throughout the production process we will provide timely updates and will be available to answer any of your questions.

story:
BeerBottle is the byproduct of a Scotland-based software developer and craft beer lover. It all started when I found myself frequently buying a variety of craft beers online; it's time consuming and expensive.

 

The idea came around after a friend and I discussed the prepared variety workout meals you see advertised on the likes of Facebook. We thought we could do something similar but with a tasty mix of craft beers! We often find ourselves moving the discussion from exercise to beer...

 

We're creating a platform for the folks like us to discover new beers with very little hassle. There's also the element of surprise - you won't know what's in it until you get it!

 

The goal for BeerBottle is to create a simple and controllable platform for craft beer enthusiasts to discover.

Back BeerBottle and become part of the crew! :)

 

Prototype

This is our product landing page. It was designed by a professional and coded by myself. A little taste of where we're heading. It's live over at https://www.beerbottle.io

BeerBottle is a monthly subscription. Each month we'll deliver varied sized packages of surprise craft beer straight to your door, hand-picked by us.

 

Every package will be securely dispatched within a BeerBottle branded box. It'll contain 8, 12 or 18 different craft beers. Each beer will be hand-picked by a member of our team.

 

We know quality matters so for your money we'll make sure to only dispatch the best materials and its contents.

 

To start with we'll only deliver to the UK completely FREE of charge. As our product grows we promise to look into a more global solution.

 

 

All great ideas need a little funding. In order to get a jump start on our launch and get the first month's subscriptions out into the world, we're going to need a little help.

 

Some of the things we still have to do in preparation for our launch are:

  • Rent a local premises to store stock and carry out packaging
  • Purchase a premises licence enabling us to sell beer
  • Purchasing labelling & shipping equipment
  • Promotions & advertising
  • Other production needs & supplies

 

First, let me thank all of you who are so very generous and amazing to help BeerBottle out by backing us! We have many different rewards for you all of you. But don't just take my word for it, check them out yourself! 

 

Risks and challenges

There are always risks involved with a project like this. We are trying our hardest to account for everything that possibly could go wrong.

 

There will be a challenge when sourcing the beer, packaging and delivery and still attempting to maintain a profitable business model and keeping the product of a great quality for starting off; due to a small amount of subscriptions we won't be able to order large quantities of beer from breweries at a discounted price. This is to be expected with every startup, though.

 

There is always a logistical risk involved when just trying to get everything organised and ready to ship to everyone. We have done a lot of research in finding the best vendors for our rewards and plan to have everything shipped by the end of the months listed, if not before.

story:
The Cookbook Taste the Balkans is coming soon!

You will have the chance to enjoy over 60 tasty recipes from the Balkans, made of great ingredients, and that will take only up to one hour of your day. In the same time, you will learn more about Balkan’s people, cities, towns, and traditions. Each of the 9000 SEE municipalities that NALAS covers has a lot to offer: beautiful landscapes, remarkable cultural heritage and hospitable people. And the best food, the taste and the smell that one keeps remembering and craving for long after coming back home.

With our Cookbook, all these flavors will revive and nest in your kitchen. Read, enjoy, cook and share with your friends, not only the food, but also the amazing stories that accompany it. The Cookbook can also be a unique gift to someone you care about, who is passionate about new experiences.

    

You can help us in our mission to talk to municipalities, explore and collect the unique recipes and stories, promote them throughout the world and preserve their heritage for the future generations.

To make this happen, we need $ 35.000, that will cover the costs for:

  • Collection of recipes
  • Design of the Cookbook
  • Printing
  • Shipping

Stretch Goal 1: Collecting additional $ 15.000 will help us produce video cooking tutorials.

For your support, you will get an appreciation, PDF version of the Cookbook or the printed Cookbook.

This campaign is launched by NALAS, the Network of Associations of Local Authorities of South-East Europe, made up of 14 Local Government Associations from 12 countries of South-East Europe, gathering 9.000 local governments with 80 million citizens. Learn more about NALAS at www.nalas.eu.

 

 

By supporting this campaign you are bringing back to life unheard stories and recipes.

Help us make this Cookbook. Be part of this effort and enjoy your culinary journey!

story:
Exam Gum is formulated by students, for students. Out with the jitters and anxiety with test taking. It's our mission is to create a caffeinated gum that provides a clean, sustained focus to improve test scores, studying, workouts, and life. Exam Gum will contain the clinically studied, optimal ratio of caffeine to l-theanine, which is 1:2. It will also contain 3 B-Vitamins that have been shown to increase energy and focus. 

Gum Specifics:

  • 50mg caffeine - about half a cup of coffee
  • 100mg l-theanine
  • Daily Values of Vitamins B3, B6, and B12
  • Sugarfree, so your teeth stay clean
  • Exam Gum will be both naturally and artificially flavored

Price Range?

  • $3 per pack. Keep in mind that there are high quality ingredients in our gum, with about 6 cups of coffee worth of caffeine. The reason 1 pack is $5 is because of shipping costs (shipping costs are included in price).

What are some applications of Exam Gum?

  • to increase your efficiency while studying
  • to help yourself wake up and relax for the 8AM  standardized test on a saturday (stop testing anxiety)
  • to increase your productivity at work
  • as a pre-workout
  • to improve your life in general - caffeine is used by 90% of Americans daily to improve their lives.

Why do we need the money? / About Us

  • Exam Gum was created by a student who loved test taking. Although he was a natural, he was aided by caffeine and l-theanine. For every test, he had a researched routine of dosing 50mg caffeine throughout the tests in the form of green tea, which has the relaxing l-theanine that Exam Gum will have. He created this company so that others could implement this strategy with ease, while also using the gum to enhance other areas of their lives. Of course taking Exam Gum does not equal perfect scores, but it can greatly aid students. 
  • We have made about 15 different batches of gum in our kitchen, and have realized that we will need a manufacturer to scale this business. When home-manufacturing the gum, it is hard to be sanitary and mix the ingredients equally throughout the gum. This money will help us pay the large down payment that is associated with private-label gum manufacturers. All backers who donate over $5 will be compensated in the form of gum, future discounts, t-shirts, and hoodies. 
  • All the manufacturers we are in contact with are reputable and located in the USA. These manufacturers are top-quality and have long-standing reputations as to-notch manufacturers. We will put our customers first and will not sacrifice quality for lower cost.

Will Exam Gum Actually Help?

  • The research says yes. Caffeine can improve reaction time and increase focus, which is exactly what you need on big standardized tests like the SAT and ACT. If you can't answer all of the questions or you can't think thoroughly think through them because you can't focus on a test for 4 hours straight (very understandable), then your score will be affected. The combination of caffeine and l-theanine can be a deciding factor between scoring well and very well on these tests.

Packaging Prototypes 

What Will the Gum Look Like?

Target Launch Date

Our goal is to deliver all goods to backers by September 2020. Our manufacturers agree that this date is completely feasible. Keep in mind that backers will get their gum two weeks before the initial launch date. 

T-Shirt/Hoodies

Risks and Challenges

We've still got a long road ahead of us to bring a complete and functional gum to market. But after months of hard work, we are almost there but lack the funds to do so. Potential challenges include masking the bitter taste of caffeine in our gum and packaging/manufacturing it cost-effectively (which this Kickstarter will allow us to do).

Of course, we would be remiss to acknowledge the elephant in the room of COVID-19. However, our manufacturers are completely machine-based and sanitary, so COVID-19 should not be a problem. We also plan to distribute our gum in glove and mask, nullifying the threat of COVID-19. Also, to be completely transparent, we are located in New York but we are about 7 hours away from the city. There are about 20 cases in our county, and the creator of this project has not left his property for about 4 weeks.

Obviously a risk is that this project never comes to a complete product, and in that case, rest assured by Exam Gum and Indiegogo, you can be sure that you will get 100% of your money back.

Final Words

We will strive to be an innovative and ground-breaking company in the gum industry, which is ripe for disruption. Thank you so much for your support, and please do not hesitate to comment or email us at examgum@gmail.com if you have any questions or concerns!

story:
Chi siamo

                                             

Ciao a tutti, siamo Matteo e Pier. Siamo entrambi originari della Piana di Albenga, un meraviglioso territorio disegnato| tra il mare della Liguria e le Alpi, ricoperto da campi e serre coltivati e dagli inconfondibili profumi di fiori, ortaggi e soprattutto di erbe aromatiche.

La nostra piana è la patria del basilico, quello vero. Quello che finisce in tutti i prodotti di eccellenza che portano sull'etichetta l'inconfondibile marchietto giallo del "Basilico Genovese DOP". Come il pesto: una ricetta di straordinaria semplicità| che però porta con sé un'arte che ha conquistato tutto il mondo.


Ecco come abbiamo cominciato...

Quasi tre anni fa siamo partiti proprio da qui, siamo partiti da questo semplice concetto: unire il territorio e i suoi frutti con la genialità dei suoi abitanti per farne un'opera d'arte che conquisti il mondo. Abbiamo preparato un semplice infuso con le foglie fresche del basilico, lo abbiamo rinfrescato con il limone e addolcito con lo zucchero. Così è nato il Basilichito: il primo e unico soft drink del globo a base di basilico.

Dopo molti sacrifici e infinite porte in faccia abbiamo trasformato quel semplice infuso in un prodotto vero e proprio e abbiamo cominciato a venderlo porta a porta, nei piccoli bar e nei locali della Liguria, nei mercatini, nelle feste di paese. Ci siamo improvvisati baristi e lo abbiamo miscelato nei cocktail, lo abbiamo trasformato in uno spritz e messo perfino nel risotto!

Crediamo fortemente in questa idea perché stiamo parlando di qualcosa di veramente buono, semplice per tutti e per tutte le situazioni. Vogliamo realizzare dei prodotti sani, naturali e di grande qualità per promuovere il nostro meraviglioso territorio in tutto io mondo.

Perché abbiamo scelto il crowdfunding?

Perché la strada è ancora molto lunga, per ora siamo una piccola società, non abbiamo una struttura, i macchinari per la produzione, non abbiamo i capitali e nemmeno dipendenti. Facciamo tutto noi 2, dallo sviluppo dei prodotti alla vendita fino al marketing fai da te. Ma abbiamo le cose più importanti: passione, energia e soprattutto le idee. Ed è per questo che oggi siamo sbarcati su Indiegogo per chiedere il vostro aiuto. Quest'anno abbiamo sviluppato due nuovi progetti e ora siamo pronti per mettere in bottiglia SALVIA e TIMO. Come il Basilichito, anche queste sono bibite stupefacenti che creano, con i profumi della tradizione, un'esperienza mai provata prima. La salvia è accompagnata da una lieve nota di arancio mentre per il timo abbiamo scelto la personalità del pompelmo.

Qui entrate in gioco voi perché abbiamo bisogno di tutto il vostro supporto. Dobbiamo stampare le etichette, acquistare le materie prime e gli imballaggi, ingaggiare i fornitori e imbottigliare. Non siamo autonomi, ma vogliamo diventarlo e per far questo dobbiamo per forza crescere. Oggi siamo vincolati a dei minimi di produzione molto alti che richiedono l'impiego di altrettante risorse economiche e molto spazio a disposizione per lungo tempo. Con il vostro aiuto invece potremmo non solo avere i fondi subito disponibili ma anche smaltire i prodotti nel giro pochissimi giorni |senza dover affrontare altissimi costi di affitto.

Tutti i nostri sostenitori saranno i primi sulla faccia della terra a ricevere le nostre nuove bibite e gli unici a pagarle fino al 60% in meno rispetto al futuro prezzo di vendita. Inoltre, cosa per noi molto importante e per cui vi saremo sempre grati, potreste essere le persone che un giorno avranno contribuito a realizzare un grande progetto e diventare i protagonisti di un sogno diventato realtà.


Le opzioni d'ordine

Al termine della campagna (30 Maggio) spediremo gli "Early Bird perks" ossia i primi 100 ordini per ogni PERK entro il 30 Giugno. Tutti gli altri ordini verranno spediti subito dopo, possibilmente prima del 15 Luglio.

Stretch Goals

Abbiamo un paio di colpi in canna nel caso....

Come aggiungere le spese di spedizione e pagare

STEP 1 - Seleziona il tipo di ORDINE in alto a desta in questa pagina.

STEP 2 - Clicca su "CUSTOM" e digita l'importo pari alle spese di spedizione per l'ordine scelto e collegati con il tuo  account Facebook per accedere direttamente oppure scrivi  il tuo indirizzo e-mail per creare un account IndieGoGo.

STEP 3 - Inserisci il tuo nome e il tuo indirizzo negli appositi spazi (è MOLTO importante per noi per sapere dove spedire il tuo ordine!) e finalmente click su "CONTINUE TO PAYMENT"

STEP 4 - Controlla l'importo totale del tuo ordine e clicca su "GO TO PAYPAL" per completare l'acquisto. NOTA BENE: NON E' NECESSARIO AVERE UN CONTO PAYPAL

STEP 5 - Clicca su "PAY with credit or debit card", compila tutti i campi richiesti e poi clicca su "REVIEW and CONTINUE".

Ecco fatto, ora mentre aspetti il 30 Maggio CONDIVIDI IL NOSTRO PROGETTO CON I TUOI AMICI!


Project timeline


Siamo social!

Per favore, PASSA PAROLA e racconta di noi ai tuoi amici! Grazie!

Cercaci su:               


Cos'è il "Programma Referenza"?

Per ogni persona referenziata da te che acquisterà la nostre bibite alla SALVIA e al TIMO ti invieremo un buono sconto del 5% da utilizzare per acquistare sul nostro sito @ www.boreaerossi.it - Ecco come fare:
STEP 1 - Devi utilizzare un computer o un tablet, vai su www.indiegogo.com e accedi con le tue credenziali al tuo account oppure registrati se non hai ancora acquistato prima cliccando su "Sign Up" in alto a destra della pagina.

STEP 2 - Vai in alto a questa pagina e clicca sul pulsante "LINK" sulla sinistra del video. ATTENZIONE: assicurati di aver fatto prima l'accesso al sito.

STEP 3 - Dopo aver cliccato sul pulsante "Link" apparirà una finestra che ti comunicherà che il link di referenza è stato copiato.
STEP 4 - Ora ti basterà incollare il link in un posto sicuro e salvarlo. Dopo di che scrivi un post su Facebook o qualunque altro social media e incolla il link nel post stesso, puoi anche incollarlo su un forum, nei blog o dovunque tu voglia.
Adesso ogni volta che qualcuno dei tuoi amici acquisterà le nostre bibite utilizzando il tuo link di "Referenza" verrà automaticamente tracciato sul tuo account e alla fine della campagna riceverai i buoni sconto del 5%. 1 ogni acquisto effettuato!

Come controllare le tue "referenze":
1. Accedi al tuo account IndieGoGo.
2. Clicca sul tuo nome in alto alla pagina.
3. Seleziona “My Profile”.
4. Clicca su “Referrals” per vedere quanti persone hanno acquistato grazie a te.
5. Inizia a contare quanti buoni sconto riceverai
