Even if you can't do that, please tell everyone you know (via email, Facebook, Twitter etc) about the project. It is only through word of mouth that we can get the exposure we need to make Decanting Club a reality.Thank you, for your support.Paul, Vince, Ben & SteveChallengesThere are 5 stages to the process of getting a different wine every week to every subscriber, and each has its own challenges.1. SourcingThe club needs to source good quality wines that are from obscure countries or with interesting grapes or production methods. Wines that are more interesting and better quality than those usually found at the supermarket. These wines are more expensive and so we need to balance the cost of those against giving good value for money for subscribers. As we grow, this will become easier due to economies of scale, but it is certainly a challenge for us at the beginning.We are currently in discussions with a number of specialised UK importers of wine. In the near future we also intend to source directly from producers and wineries around the world.2. DecantingWe need to extract the wine from bottles into pouches and then seal them, all in a way that minimises air contact with the wine. Currently we have a fairly resource-intensive process to achieve this, but it worked well in our initial trials. However as the club grows we will need to automate the process to make it more efficient.3. SendingWe have been through a number of different pouch designs and are still working on the final one which will be used for launch. The pouch needs to be easily filled, and sealed. It needs to be strong enough to withstand the rigours of the Post Office and also look attractive and be easy to pour once it reaches it destination.4. TastingA large technical infrastructure needs to be put in place in order to make the app and website work seamlessly week-on-week. A back-end system needs to allow customer-management, stock control and population of the website and app. A lot of the work for this was done for the trials, but plenty more needs to be done to make it a robust and scalable solution.5. PurchasingThe main issue here relates to ordering stock in advance, so that purchasers can get their wine promptly, versus having unsold stock filling up our offices. We need to strike a good compromise between these two.

story:
WINETO is a portal that takes its name from the combination of wine and tourism.

WINETO’s idea is to put more and more people in touch with the wine world by giving them the opportunity to book wine tastings in every corner of the world. What I realised throughout my experiences and travels is that, no matter where you find yourself, you can always appreciate a unique oenological specialty. We wish to offer people the chance to try and taste local wines and, on the other hand, to give businesses the opportunity to get known on a global scale.

 

All of this will become possible with one click!

 

Through a simple registration, any business in the wine world will be able to create a profile on which wine tastings and winery tours are offered and customers can give their feedback.The portal will be developed in two directions: a section dedicated to wineries and another one for wine shops and wine bars.

WINETO also gives users the chance to buy products sold by the companies directly on their profile.

The whole project will be accompanied and pushed by a where people will be able to share their experiences by posting pictures and descriptions.

 

INVESTMENT BREAKDOWN

WINETO WEBSITE:  22.000€

The money raised will initially be used to build the Wineto.com website. It will be a platform where you can book wine tastings, purchase wines and much more. It will allow anyone, no matter where they are, to discover a wine lover's paradise, as well as to enjoy unique tasting experiences and sensations. All this will be just a click away. The creation of the Wineto website is linked to an innovative vision of the world of wine; access and registration is allowed to any business wanting to offer tastings and sell wine.

 

WINETO APP: 23.000€

Another part of the money raised will be used to create the Wineto app. Do you know what it is and how it works? Here is its profile. Wineto will be also a free mobile app and a photo-sharing social network.

It will allow you to take pictures of your wine experiences and share them instantly. As with other social media, it will be necessary to register and create your own profile; in no time at all, it will become your diary where you can relive your experiences, from your photos, whenever you want.  

WEB MARKETING: 50.000€

The key to a website's success is undoubtedly the creation of an online promotional campaign that seeks to rapidly increase the site's online visibility. The amount shown above is for web marketing expenses. This will be then split among the following:

• SEO or positioning,

• Web Analytics,

• Pay-Per-Click Campaigns,

• Banner Advertising,

• Social Media Marketing,

• Email Marketing,

• Content Creation,

• Online Reputation.

 

TRANSLATIONS INTO FOREIGN LANGUAGES:  5.000€

A portion of the money raised will be utilised for translations into foreign languages. Results from extensive analyses of website searches clearly prove that the majority of users want to "buy in their own language", which is why it is essential to translate the website so that everyone can get the most out of it. Translating a website into another language will also allow other important words to be added to the keywords, in turn helping make the website even more visible. For these reasons, Wineto believes that nowadays it is vital for a growing company to translate its website into several languages. A small investment like this could play a fundamental role in the creation of a world in which languages ​​and cultures come together under one shared passion: Wine.

All funds raised over 100.000€ will be used to enhance web marketing.

WHO WE ARE:

Defining who we are at the moment means thinking big. For now I can tell you who I am.

Francesco Camarri: the 21-year-old creator of WINETO was born and raised in the land that is known as the birthplace of one of the most well-known wines in the world: Brunello di Montalcino. A great wine passionate and an explorer of new tastes, always ready to discover new places, Francesco wishes to give more visibility to his project through the internet.

I am a young university student who has developed a strong, deep passion for the wine world. It all began with a rooted family tradition linked to wine production, and with a reflection on the values that the countryside has always been able to pass down to me from a young age. I have always admired with great enthusiasm those worn out hands, marked by effort, yet proud. Proud to be able to lift in front of their faces those wine glasses, as the outcome of love, dedication and sacrifice. I have seen wine glasses absorb such a wonderful light while exposed to the sun, and then be sipped with extreme caution and with the bliss of those who can share their joy with their loved ones.

 

 

Ilenia Almerico, Editor of Wineto: Speaking and writing about yourself is difficult for everyone, as this means explaining in simple terms who we are and what we are going to do different. On the other hand, it is also true that trust between people is built from an understanding of who we are and not only of what we do or can do. My name is Ilenia Almerico, I am 23 years old and I am a university student. I love to travel, discovering and savouring every essence found every step along a journey. Admiring landscapes, embracing colours, smells, and feeling part of nature: these are my passions. This is what drew me to the world of wine. I decided to support Francesco in writing the texts for the Wineto site because I firmly believe that tasting and travelling are a match made in heaven... And so I turn to you: What better way than a simple click?

 

RULES FOR SHIPPING THE REWARDS

USA: Custom duty are included. Utah not served.

CANADA: Custom duty are excluded (about 5/8€ per bottle).

ASIA: Custom duty are excluded.

RUSSIA and SOUTH AFRICA: Custom duty are excluded.

story:
This project started 4 years ago as an idea said in passing and is now in production. The Indiegogo is being used as a way to accept orders while the tool is in production. The turnaround will be 4-6 months, with the initial tooling phase taking the longest. Once the initial tooling is complete, future runs will take less time and the cost will be cheaper. Overseas shipping has been figured out and drop shipping once stateside is lined up. The revenue that is generated will be put towards shipping and receiving, updates to infrastructure and future product development.

Improve every cocktail with the Poor Man's Kitchen Kilpatrick Fine Strainer. Made by bartenders, for bartenders! #improvecocktails #makebetterdaiquiries #mixithowyouliveit

story:
I urge everyone to contribute funds for farmers, let's make a difference in the farmers lives.

I am 31 yr old man from Kalwa - Thane, India. Thane is a city adjacent to Mumbai. I  works with the German MNC "Hettich" in Vashi, Navi Mumbai. I am a Management graduate from PTVAs IM, Ville Parle (E.)

After hearing about Actors Nana Patekar and Makarand Anaspure, who came forward to provide financial assistance of Rs 15,000(US $235) each to the families of 62 farmers from Vidarbha region who have committed suicide.While Nana Patekar is known for his memorable roles in a number of Bollywood movies, Anaspure is a popular actor in the Marathi film industry.

I thought for a moment what I could do to help these farmers. I am not a wealthy man who could do philanthropy but one idea came to my mind. Thanks to Mr.Thom Feeney who tried to raise funds for Greek Bailout. 

There are various NGO who tries to collect funds for farmers welfare but they don't have robust platform to collect these funds. And people doesn't go and find NGOs to donate.

As I was little aware about crowd funding, I thought why not I should bridge the gap and collect money for farmers welfare from as much as numbers of people who are willing donate as per their capacity.

Higher the money we able to generate more the number of families will be saved. Their requirement is not sky high. Normally it is identified that major reason for suicide was debt apart from several other reasons but all are affecting to their income .

In 2012, the National Crime Records Bureau of India reported 13,754 farmer suicides.The highest number of farmer suicides were recorded in 2004 when 18,241 farmers committed suicide.The farmers suicide rate in India has ranged between 1.4 to 1.8 per 100,000 total population, over a 10-year period through 2005.

Maharashtra is by far the epicenter of the crisis, with over 10,000 recorded farmer suicides between 2011 and 2013. This year, the Marathwada region alone has seen over 200 farmer suicides in just three months.

According to figures from the Ministry of Agriculture, the total of number of suicides committed by farmers for agrarian reasons in the last three years stand.


What We Need

It might seem like a herculean task. But Little Drops of Water Make the Mighty Ocean. So every little contribution is important. There's no exact figure to quote for the fund but more the better. The number of internet users in India in 2014 was 243,198,922. Which is very high by any standard. Even if the 1/4 th of them donate Rs. 100 (US $ 1.5) which is lesser than a Bollywood movie ticket will fetch around Rs. 6,079,973,000 (US $94,999,578). If I take Rs. 15000 per family then it will support 405,331. Which is staggering.
Though I does not met Mr.Nana Patekar personally but I will give all the money to him for further distribution of money needy farmers. As he has status and reach to do it and he seems to be the right man with ethics. And I personally find it's safer to hand over raised money to him.

If you have question about how much I have donated??
I personally donated a little drop i.e US $ 10

If anyone has doubt about me. He can come and meet me at my home address mentioned as below:
301/20, Ashtagandha Chs, Manisha Nagar, Kalwa West, Thane : 400605

story:
NOW AVAILABLE EXCLUSIVELY ON AMAZON

 

The Food Plant: Plant Based Fast Food Vol. 1 is an Original Selection of over 70+ FAST VEGAN RECIPES.

All the recipes are 100% Vegan and can be adjusted to suit personal tastes and requirements.

Each recipe is laid out in an easy to read format, clearly stating Ingredients, how many it'll serve and importantly Time. As this is Fast Food all recipes are made in the fastest way possible, all recipes are designed to be at least 30% faster than standard to make.

Plant Based Food isn't boring or slow to make as you can see here, checkout a selection of the recipes you can find inside:

 

ARJUN GOWDA | AUTHOR • CEO • VLOGGER

Hi, I'm Arjun. I've been cooking for 21 years and eating for 23.I've been on plant based foods for a while now so I figured I'd share my recipes.

That’s the short story, the longer one here is; I have been interested in food and cooking since I was 2 and have been following a Vegetarian/Vegan diet since I was 22. Since changing to a Plant Based Diet I started up a Food Blog (https://thefoodplant.wordpress.com/) and continue to share the recipes that I create, showing how fast and easy plant based food really can be.

story:
Manna Nutrition Bars are whole food nutrition bars that fund clean water solutions. We make our vegan and paleo-friendly bars with raw and organic superfood ingredients. They are free of refined sugars, artificial colors, and artificial flavors, and deliciously fill common nutrient gaps found in the Standard American Diet. So they provide a good source of heart healthy fats, fiber, and micronutrients that can completely transform your energy levels. Tasting is believing!

As a brand, we are passionate about bringing water to families and children in developing countries. That’s why each box of Manna Nutrition Bars sends 800 liters of clean water to a child or family in need. So far, Manna supporters have funded over 50,000 liters of clean water for families in Costa Rica and Ethiopia. Food the way nature intended it, so you can both do good and eat well.

Manna Bars Are...

  • Vegan
  • Gluten-Free
  • Paleo-Friendly
  • GMO-Free
  • Sustainably Sourced

We've met FDA requirements and partnered with an amazing US-based manufacturer, so Manna Bars are shelf ready. We're seeking support from our family, friends, and the Indiegogo community to finish R&D for our third Manna Bar flavor and to purchase raw ingredients and packaging.

Manna's Mission...

Our mission is to empower others in their pursuit of health and well-being. We are dedicated to simplifying clean eating through continuous education and innovation of trustworthy products. Bri, one of our founders has been maintaining a 100 pound weight-loss for five years and we thrive off of helping others create and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

We also recognize that everyone isn't blessed with the right to choose when or how they eat and drink. As a brand, we are committed to bringing water to families and children in developing countries. A portion of each Manna Nutrition purchase will be used to fund short and long-term clean water, sanitation, and hygiene solutions in areas of need.

Our goal is to deliver materials to generate close to 1,000,000 liters of filtered drinking water to families and children in 2017. Thus far Manna supporters have funded over 50,000 liters of clean water with the first 32,000 sent to schools in Costa Rica this past May, and the remainder pledged to WATERisLIFE programs in Project Omo Valley, Ethiopia.

Flavors + Nutrition...

Cherry Almond Chocolate Chip is made with delicious cherries, organic almond butter, organic quinoa crisps, 100% raw cacao chocolate chips, and other whole food ingredients you can view in the nutritional panel below. It tastes like chewy trail mix. Yum.

"Absolutely obsessed with these @mannanutrition bars right now. Great source of protein for a perfect snack on the go. I've been melting them in the microwave and they taste like brownie batter." -@thepaleopeach

Cacao Cashew Brownie is made with organic cashew butter, raw cacao powder, maca root, dates, and a few other whole food ingredients you can check out below. So good.

"Honestly the cacao cashew brownie... is the best nutrition bar I've ever had. Make sure to try these from @mannanutrition. Taste so good." -@vegantake0ver

We've done a lot of research and worked with a development specialist to bring nutrient dense bars that are rich in heart-healthy fats to our current and future customers. Here's why...

"For more than half a century, the conventional wisdom among nutritionists and public health officials was that fat is dietary enemy number one – the leading cause of obesity and heart disease. It appears the wisdom was off. And not just off. Almost entirely backward. According to a new study from the National Institutes of Health, a diet that reduces carbohydrates in favor of fat – including the saturated fat in meat and butter – improves nearly every health measurement, from reducing our waistlines to keeping our arteries clear, more than the low-fat diets that have been recommended for generations. "The medical establishment got it wrong," says cardiologist Dennis Goodman, director of Integrative Medicine at New York Medical Associates. "The belief system didn't pan out." It's not the conclusion you would expect given the NIH study's parameters." - via Men's Journal.

Cherry Almond Chocolate Chip

Cacao Cashew Brownie

Risks and Challenges

Hey you know how it is when you're in it! We're facing all of the same risks and challenges as other entrepreneurs who've put their all into a vision. Our children are watching us, they came to the manufacturing meeting and have contributed ideas throughout this entire process. They're also 8, 7, and 5. We're doing the work and our best to plan, learn, anticipate, and be present all at the same time! That being said we've worked with a highly qualified team of mentors and have mapped a number of ways we can arrive at a successful 2017 for Manna Nutrition, and we thank you for visiting, supporting, and helping us spread the word.

The little people behind Manna Nutrition...

...And the big people.

Thanks for visiting, we can't wait to share Manna Bars with you!

According to a new study from the National Institutes of Health, a diet that reduces carbohydrates in favor of fat – including the saturated fat in meat and butter – improves nearly every health measurement, from reducing our waistlines to keeping our arteries clear, more than the low-fat diets that have been recommended for generations. "The medical establishment got it wrong," says cardiologist Dennis Goodman, director of Integrative Medicine at New York Medical Associates. "The belief system didn't pan out." It's not the conclusion you would expect given the NIH study's parameters." - via Men's Journal.Cherry Almond Chocolate ChipCacao Cashew BrownieRisks and ChallengesHey you know how it is when you're in it! We're facing all of the same risks and challenges as other entrepreneurs who've put their all into a vision. Our children are watching us, they came to the manufacturing meeting and have contributed ideas throughout this entire process. They're also 8, 7, and 5. We're doing the work and our best to plan, learn, anticipate, and be present all at the same time! That being said we've worked with a highly qualified team of mentors and have mapped a number of ways we can arrive at a successful 2017 for Manna Nutrition, and we thank you for visiting, supporting, and helping us spread the word.The little people behind Manna Nutrition......And the big people.Thanks for visiting, we can't wait to share Manna Bars with you!

story:
What is PlateRate?


 

We all connect with friends, family, and followers, especially when it comes to food! Shouldn't you be rewarded for helping others through your social media reviews, followers, thoughts and ideas? (See: “Why Facebook’s next competitor will pay you to post”)

 

PlateRate is the only dining app and website that:

  1. Rewards you often 30% and up to 60% credit in free food for trying and reviewing specific menu items and rewards you for having your friends and followers join and review too! 
  2. Customizes food/dietary preferences & needs in the app (e.g., Carnivores, Vegetarians, Paleo, Vegan, Kosher, Sustainably Caught Seafood, Halal, Cruelty-Free Meat, Nut-free, etc.)
  3. Helps find the food that you love by searching the locations and menu items based on your customized flavor profile! 
  4. Helps you get recommendations from friends and family no matter where in the world you are, based on what they liked and ensuring the food is aligned with your food preferences and taste!
  5. Allows you to order-ahead to eat in the restaurant and make a reservation for as short or long as you’d like.
  6. Guides restaurants by sharing your thoughts, likes, and dislikes!

 

Our individual members are incentivized to grow their PlateRate community and try new restaurant menu items to find their new food-faves! This is done through our unique discount and reward programs.  

Our platform provides a close-knit community and an open forum for food-lovers to communicate. They are empowered to spread the word by recommending dishes to their friends and answering inquiries from other users on the platform.

The customers can assign ratings to each dish that they have tried and to other aspects of their dining experiences, including service quality and various other restaurant characteristics (e.g. wait time, ambiance, kid-friendly, handicap accessible, etc.).

PlateRate also allows our restaurant partners to track the preferences, reviews and spending of new and existing customers, which allows them to refine and test new menu offerings, and maximize revenue over time.

 

Why choose PlateRate instead of the competition?

PlateRate’s #1 cultural value is integrity above all else, including before profitability. If you want to support a company that values integrity first, support PlateRate!

We don't accept money to change search results – ever! We're focused on creating the most useful and honest search results for you. We always provide accurate search information based on your request.

 

Our competitors favor restaurants that pay them for preferential treatment! They steer you to their most profitable customers. 

 

Main takeaways from the article:

  1. Seamless and Grubhub make more money from some restaurants than others.
  2. They will show you the restaurants that are most profitable for them, even if they’re not the highest rated or the best match for the search criteria you entered.
  3. This is a pretty clear example of putting profitability before honesty and accuracy, which is something PlateRate will NEVER do. Our first cultural value is integrity, before everything else, including profitability!!

(At PlateRate, we don’t play “favorites” in this way, because we don’t accept money from restaurants to boost their ratings!)

 

How does the Referral Bonus work?

When you refer a member to PlateRate and they sign up using your referral link, you are marked as their referral source.  For every $1 of revenue that your referrals bring to PlateRate, you will earn 5 cents (5%) instantly to spend on your next PlateRate experience! For example, if you refer 100 friends, each of whom generate revenue of $10 to PlateRate, then you’ll get $50 as a Referral Bonus to buy food on PlateRate!

PlateRate Expert Reviews

  • PlateRate will match patron taste preferences to the restaurant menu items.
  • PlateRate will then give a “FlavorMatch” compatibility score for each menu item with an “expert review.”
  • This will then drive higher menu ratings by customers.
  • Knowing that they will like the taste of the food makes the customer more likely to enjoy their food!

 

Food/Dietary Preferences & FlavorMatch?

Half of all Americans have dietary preferences and nearly all have taste preferences which can not be satisfied based on the search options currently available online or through mobile applications. We also know that satisfied restaurant goers use reviews and mobile sharing to drive business to the places they love, and now the restaurants can respond to them.

So many flavors, so many dishes to try, so little time. How many times do you eat out a week, a month or a year? What if there was a way to know what meals you would like more than others so every meal out or in (can’t live without delivery) would be great.

Have you ever ordered something at a restaurant expecting one thing and it turned out to be something completely different? Or you ordered a dish and it was the best thing you’ve ever had and you’d like to try something else like it. With the PlateRate FlavorMatch it is possible. 

Too sweet, Too spicy, Not spicy enough? It doesn’t matter. Part of the menu item review process on PlateRate is adding an expert review where you can rate the full sensory experience and more: sweet/salty/savory/spicy/bitter/sour.

If you’ve ever watched a cooking show competition on TV you know how the food is displayed is part of the overall score. You know from personal experience that how your meal looks can affect your overall experience. In the expert review you can also review plating (how nice a dish looks), serving size, and how healthy it is.

Also, it’s quite difficult to find out if a restaurant has specific menu items that meet those particular requirements. Sure, a “vegan-themed” restaurant will definitely have menu items that are OK for someone who follows vegan restrictions… but most other restaurants also offer cuisine that would suit a vegan lifestyle, and PlateRate makes it easier to find, so everyone can enjoy the plethora of dining options out there!  With the click of one button, anything you can’t eat will be hidden from you, and we will highlight what you can eat by default vs. what you can request to be prepared to meet your food preferences.

 

What is PlateRate's Social Impact?

Drive humane farm-to-table practices at restaurants and avoid animal cruelty

Animals make our lives better in many-many ways, and PlateRate can help guide and make users aware of better resourcing. A few simple changes to how we dine can improve life for millions of farm animals by steering the industry toward humane meat sourcing.

As a consumer, you have the power to change how restaurants approach their supply chain strategy. Take the first step today, and join PlateRate to help guide us all toward dining with a clear conscience!

Help Feed People

If we can enjoy the pleasure of dining out with friends, then perhaps we can share some of the bounty. PlateRate is working to help restaurants take leftover food and donate them to organizations that can use it to prepare people in need.

Train People

Frankly, if we have to spend a great deal of our life working, then shouldn’t it be interesting, productive, and fun? When we are happy with what we are doing, we do it better.

https://www.theguardian.com/science/2010/jul/11/happy-workers-are-more-productive

Joining PlateRate allows us to help train and elevate people to do their dream job.

 

Other Ways You Can Help?

Our crowdfunding proceeds will speed up our launch for everyone, and we are certainly grateful for any contributions to this campaign! However, we are aware that some people just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean they can't help in other ways:

  • Tell your friends and followers, who might be able to help, about PlateRate.
  • Use Indiegogo share tools to spread the word to help get PlateRate funded faster.
  • Sign up to be an early pioneer user, as everyone can participate in the rewards process.
  • Be mindful of the expanding campaign of cruelty free meat and keep us posted as to initiatives.
  • Look for ways to help feed the hungry and keep us posted regarding any cool programs you find!

Please contact us with questions and get signed up early! Email: paul.cedardall@platerate.com  

 

Risks & Challenges?

The major “risk” inherent in trying to launch any kind of consumer-based app is, obviously, not being able to create a sufficiently robust following to make the app valuable. After all, this kind of social participation initiative only works if there’s a community of people engaging with it!

However, we believe that the PlateRate app is unique and appealing enough to capture the interest of the masses, and our value-add proposition to restaurants will create an eagerness to adopt our solution and help us build a following! Plus, we are working to tap into numerous social media resources by rewarding our users to tap into their networks to “spread the word” about PlateRate, which is aimed at creating a snowball effect of users downloading and using our app.

Finally, we will look to allocate a portion of the proceeds from this crowd-funding campaign toward marketing strategies to maximize exposure and brand awareness of PlateRate, and help boost the community-building aspect of this endeavor!

story: Hello world! We are team 12 of the Florida International University Senior Design class and we are raising funds to create an automatic, fast, filling and sealing machine for small containers. This machine is intended for anyone who would like to process their own beverages or liquid foods into small containers for local distribution. Our machine is being designed, assembles, and programmed by students who have a dream of providing inventors a cheap and easy way to start their own small food or beverage company. We need your help to get this project up and running so please donate what you can to support our cause! Thank you!
story_txt: Hello world! We are team 12 of the Florida International University Senior Design class and we are raising funds to create an automatic, fast, filling and sealing machine for small containers. This machine is intended for anyone who would like to process their own beverages or liquid foods into small containers for local distribution. Our machine is being designed, assembles, and programmed by students who have a dream of providing inventors a cheap and easy way to start their own small food or beverage company. We need your help to get this project up and running so please donate what you can to support our cause! Thank you!

story:
MMS is about crafting great cocktails at home. It combines measuring, mixing and straining into one simple tool. Make drinks exactly the way you like it. Learn how to make the classics. Explore new cocktails. Share your skills with your friends and family. Go on, have a drink.

MMS is made of high-quality food grade Stainless Steel. It can be stored flat in a drawer or hung on a hook through the strainer slots. Give it a quick wipe when making different cocktails for friends. No need to put in the dishwasher, MMS likes good old soap and water. 

Measure

The cutouts on the bottom of MMS indicate ounces to help you measure right in your mixing glass.

Cocktail crafting starts by following a recipe. Properly measuring ingredients is the first step to success. By using MMS for every cocktail you make you will have consistently accurate results. With MMS you can craft your cocktail exactly the way you like it.

MIX

MMS has a curved portion of the neck to facilitate easy mixing.

Sure, thoroughly combining your ingredients is important but mixing does so much more. First, stirring with ice chills down your drink. Second, mixing with ice creates dilution, and thats a good thing. Drinks need a little dilution to round out and balance flavors.

STRAIN

The strainer face of MMS fits perfectly inside a pint glass.

That ice you used has done its job. Now its time to park your drink into a nice glass, either one that is chilled or one with fresh ice. The strainer will hold back the ice and allow your perfectly crafted cocktail to flow into the serving glass.

Because you deserve a nice drink and you shouldn’t have to rely on a bartender. MMS is designed so you can have a great cocktail at home.

There is a personal satisfaction in doing things for yourself. When you make yourself, not only are you proud but your reward is a tasty cocktail.

Have you ever made yourself a cocktail after a long day of work? Feels good right? If you haven’t yet, you should. MMS is for the cocktail regular and novice.

If you are looking to start a home bar MMS is a great way to fill out your tool kit. MMS is great for parties and get togethers. You can craft a different drink for each guest, or better yet let them make one for themselves.

Sure! MMS comes with a drinks booklet to help you get started crafting cocktails. If you want more just buy the extended booklet

story:
We are plate lickers... and we invented the world's first fork accessory! Now you can, lick your plate in public!

It's a miniature spatula for your fork. No more awkward first dates, never miss a drop, and bring the party to any dinner table. Made with FDA approved food grade silicone for all your plate licking needs.

The Forktula (patent pending), is a small FDA approved food grade silicone spatula for your fork. It easily slides on to the two outer prongs of any standard fork. Now all you do is scrape, swipe, wipe, and squeegee your plate to victory!
 
The silicone is durable to withstand high heat or low cold, while also being able to stretch and mold to fit any standard fork. In developing the design we tested various spatulas, measured hundreds of forks, and found that most forks are within 1mm in size difference. We made the Forktula to fit directly in the middle, allowing the silicone to stretch for large forks, or grip on to smaller forks. The double holes in the Forktula allow it to not wobble or spin around on your fork, so you've got nothing but clean plates every time.
 
 

Why the Forktula?

It's the world's first and only fork accessory. Why not? We have thousands of phone accessories and none for a fork? Forks have been around forever.. We've solved the world's smallest problem. Now you can get all that delicious sauce off your plate and into your mouth. 

The Forktula is a conversation starter. “Have you heard of the world’s first fork accessory?” is the number one question we ask in our lives these days. The expression of joy and laughter people give us when we tell them what the product is, is the reason we are doing this. When you put this thing on your fork, you instantly stand out in a room and people have to ask what you’re doing.

story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone!  My name is Kris Blessing and I'm an ambitious 31 year old from Washington DC.   I am a recent graduate of the University of Maryland and have a passion for architecture, sustainability, and business.  I love my hometown, and I've watched it grow and evolve just as I have over the years.  From years of managerial and food service experience, I've come to love interacting with new people and giving them a place to relax and enjoy time with family and friends. There is so much culture in this thriving and vibrant city, and one thing I think everyone, from all walks of life, can connect over is a cold glass of beer.  Beer and wine is shared with friends after a long day at work, during your favorite team's playoff quest, or during a romantic evening out with that special someone.  The goal of the self-serve concept is to make the experience as exciting and stress-free as possible.  I want patrons to be able to taste and experience beers they've never tried before, from breweries across the country, without the expense or hassle of buying an entire glass of beer.  The PourMyBeer system is so unique because it allows customers to try as many beers as they want with little expense, and hone in on their favorite brew.  I don't think there is anything more satisfying than finding your favorite brew or wine to share with your friends. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

There are two possible places your money will go if you finance this campaign, and this will depend on whether I am able to purchase an existing bar or if I end up leasing retail space.  In the first scenario, almost all of the money raised will  go towards the purchase of the existing bar. Most bars being sold in the DC area cost anywhere between $95,000 and $500,000.   In the second scenario, the money will go towards monthly payments of the space, and the subsequent interior fit-out to transform the space into a new bar.  Leasing a space can cost anywhere between $3000 and $15,000 per month, depending on location.  Interior fit outs of a small space like a bar would cost about $50,000.

The self-serve system cost itself is fairly meager next to the start-up expenses and monthly payments.  The self-serve concept costs about $1000 per tap, so a little over $30,000 for 30 taps.  I have been in contact with investors to help me get the rest of the way towards my goal, but contributions here would be vitally important.  

There are significant perks associated with funding my idea:

1) If you contribute at least $500, your contribution will be considered a loan (assuming my bar opens).  Within a year of opening, I will return 100% of your money, and include 15% interest.  

- A $500 contribution would mean a return of $575

- A $1000 contribution would mean a return of $1200

- A $5,000 contribution would mean a return of $6,250

 

2) For contributions under $500, you will receive a beer voucher available to use at our bar when it opens. (Be sure to click on the appropriate perk when you contribute!)

 

I have talked to multiple bars that have installed the PourMyBeer system, and they have stated that the self-serve concept has almost doubled their profits.  Weekday business has increased significantly, and overall business has drastically improved.  I think this concept would absolutely thrive in a big city like Washington D.C

 

Risks & Challenges

I do understand that there are risks to your contribution.  While I'm super excited and want to get this bar open as quickly as possible, I recognize that speed-bumps are part of the journey and that achieving a goal is not always as easy as it seems on paper. 

Challenges include: Acquiring the necessary funding, acquiring a beer and wine license, and marketing this idea to breweries. However, I do believe in people and their power to have faith in a good concept.  I really think that when there's a quality idea on the table, people will put the time and money into making it a reality.  During my time as a manager in the coffee industry, I transformed a struggling retail store making just over $600,000 a year in gross profit into a $1.1 million a year enterprise.  When I'm dedicated to something, I don't let up.  I know that I am willing to put in the work to make this bar a reality.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hello everyone!  My name is Kris Blessing and I'm an ambitious 31 year old from Washington DC.   I am a recent graduate of the University of Maryland and have a passion for architecture, sustainability, and business.  I love my hometown, and I've watched it grow and evolve just as I have over the years.  From years of managerial and food service experience, I've come to love interacting with new people and giving them a place to relax and enjoy time with family and friends. There is so much culture in this thriving and vibrant city, and one thing I think everyone, from all walks of life, can connect over is a cold glass of beer.  Beer and wine is shared with friends after a long day at work, during your favorite team's playoff quest, or during a romantic evening out with that special someone.  The goal of the self-serve concept is to make the experience as exciting and stress-free as possible.  I want patrons to be able to taste and experience beers they've never tried before, from breweries across the country, without the expense or hassle of buying an entire glass of beer.  The PourMyBeer system is so unique because it allows customers to try as many beers as they want with little expense, and hone in on their favorite brew.  I don't think there is anything more satisfying than finding your favorite brew or wine to share with your friends. 

 
What We Need & What You Get
There are two possible places your money will go if you finance this campaign, and this will depend on whether I am able to purchase an existing bar or if I end up leasing retail space.  In the first scenario, almost all of the money raised will  go towards the purchase of the existing bar. Most bars being sold in the DC area cost anywhere between $95,000 and $500,000.   In the second scenario, the money will go towards monthly payments of the space, and the subsequent interior fit-out to transform the space into a new bar.  Leasing a space can cost anywhere between $3000 and $15,000 per month, depending on location.  Interior fit outs of a small space like a bar would cost about $50,000.
The self-serve system cost itself is fairly meager next to the start-up expenses and monthly payments.  The self-serve concept costs about $1000 per tap, so a little over $30,000 for 30 taps.  I have been in contact with investors to help me get the rest of the way towards my goal, but contributions here would be vitally important.  
There are significant perks associated with funding my idea:
1) If you contribute at least $500, your contribution will be considered a loan (assuming my bar opens).  Within a year of opening, I will return 100% of your money, and include 15% interest.  
- A $500 contribution would mean a return of $575
- A $1000 contribution would mean a return of $1200
- A $5,000 contribution would mean a return of $6,250
 
2) For contributions under $500, you will receive a beer voucher available to use at our bar when it opens. (Be sure to click on the appropriate perk when you contribute!)
 
I have talked to multiple bars that have installed the PourMyBeer system, and they have stated that the self-serve concept has almost doubled their profits.  Weekday business has increased significantly, and overall business has drastically improved.  I think this concept would absolutely thrive in a big city like Washington D.C

 
Risks & Challenges

I do understand that there are risks to your contribution.  While I'm super excited and want to get this bar open as quickly as possible, I recognize that speed-bumps are part of the journey and that achieving a goal is not always as easy as it seems on paper. 
Challenges include: Acquiring the necessary funding, acquiring a beer and wine license, and marketing this idea to breweries. However, I do believe in people and their power to have faith in a good concept.  I really think that when there's a quality idea on the table, people will put the time and money into making it a reality.  During my time as a manager in the coffee industry, I transformed a struggling retail store making just over $600,000 a year in gross profit into a $1.1 million a year enterprise.  When I'm dedicated to something, I don't let up.  I know that I am willing to put in the work to make this bar a reality.

story:
BACKERS AND VISITORS,

I would like to thank everyone that has visited the campaign page over the last 6 weeks.  Although we did not reach the goal of our campaign, valuable information and excellent data analysis was received to allow us to reevaluate the methods of marketing.

The product will be for sale on our website at www.lilfarmhomegarden.com starting on April 26, 2021. The program will include free shipping and handling as well as discounts for the first 10 days and a terrific Mothers Day Sale.

Thank you again,

John Pawelski

Developer

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Lil' Farm Home Garden is a portable, compact and lightweight elevated garden giving the home gardener a product which can be used indoors or outdoors, in a variety of locations.

A functional garden which weighs under 30 pounds, providing easy assembly and location setup by one person. The garden is wheelchair accessible and is hand crafted from American materials.

Lil' Farm Home Garden comes partially assembled and can be ready to start planting in a few minutes after removal from the package, you will add soil, seeds, sunlight/artificial light and water.

The Lil' Farm Home Garden Story

The Lil' Farm Home Garden design started in 2016 to provide my mother an easy to use stand-up garden in her elder years. It needed to be lightweight and easy to assemble, compact to fit on her balcony and large enough to provide her with a good planting space but small enough to move  and setup in a small space. Her ability to kneel and weed is limited and I wanted to provide her with a product that would remove those barriers and provide her with her joy of gardening in an easy to use product. The final outcome took longer than I planned but much better than I ever thought possible at the beginning.

After her use of the garden I decided that it could be used by others who wish to have a compact, but easy to use home gardening solution. I tested the product at my Colorado home for 2 years to make the product withstand all types of weather. It has now been decided that the Lil' Farm Home Garden is ready for the world to use.

A successful campaign will allow me to produce and market Lil’ Farm Home Garden, providing people with an easy method to create a healthy food source.

 

 

Fresh, Wholesome and Healthy Food in your Home

As fresh food prices rise and the need for healthy food is increased the Lil' Farm Home Garden is an excellent solution for people that desire a low cost, easy and joyful method of acquiring their herbs, spices and vegetables. Access to affordable, healthy food is becoming an increasing problem,  as big-ag uses crazy chemical methods to make coloring and freshness an illusion.

Time, money and location are big hurdles to overcome in gardening. Lil' Farm Home Garden provides a compact product with large potential and a low operating cost, providing the urban gardener a fun and a productive hobby.

Lil' Farm Home Garden is made from 100% American materials, which are easily assembled without being a carpenter, mechanical engineer or the use of tools.  As seen on the assembly video below the Lil Farm Home Garden can be assembled by a single person in minutes without the use of tools or mechanical expertise.

WHAT IS NEEDED and WHAT IS GIVEN

  • The funding goal of $10,200.00  will be used to purchase the materials to provide the initial backers with a Lil’ Farm Home Garden in their homes.
  • The perks provided to the backers are deep discounts for the product of up to 40% reduction in price.
  • The planting container will come in black, brown and green.

IMPORTANCE OF THIS PROJECT

This is a uniquely designed elevated garden made of different materials and concepts than the competing products. Many people in America desire home grown products but have no desire or land to garden in a conventional manner, nor do they have the desire or have expertise to assemble heavy wood products which take 1-3 hours. The Lil’ Farm Home Garden is a self-contained unit and has a small footprint to accommodate properties that have little space or no or unusable land. The garden can be used indoor with artificial lighting or outdoor using sunlight. It is low tech so the user needs to enjoy working the plants and seeing their work become a reality in food source.

USE ON A BALCONY

USE ON A ROOFTOP

USE IN A SMALL SPACE

USE INDOORS

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

I have been an entrepreneur for over 30 years and have overcome many business obstacles.  Whenever a new project is launched, whether in a crowdfunding environment or opening a store front, the challenge is too survive the hurdles cast by the business environment. Good planning, proper funding and a good team of people on the project creates a successful venture.

This project has been self-funded but the cost of materials and labor make the Crowdfunding environment the ideal resource to move the Lil' Farm Home Garden from a prototype and testing product to production.

HOW CAN YOU HELP WITHOUT MONETARY BACKING

Should the reader feel like they do not wish to provide funds but would like to see a successful campaign I ask that you assist in the marketing of this product, providing your family, friends and associates the information about the product.

SUMMARY OF PRODUCT

The Lil’ Farm Home Garden can be assembled without the use of any tools and once emptied of soil, can be dis-assembled for moving or storage. It is compact enough to be used on a standard size balcony and eliminates the need for the user to kneel or weed.

After testing the product for nearly two years it is ready to be placed into the market place. I made sure the product would withstand super wet soil with the drainage system providing quick removal of excess water and hot and cold weather with heavy winds.

This patent pending product is 100% American materials and labor. It will provide years of enjoyment, planting and growing delicious, healthy organic herbs, spices or vegetables. Your healthy food source will be at your fingertips, fresh for each meal, providing wholesome food and a reduction in your organic food cost.

During this campaign you can be one of the first to have this uniquely designed elevated garden at a limited time only at a discounted price. Start enjoying fresh herbs, spices or vegetables from the comfort of your home, having full knowledge of your food source.

Choose your reward and it will be delivered to your home after the campaign concludes. Shipping will be calculated based on your location and added to the cost at the end of the campaign.

  • USE INDOOR OR OUTDOORS
  • WEIGHS LESS THAN 30 POUNDS
  • WHEELCHAIR ACCESSIBLE
  • EASY ASSEMBLY
  • RETRACTS FOR EASY PORTABILITY
  • HEIGHT PREVENTS WILDLIFE DESTRUCTION
  • BACK SAVING!!  ELIMINATES KNEELING!
  • GROW FRESH, HEALTHY FOOD
  • IDEAL FOR URBAN LIVING
  • LOW MAINTENANCE
  • SELF WATERING OPTIONS AVAILABLE
  • ACCESSORIES AVAILABLE

 

Thank you for your support and business.

story:
Our bodies rust every day, you know?

Our car will be maintained regularly, but our most precious body is often ignored!It has become the norm for Chinese people to make money with their bodies when they are young and to buy their lives when they are old.Why don't you take good care of yourself when you are young?Make money at the same time must take good care of the body, if you ignore it, it will slowly betray you... Pro, must remember!According to the survey, although the life expectancy of Chinese people has been extended, about half of the people over 65 years old in China have been taking a variety of drugs due to different diseases. Most of the elderly spend their days in the hospital intermittently.

However, this is not necessarily the case. In fact, many people's suffering from diseases can be prevented through maintenance in middle age or controlled by nutrition adjustment now.

In the United States, there are more and more "senior citizens" who are in good physical and mental condition. They are always healthy and full of vitality. We can see them in tennis courts, adult education classes, gymnasiums, and sometimes even in professional places.Researchers have conducted research on these elderly people who have a good old age and found that the maintenance carried out as early as middle age is the cornerstone of their good health after old age!

 

It's better to keep in good health in advance than to spend money on treatment

When the ruddy complexion quietly fades away, the wrinkles of years climb up the woman's face; when the energy is overdrawn for a long time, the pressure of career makes men unable to do what they want; when the heart and brain function is failing day by day, parents always have to face the threat of vascular sclerosisWe can't help asking: what steals our health?

British scientists have pointed out: iron will rust, silver will turn black, in fact, the human body will rust.The aging process of human body is similar to that of cut apple, which is the result of oxidation.Many chronic diseases of human beings are caused by oxidative stress, that is, the human body is rusting every day. The "rust" produced is called "free radical" in medicine, which is the root of many diseases of human body.Environmental pollution, life pressure, radiation and other factors are "oxidizing" our bodies all the time, reducing human life expectancy."Oxidation" is the main culprit that deprives people of health in life, and it is an important factor that leads to human aging and health problems!Experiments show that animals with low oxidative metabolism rate and strong antioxidant capacity are not easy to get sick, stronger and have the longest life span.

With the increase of age, our self-healing ability becomes weaker, and the damage caused by free radicals is manifested, such as wrinkles, color spots, poor energy, organ aging, arteriosclerosis, diabetes, cataract, cardiovascular disease, Alzheimer's disease, arthritis, cancer, etc., which are considered to be related to free radicals.

With the improvement of living standards, the popularization of nutrition knowledge and the improvement of health care awareness, the harm of chronic diseases related to diet is not only valued by the state and society, but also aroused people's general concern. The concept of "prevention is more important than treatment" has gradually replaced the habit of "treating diseases only when they are sick".

Our goal is not to turn back the clock, but to live the best quality of life at the age of 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80 and even 100!

 

"Wolf peach" in South America becomes a new favorite of European and American family maintenance

Tomato, which is rich in nutrition and delicious, is known as the fruit delicacy and the ruby of green world.It is said that the hometown of tomato is in Peru and Mexico. It was originally a wild berry growing in the forest. It was originally called "wolf peach". The fruit is rich in nutrition and has a special flavor.According to records, in the 16th century, a Duke of England named orodala was traveling in South America. He liked tomatoes very much, so he brought them back to England as a gift of love to his lover Queen Elizabeth to express his love.Since then, the names of "love fruit" and "lover fruit" have been widely spread.Europeans began to plant tomatoes in courtyards and gardens, and as a symbol of love and friendship gifts between men and women.

 

Time of the United States selects the food that contributes the most to human health

American "time" magazine introduced many kinds of food which are beneficial to modern people's health, among which tomato ranked the first.Tomato is rich in antioxidants, which can prevent the damage of free radicals to the skin. It has obvious effects of beauty, anti wrinkle, anti-aging, improving energy, protecting organs, and can greatly reduce the risk of cancer.

Tomato juice is very popular in European and American countries. It is said that Americans who pay attention to health care should drink two things when they wake up in the morning and before going to bed at night: one is milk, and the other is tomato juice.According to statistics, the per capita consumption of tomatoes in European and American countries is more than 30 times of that in China. In particular, 100% pure tomato juice has become an essential maintenance product for the whole family in European and American families.Drinking a glass of tomato juice every day brings obvious benefits to the maintenance oriented European and American people.The old people often drink it to delay aging, protect heart, brain, prostate and other important organs. The men often drink it with vigorous energy, while the women often drink it to beautify and beautify the skin, remove wrinkles and spots.

 

200g tomato juice, supplement the whole body nutrition

At present, tomato has been proved to contain a variety of vitamins and nutrients, rich in vitamin C and a, folic acid, potassium these main nutrients.In particular, it contains lycopene, it really has the effect of love, can make girls more beautiful!We see that loving and scientific mothers tend to make their children eat more tomatoes.According to the nutritionist's research and determination: each person eats 200 grams of tomato juice every day, which can protect the human health system and meet the human body's needs for a variety of vitamins and minerals.

  •  Tomato juice is rich in vitamins, alkalis, cellulose and pectin, and is rich in lycopene. Lycopene is the strongest antioxidant, which can delay aging, beautifying beauty, improving energy and enhancing immunity. The higher the content of lycopene in human plasma, the lower the incidence rate of cancer and coronary heart disease.
  •  Tomato juice contains a variety of organic acids. In addition to protecting vitamin C from damage, organic acids can also soften blood vessels, promote the absorption of calcium and iron, and help stomach juice digest fat and protein, which is beyond other vegetables and fruits;
  •  Tomato juice also contains a kind of anti-cancer and anti-aging substance called glutathione. Studies have found that tomato juice can prevent some types of cancer, inhibit breast cancer, lung cancer, endometrial cancer, and also fight lung cancer and colon cancer;
  •  Lycopene has the effect of diuresis and inhibiting the growth of bacteria. It is an excellent antioxidant and can remove free radicals in human body;
  •  Tomato juice also has the effect of beauty, appetite, protein digestion, reduce stomach distension.Its characteristics are between fruits and vegetables, rich in vitamin A and C. due to the protection of organic acids, vitamin C can not be destroyed in tomato cooking.

 

 

Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant in nature

 

1913Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant found in plants in nature, was first found in cooked tomatoes.Its antioxidant capacity is 3.2 times that of carotene, 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.Science has proved that the free radicals in human body are the main culprits of human autoimmune system.Lycopene is more effective than other carotenoids and vitamin E in scavenging free radicals, and its rate constant of quenching singlet oxygen is 100 times that of vitamin E.It is of great significance to prevent skin aging, prevent cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, prostate diseases, remove garbage in the body, enhance the human immune system and delay aging.It can effectively prevent and treat various diseases caused by aging and immune decline.Therefore, it is concerned by experts all over the world.

 

Drinking cooked tomato juice is the best way to supplement lycopene

Lycopene is known as "gold in plants".At present, lycopene has been widely accepted in Europe, America, Japan, Hong Kong and Taiwan.A cup of cooked tomato juice every day has become the living habit of high-quality families, and cooked tomato juice has become the top maintenance product for European and American families!

Lycopene widely exists in various organs and tissues of human body.It is mainly distributed in human blood, adrenal gland, liver, testis, prostate, breast, ovary, uterus, digestive tract and other organs, in which blood, adrenal gland, liver and testis contain more lycopene.Moreover, the content of lycopene in human body is related to human life span.Lycopene can also inhibit the oxidation of low density lipoprotein and resist ultraviolet radiation.

The United States and Japan have produced lycopene as the main active ingredient of drugs, its main role is to reduce blood pressure, treat high cholesterol, high blood lipid, reduce the activity of cancer cells.Lycopene is used to prevent prostate cancer in the United States and France.Israel and Australia have products used to prevent ultraviolet burns, protect skin, strengthen skin and nourish beauty.

The human body can't make lycopene, so it needs to take it from the diet. Eating a raw tomato can only absorb 0.05 mg of lycopene; only the tomato juice with proper ripening degree can greatly improve the absorption of lycopene through wall breaking technology.

 

The strongest antioxidant in the plant world

Delaying aging and enhancing immunity

Beautify and nourish the face, remove the rubbish in the body

Protect the prostate, protect the heart and brain

 

Powerful tomato juice, you can't expect the maintenance effect

Tomato juice is rich in lycopene, which has a variety of maintenance functions. Many families in Europe and the United States take natural tomato juice for a long time. Many people at the age of 40 can have a 20-year-old body, and those at the age of 60 can have a 40-year-old body.

 

Delaying aging and enhancing immunity

The aging of human body is closely related to the lack of lycopene. At the age of 40, it is the best time to prevent the aging and physical diseases. The way is to supplement lycopene.One lycopene molecule in tomato juice can quench tens of thousands of free radicals, and its antioxidant capacity is 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.It can effectively eliminate free radicals in human body, maintain normal metabolism of cells and prevent aging.Lycopene is absorbed in the body through the digestive tract mucosa, enters the blood and lymph, distributes to the testis, adrenal gland, prostate, pancreas, breast, ovary, liver, lung, colon, skin and various mucosal tissues, promotes the secretion of hormones by glands, so as to keep the human body vigorous; eliminates the free radicals in these organs and tissues, protects them from injury, and enhances the immunity of the bodyPestilence makes people less likely to get sick.

Lycopene is the strongest antioxidant, which can delay aging, beautifying beauty, improving energy and enhancing immunity. The higher the content of lycopene in human plasma, the lower the incidence rate of cancer and coronary heart disease.
 Tomato juice contains a variety of organic acids. In addition to protecting vitamin C from damage, organic acids can also soften blood vessels, promote the absorption of calcium and iron, and help stomach juice digest fat and protein, which is beyond other vegetables and fruits;
 Tomato juice also contains a kind of anti-cancer and anti-aging substance called glutathione. Studies have found that tomato juice can prevent some types of cancer, inhibit breast cancer, lung cancer, endometrial cancer, and also fight lung cancer and colon cancer;
 Lycopene has the effect of diuresis and inhibiting the growth of bacteria. It is an excellent antioxidant and can remove free radicals in human body;
 Tomato juice also has the effect of beauty, appetite, protein digestion, reduce stomach distension.Its characteristics are between fruits and vegetables, rich in vitamin A and C. due to the protection of organic acids, vitamin C can not be destroyed in tomato cooking.

 
 
Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant in nature
 
1913Lycopene, the strongest antioxidant found in plants in nature, was first found in cooked tomatoes.Its antioxidant capacity is 3.2 times that of carotene, 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.Science has proved that the free radicals in human body are the main culprits of human autoimmune system.Lycopene is more effective than other carotenoids and vitamin E in scavenging free radicals, and its rate constant of quenching singlet oxygen is 100 times that of vitamin E.It is of great significance to prevent skin aging, prevent cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, prostate diseases, remove garbage in the body, enhance the human immune system and delay aging.It can effectively prevent and treat various diseases caused by aging and immune decline.Therefore, it is concerned by experts all over the world.
 
Drinking cooked tomato juice is the best way to supplement lycopene
Lycopene is known as "gold in plants".At present, lycopene has been widely accepted in Europe, America, Japan, Hong Kong and Taiwan.A cup of cooked tomato juice every day has become the living habit of high-quality families, and cooked tomato juice has become the top maintenance product for European and American families!
Lycopene widely exists in various organs and tissues of human body.It is mainly distributed in human blood, adrenal gland, liver, testis, prostate, breast, ovary, uterus, digestive tract and other organs, in which blood, adrenal gland, liver and testis contain more lycopene.Moreover, the content of lycopene in human body is related to human life span.Lycopene can also inhibit the oxidation of low density lipoprotein and resist ultraviolet radiation.
The United States and Japan have produced lycopene as the main active ingredient of drugs, its main role is to reduce blood pressure, treat high cholesterol, high blood lipid, reduce the activity of cancer cells.Lycopene is used to prevent prostate cancer in the United States and France.Israel and Australia have products used to prevent ultraviolet burns, protect skin, strengthen skin and nourish beauty.
The human body can't make lycopene, so it needs to take it from the diet. Eating a raw tomato can only absorb 0.05 mg of lycopene; only the tomato juice with proper ripening degree can greatly improve the absorption of lycopene through wall breaking technology.
 
The strongest antioxidant in the plant world
Delaying aging and enhancing immunity
Beautify and nourish the face, remove the rubbish in the body
Protect the prostate, protect the heart and brain
 
Powerful tomato juice, you can't expect the maintenance effect
Tomato juice is rich in lycopene, which has a variety of maintenance functions. Many families in Europe and the United States take natural tomato juice for a long time. Many people at the age of 40 can have a 20-year-old body, and those at the age of 60 can have a 40-year-old body.
 
Delaying aging and enhancing immunity
The aging of human body is closely related to the lack of lycopene. At the age of 40, it is the best time to prevent the aging and physical diseases. The way is to supplement lycopene.One lycopene molecule in tomato juice can quench tens of thousands of free radicals, and its antioxidant capacity is 100 times that of vitamin E and 1000 times that of vitamin C.It can effectively eliminate free radicals in human body, maintain normal metabolism of cells and prevent aging.Lycopene is absorbed in the body through the digestive tract mucosa, enters the blood and lymph, distributes to the testis, adrenal gland, prostate, pancreas, breast, ovary, liver, lung, colon, skin and various mucosal tissues, promotes the secretion of hormones by glands, so as to keep the human body vigorous; eliminates the free radicals in these organs and tissues, protects them from injury, and enhances the immunity of the bodyPestilence makes people less likely to get sick.

story:
Jewel Ice is the simplest way to make clean and crystal clear slow-melting diamond-shaped & cool-chilling, scented or decorated ice for your drinks.

 

Add a Cold Touch of Class to Your Glass with Jewel Ice.

 

Our specially-designed ice mold keeps your beverages cold without diluting the taste, ensuring that you can enjoy every icy sip from whiskies to coffee. Jewel Ice was expertly created to provide you with the best drinking experience possible by adding 530 Carats of diamond ice into your drink! 

 

 

Clear Ice Melts Slower & Keeps Drinks Chilled Longer 

Are you tired of spending your money on high quality whiskey, gin, tequila and other spirits, only to have the exquisite flavor begin to fade once it is poured on the rocks?

 

While normal ice cubes melt quickly once inside your drink, immediately watering down the beverage and minimizing its flavor, Jewel Ice ensures that the liquid is instantly cooled yet the taste lasts as long as possible. With a masterfully crafted mold that offers a variety of brilliant shapes that add a dynamic element to every glass, keeping your drinks cool has never looked so good!

 

 

Command attention and respect with a drink that states your seriousness. Show your date, business partner, wife, husband, or friends that you mean serious business. 

Demonstrate your affection for timeless classiness, with a drink that can keep up with you all night. Decorate your creations with herbs, sprigs, plants, fruits, and more, shouting to the world that you are the center of attention – without even trying!

 

 

Why settle for second best? We assume that your current ice is cloudy, often poor-tasting ice cubes are our only options. By settling for that mentality, this is what we are subjecting our drinking experience to:

 

 

 1. Poor Hygiene: Do you know what ice cube trays are made of? When we create cubes in plastic structures that were made with harmful chemicals and even parabens, we are exposing our body to unsafe preservatives. Not to mention, depending the structure of our freezer, we are using freezer burned cubes that will alter the final taste of our drink.

 

 

2. Diluted Composition: Made with air pockets and no density, present ice cubes melt at a quick pace, diluting your drink before you even have a chance to finish it. Although you want it to remain cold, no one wants their drink to be watered down.

 

3 Taste Changes: When new compounds are added to an existing compound, the taste changes. As more water is poured into your drink, its taste experience is fundamentally altered. Who likes watery $50 whiskey?

 

 

4. Excess CO2 (Carbon Dioxide): As the carbonated beverage reacts with the loose, air-filled ice cubes, it creates excess fizz, which makes the drink unpleasant. With our dense Jewel Ice, no CO2 reaction occurs, keeping all carbonation contained in the initial drink and properly chilled to your liking.

 

5. Before Jewel Ice, this was the only way to make such beautiful ices. :) Well... We changed that, and here is how:

 

 

While typical ice cubes are made in a tray that is exposed to all the bacteria and additional flavors that are in your freezer, the Jewel Ice uses a protective silicone mold that prevents the ice from being tainted by any outside substances. Here is how it works:

 

 

The upper section of the mold is specifically created to freeze first, which blocks outside odors and unsanitary particles which can become attached to the ice. This keeps the ice clean from bacteria and from flavors, such as fish, which can add an unsavory taste.

 

 

Perfect for a Wide Range of Drinks

No matter what type of drink you fancy, JewelIce is the perfect solution to keep it as cold as possible without sacrificing any taste. Especially useful for top shelf spirits, the large ice shapes maintain the integrity of liqueur so that you do not miss out on a drop of flavor.

However, the JewelIce is useful for far more than just whiskey! Iced coffees, sodas, mineral water, mixed drinks and even wine can be kept cool with the long-lasting ice that keeps beverages fresh for extended periods of time, no matter the environment.

 

We’ve made Jewel Ice a simple three-stage process that’s as easy as 1-2-3. We know you’re on-the-go, which is why we want you to enjoy your Jewel Ice every single night, when you want it.

 

1. Simply grab your Jewel Ice maker/chamber. We’ve created our chambers with special ice freezing technology that will create dense results without you having to do a thing.

2. Fill it with water. It can be any kind of water tap or bottled.

3. Grab the ever-popular diamond molds and submerge it into the chamber. Close the chamber and put it into the freeze.

Have your drinks STAND OUT against the crowd. Show everyone your natural appeal through the beauty of your drink.

Our kit is compatible with all commercial freezer sizes and shapes, only requiring a small amount of room to sit on the shelf and create the world’s most beautiful ice. We want you to be able to pack it up and bring it with you on the road as well, which is why its specifications have been carefully factory tested and made compatible with your freezer structure. 

 

Jewel Ice was created to not only enhance the taste of your drink, but to enhance its overall appearance as well. We believe that good taste and good looks don’t have to be mutually exclusive.

 

Jewel Ice guarantees the perfect piece of ice every time, allowing you to enjoy everything from whiskey to soda to coffee as it was originally intended.

 

Thank You

Before we were Team Jewel Ice, or crowd-funders, we were just another whiskey drinkers. We hated how quick the conventional ice cubes dilutes our drinks.

Coke gets dull fast; Johnnie walker blue ($200+) gets watery so fast. What a waste we thought.

So, We created the World's Best ICE MAKER - Jewel Ice. Simply put, 520 carats of Diamond Ice cool-chill your drinks like magic. Not just the shape, it's the most hygienic way to make the dense, slow melting ice.

We love it, and You will love it, too. :)

These products are the culmination of 3 years of ice maker construction and material research, extensive prototyping and testing, carefully honed designed philosophies, and many lifetimes of melting ices around the world. Enjoy 'em, and thank you for your support.

Crowdfunding allows us to design without compromise and run a company that we are proud to work for. We owe our existence to our backers, who help us design the most thoughtful carry solutions on the planet. We imagine a world where for-profit companies treat their employees, partners, customers, and communities as peers, and where quality of output is not hindered by the need to squeeze out maximum profit. Your support helps us to realize that goal. 

Thank you, again.

- The Jewel Ice Team

story:
In the beginning...

In 2016, we started making wine simply to continue my grandmother's legacy.  Then, we wanted to know if our winemaking would be sustainable as a business.  So we reached out to a few people like:

  • Ann Reynolds, wine compliance expert
  • Chris Chickerneo, co-founder at CelloVia
  • Andre Hueston Mack, founder of Maison Noir Wines
  • Dr. Wilbur Keith, 30 years of business/investing experience & partner at Juicy Wine Co.
  • Jason Lummen, founder of People's Cider Company
  • Genevieve Rogers, winery consultant

to make sure we had a solid foundation.

We also tested our wines with thousands of people at events like the Chicago Wine Fest, The Junior League's Perfect Pairings, and Winemaker International Amateur Competition to determine if we would have enough potential customers.

To break into this $60 Billion wine industry, we have developed four primarily strawberry wines.  Three are semi-dry and one is sweet.

We need your help to build our winery from the ground up!

 

 

Milestones & rewards

Our goal from this campaign is to raise $175,000.

We're starting an urban winery from the ground up and will have to wait several months for permits to clear before we can sell our first bottle.

Therefore, when we our goal is fully funded, we allocate the money toward the following expenses:

  • $80,000 - equipment
  • $45,000 - operating expenses, permits, and licenses
  • $15,000 - architect
  • $1,600 - winery consultant
  • $13,400 - furnishings
  • $20,000 - plumbing, electricity, roll-up door, chlorine filter, etc.

Why is it worthy of a revolution?

We believe in change from within.

The South Shore neighborhood of Chicago is full of incredible people; however, for decades the commercial corridors have been primarily vacant or boarded up.  We want to join a growing number of business owners - from restaurants to coffee shops - in making our community a better place.  We want to be a sanctuary where people can connect with each other.  We want to be a link that connects other neighborhood amenities like the Stony Island Arts Bank, South Shore Brew, The South Shore Culture Center, Majani Restaurants and so much more.  We want to pay homage to our ancestors and the Haitian founder of our great city.  We want to contribute to the well being of local farmers in our region.  Plus, we want to collaborate from chefs, chocolatiers, pastry makers, and tastemakers from around the globe to help improve the economic well-being of people beyond our borders.

Risks & Challenges

I studied chemical engineering, so I know quite a bit about process design.  I also spent some time bartending, so I have experience selling adult beverages directly to customers.  However, I have pooled together people with more experience than I have in order to navigate beyond obstacles I would not be able to foresee. 

This doesn't mean that there won't be trials and tribulations ahead, however, I am confident that I have a team of people I can reach out to succeed in spite of those trials.

Other Ways You Can Help

 

We understand that everyone won't be able to make a financial contributions.

You can still help us by getting the word out and making some NOISE about our campaign.  In order to reach our goal, we estimate that we will have to reach over 2.5 million people with our message.

Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools to let all your friends know.
