story:
The idea of this product was born after researching the current markets for a multiple dispenser led us to believe that no such product exists in the current market.  As a result we worked on developing this product that can be used by the everyday entertainer or even bars and restaurants.

Our concept has been tested and our design finalized up until a point, where we can start the tooling process.  The dispenser has been designed to ensure that all available shot glasses are filled in equal measure, thus reducing wastage and saving time as well.

In order to make this a fun products we worked on the design, creating an attractive product that can be cleaned easily.  We also created this product considering that it could be part of the fun by including a roulette game as well as a recipe book.

To make this a convenient product, we also include a removable tray, which can be used to serve the drinks on.

Our current design include 2 models:- A 6 tray and a 10 tray design.  

This multiple dispenser also includes removable straws for hygiene and cleaning purposes.  

It further includes a base and container with a manifold for dispensing purposes.

It is innovative and has a funky design, that will be available in multiple colors:

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our concept has been tested and our design registered.  We finalized CAD drawings and also printed a 3D prototype for design testing purposes.

We now need further funding in order to finalize the detailed design and manufacture the tooling for manufacturing of this fun product.

By funding this new exciting product, you will be able to enjoy this fun product with your friends at various parties and introduce this new product to the world.  

We need you to help us bring this new product to life!

Unique Features of this product:

  • Shots Up is easy to use
  • Shots Up has a funky design
  • Shots Up is a perfect gift for friends and family, but can also be used in pub or restaurant.
  • Shots Up has been designed considering hygiene purposes and ensuring the product can be cleaned properly.
  • Shots Up includes a game and recipe book, making it part of the fun at parties.

Timeline:

Meet the Owner

Shots Up is a product of Newdusk (Pty) Ltd, which is owned by Sharon Naude.  Sharon invented the Shots Up concept and finalised the design in conjunction with IdeaNav, who also assisted in finalising the 3D design.

story:
The modern designed Accurate Spoon was created for convenience of pouring dry and liquid products into a container that has a narrow neck. The spoon will help you to not spill any substances and will keep your place clean. (click for preview↴)

 You can use the Accurate Spoon for decorating your plate and cake with syrups, sauces, caramel, chocolate, salad dressing, used for salt and sand art and more! For domestic and commercial use.  (click for preview↴)

The first drawings of the Accurate Spoon:

Hello, I'm Anita, the creator of this spoon. Our dream team consists of three people: my husband Andrew - photo/video production, my son Demid - copyriter and me -behind the idea.  I got the idea of this product on aug 2016. I went to a coffee shop and saw how the worker was pouring sugar with a normal spoon and he spilled 1/3 of the sugar on the table and floor. Thereby loosing a lot of the product and loosing the company money. Imagine if it happens everyday in every store, many companies loose tons of money! So, I noticed that the same problem occurs in my own kitchen. I'm a mother of two and I know how important it is to not spill any liquids/spices/products. The Accurate Spoon was the perfect solution to that wish as well!  With the Accurate Spoon I save my own time and the time with my family. Also my kitchen is always clean now! The first prototype was created in November-December. The finale prototype was made in March. The final prototype was tested in April and May. Thank you for your interest and support!  Anita ♥ 

Follow us on:

accuratespoon.com

facebook.com/theAccurateSpoon

instagram.com/accuratespoon

twitter.com/anitacreator

YouTube

 

Risks and challenges

We have experience in developing and releasing new products, as well as strong partnerships with our foreign manufacturers.

We are satisfied with the quality and functionality of the prototypes and feel confident in the delivery of a high-quality product that will help you.

We know that each new project is unique and has its own difficulties. Delays are always possible both in view of the final completion of the design, manufacture and shipment. There are also production errors and other unforeseen events. If we experience any problems at various stages, we will inform you about each step, in order to avoid discontent and cause you any troubles connected with our product.

We will do everything in our power and even more so that everyone is satisfied!

The Accurate Spoon was the perfect solution to that wish as well!  With the Accurate Spoon I save my own time and the time with my family. Also my kitchen is always clean now! The first prototype was created in November-December. The finale prototype was made in March. The final prototype was tested in April and May. Thank you for your interest and support!  Anita ♥ 
Follow us on:
accuratespoon.com
facebook.com/theAccurateSpoon
instagram.com/accuratespoon
twitter.com/anitacreator
YouTube
 
Risks and challenges
We have experience in developing and releasing new products, as well as strong partnerships with our foreign manufacturers.
We are satisfied with the quality and functionality of the prototypes and feel confident in the delivery of a high-quality product that will help you.
We know that each new project is unique and has its own difficulties. Delays are always possible both in view of the final completion of the design, manufacture and shipment. There are also production errors and other unforeseen events. If we experience any problems at various stages, we will inform you about each step, in order to avoid discontent and cause you any troubles connected with our product.
We will do everything in our power and even more so that everyone is satisfied!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Melissa Capacite founder of Honeybee Bakehouse! Ever since I was in the 7th grade I started to dream up of having a community spot where I could support local artists and other's well being by providing a safe space where they can feel seen, loved and comforted in a humble environment and nourished with nostalgic yet creative foods that happen to be sustainable! 

See What I See

White paint, black trim, yellow details with a yellow and white awning. More planter baskets filled with plants for a colorful pop  and a welcoming, wholesome aesthetic. A place where you can run up for a quick cup of local coffee and one (or a dozen) of my famous ube wedding cookies or sit and enjoy a tea pot with some miso caramel apple bars or slice of thai tea milk cake on a hot day. Everything is cruelty free which includes ingredients sourced where workers are treated and paid fairly. Fresh croissants with traditional and not so traditional fillings (think kare kare or chocolate hazelnut filled croissants). Nothing made with palm oil, honey or any other animal derived ingredients. Everything made with Miyoko's butter so quality is not a worry; and since I don't plan to plaster "vegan" out there, unsuspecting guests can remain so until one day pleasantly surprised that their favorite treat can be just that and  just so happens to be vegan.

What We Need & What You Get

My ultimate goal through this campaign is to raise money so that I can buy a cart, install a deck oven (which would replace the soft serve machine), fund licensing, lease a spot either in NW or SE Portland, and obtain sustainable packaging through both deposit systems and sustainable packaging. Having my own cart enables me to create freely and give you more variations of fresh options.

Even if I were not to obtain the full amount for the cart I could still use the money to get started on wholesale! Whether I have enough to quit my second job so that I can focus soley on Honeybee or would have to continue saving, my back up plan is to get into a commercial kitchen and get setup with a farmers market and do wholesale in accordance to continuing special orders and building from there.

All contributions help! Even a dollar or a share! For those that are able to and are interested, there are incentives for money donations! If you'd like, check out the donation packages that I'm offering!

story:
Be an Influencer

You walk in to the bar, point to your photo on the owners wall, and treat your friends to rounds of drinks. Participate in shaping what the bar serves, the events it plans, the specials it offers. You help make the bar you want to hang out in. All investors get their photo on the owner's wall and access to regular investor-only specials (that you get to help create).

Have Fun

The success of every bar is in the service (which already is stellar) and the patrons, who make the experience that much more enjoyable for each other. You aren't responsible for the management of the place, your job is to show up, be friendly, and have fun.

Keep the East Village Great

We're talking about an established pub in the heart of the East Village, just off Avenue A, that can become the living room for you and your friends. Contribute today, and take advantage of the perks forever. Help keep the East Village locally owned, and avoid the 'Bleeckerization' of this great neighborhood.

Guarantee

If adequate funding levels are not achieved, you will be refunded 100% of your investment, guaranteed.

Conditions

Establishment reserves the right to conditionally refuse service to anyone, anytime (ie, you're going to get cut off if you're sloppy, rude, or aggressive, so keep your cool, cowboys and cowgirls). Specials are for the investor and invited guests only, not to be shared with other patrons. Specials are for drinks only, so don't forget to tip your servers for their friendly service. All contributors must be 21 years of age or older.

story:
It’s been a nasty 2018 mid-term election season...and it’s not over yet.

Case and point: Ted Cruz went bananas after PETA protested outside one of his events. (They handed out barbeque tofu—the audacity!) Unsurprisingly, Cruz did what he loves to do, pinning the protests on his opponent, rising star Beto O’Rourke.

Wielding the Trumptonian power of Twitter, Cruz made a downright bizarre statement: "If Beto wins, BBQ will be illegal!" (September 16, 2018) The claims went viral. Another political smear campaign had been launched.

Well, we’re tired of the lies and the low-blow tactics, Ted.

We know Beto O’ Rourke loves barbecue (c’mon Ted, he’s Texan) and now we’ve created a bottle of #BetoBBQ sauce to prove it.

#BetoBBQ is the sauciest solution to Ted’s political shenanigans yet.  

Let’s put the eat into compeat. The steaks are high (and hot) and with #BetoBBQ in hand, we’re ready to simmer the republican party in #Texas November 6.

(Or, at the very least, host an awesome dinner party.)

Help us launch this indiegogo , and we’ll have your #BetoBBQ to your doorstep ASAP. 

VARITIES

One dude, one sauce. (Duh.) Get it while it’s hot (or before November 6).

PROCEEDS

100% of proceeds go the Texas Democratic Party.

#TEAMBETO

Spread the word! We’ve got some grilling to do.

story:
My name is Henry. I moved to Indianapolis Indiana in '97. I met my Friend and mentor Andrew Caplinger...the owner of Caplinger's Fresh Catch Seafood Market...in late 2013. In March of 2016 me and my family moved to Ardmore, Oklahoma. Ardmore is located near the Oklahoma and Texas border. That's where the idea came that I should open a seafood restaurant like my friend and mentor Andrew. I began doing some some research on this kind of restaurant to see if there was anything like it in Ardmore and Oklahoma City. To my surprise there wasn't. With that said I started focusing more on Oklahoma City. I really believe that this business will thrive and be the beginning of something special. I'm going to bring the same concept Andrew has been using for his seafood restaurant and market, because it has proven to be a winning concept. His restaurant, Caplingers Fresh Catch Seafood Market has been voted #1 in the state of Indiana by Yelp and Movoto. Andrew Caplinger has just opened his third seafood market and restaurant since opening his first one three years ago. Now that should tell you something! Here's what we'll be selling; Seafood:  Yellowfin Tuna, Walleye, Catfish, Ocean Perch, Basa, Flounder, Cod, Trout, Monkfish, Swordfish, Haddock, Red Snapper, Grouper, Salmon, Scallops, Shrimp, Lobster, Crab Legs, Blue Crab, Frog Legs, Crawfish, Fish & Chips Dinner, Fish Sandwiches.

Startup Costs: $155,000

Start-up expenses for Henry's Fresh Seafood Grill & Market include initial insurance premiums covering both general liability and product liability, as well as business renter's insurance, rent for three months and to allow for build-out of the retail space, pre-launch marketing to cover any  advertisements in local papers, the development of a website, initial inventory, and the normal legal expenses for consultation and permitting.

Inventory on-hand at any given time must be low as all seafood must be kept extremely fresh and will be ordered on a daily basis. Other fixed assets include office and store furniture, shelving, a computer, phone system, and tools. Long-term assets include the kitchen equipment, walk-in cooler and freezer, display cases, and additional investments in improvements to the retail location.

A significant amount of cash is required to fund the first year of operations until the business reaches break-even.

 

Come on people join with me...let's bring this awesome and exciting concept to Oklahoma City. I promise to bring the best freshest seafood along with fresh ingredients, great flavor, and fresh produce.

The investment you make will contribute to a successful business. From the freshest seafood around to the classic, modern vibe. Henry's Fresh Seafood Grill & Market will be the kind of place you'll want to visit often, and a "must-have" for your visiting coworkers, friends and family.

Maybe you can't afford to invest in us, but that doesn't mean you can't help!  Share this campaign with your friends on social media, cheer us on from the street, or come visit us and grab a bite to eat when we open. Your support means so much to me!

story:
Loxley Coffee started as an idea stemming from three brothers’ James, Joseph, and William McAdams from Fairmont, Minnesota's love for coffee. We realized there is so much more to be had than an average cup of coffee. Inside each bean, there is a special and unique flavor profile. When roasted properly the beans can release any combination of flavor and aromatic notes.  It is our dream to produce small batch coffee and provide those flavors to you. This not only means you'll get flavorful coffee but it will be roasted fresh every day, just for you. We'll do our best to source and select high-quality coffee and sell it for less while helping to provide a sustainable living for coffee growers and producers of the world. With green initiatives in mind, such as 100% recyclable bagging material, low emission roaster, solar power electricity generation for all utility needs at our shop and cafe, and composting of coffee grounds and chaff. Loxley will always provide high-quality coffee at affordable prices without cutting corners.

We have procured a shop in Fairmont that will be renovated to house a new high-efficiency low emission roaster. We are looking for funding to help us pay for our roaster and the process of converting our new building to food production standards. Any further funding will be used to help convert a section of our building into a cafe area to serve our local community. The more backers and support we receive the better the building, equipment, and the more fluid our start.

With your support, we plan to be more than just a coffee company. We plan to teach about coffee, the bean, the process, how to brew, and select quality equipment to assist in your brew.  We plan to give back to our community and help to create a sustainable future. We will have a strong presence in our community from events to sponsorships and Loxley Coffee will help companies that we support to be better involved in their communities as well. Our goal is to be carbon negative by 2022.

For you our amazing backers, we have a structured perk system showcased on the right-hand side of the site and detailed a bit further below. We are looking to raise $10,000 in crowdsourced funding with any additional funding needs coming from our own pockets. Any amount donated will help our cause, regardless of size. 

What You'll Get!

You can score yourself anything from a handwritten thank you postcard, and a couple bags of coffee to a lifetime of coffee if that's what you're into. We've got a handful of options in different price ranges making it easy for you to decide!

Tell Everyone About Loxley Coffee!

The best way you can help us out whether you donate or not is to share our name! Be it online by sharing our accounts on Facebook, Instagram, twitter, etc. or telling a friend or family member in person. If you can't donate money but have any other idea as to how you can help reach out to us at james@loxleycoffee.com.

Wanna win some free stuff?! If you haven't already Enter here:

https://kingsumo.com/g/iwyrgb/loxley-coffees-es...

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

You can get a single box for yourself or as a gift, or you can purchase a subscription.

Some samples of our boxes:

We are looking for a small round of funding for shipping supplies. You will receive your first box one month after this campaign ends.

story:
Taste Test Testimonials

"It tastes like dessert" -  NPC Bikini Competitor, @breehenryy

"I don't even like granola bars and I LOVED this. It's sweet but it's salty and it's crunchy but it's chewy." - NPC Bikini Competitor and Lifestyle Coach, @tayfit_13

Why choose No Name?

Currently on the market there are next to NO completely whole food based, paleo compliant on the go snacks. Things that come in a package usually come with a laundry list of ingredients no one truly knows how to pronounce. You really have no idea what you're eating! 

For those people who are paleo-based eaters, vegan, or just choose to be health-conscious, it's extremely hard to find on-the-go snacks that you don't need to feel guilty about eating. That's where No Name Snacks comes in!

  • The No Bar says "NO" to 7 of the 8 major allergens!​ We understand how quickly these allergens are growing, and how many people may not even be aware they have an intolerance to some of these allergens. That's why we built a bar that left out nearly all of them. 
    • Milk, eggs, and wheat cause so many people stomach and digestion issues, and side effects don't set in for hours to days later, leaving people clueless as to what the issue is. By leaving it out, we're helping you to avoid all of these potential issues.
  • Full of healthy fats and proteins to provide you with long lasting energy! We've packed our snacks full of healthy fats to give you an added boost of energy and keep you full for hours.
  • Comprised of whole-foods and simple ingredients to provide a snack that will keep you full for hours. We believe that it's essential to fuel your body with only the necessities to provide optimal function of the brain and body all day long. By giving the body only what it needs we're giving you a snack that will keep you staying full for hours.
  • Paleo-friendly, Vegan, Whole30 compliant. We understand how hard it is to find easy, on-the-go snacks that are compliant with raw, whole-food diets. No Name Snacks only use simple ingredients, ensuring that it can be eaten by all diet followers. 

 

PERFECT for the #IIFYM lifestyle-

If you're a body building buff, a fitness competitor or just like to incorporate healthy, flexible dieting into your regular lifestyle, you've definitely heard of the "if it fits your macros" approach to eating. If you haven't, people who follow the IIFYM approach to dieting count their calories by counting how many carbs, proteins and fats they intake. They manipulate weight gain and loss by increasing or decreasing different macro nutrients based upon their goals. 

Whether you follow this type of lifestyle or not, No Name bar is the PERFECT snack to grab when you're heading out the door that will keep you full for hours and that you can still #IIFYM on instagram! 

So by now you're probably asking- What's in these bars?

No Name Cranberry Bars are comprised of 5 ingredients:

  • Almonds
  • Cashews
  • Cranberries
  • Maple Syrup
  • Cinnamon

Simple but FULL of flavor. You read the dessert testimonial, and we hold true to it!

What We Need & What You Get

An amount of $6000 will allow us to move to a larger manufacturer, finish filing our trademarks and lower our costs.

If we don't reach our entire goal, I'm still so passionate about this and want to see No Name bars in the hands of health and fitness advocates, CrossFit-ers, bodybuilders, hikers, competitors, and the general public, so I'll still be working my hardest to reach manufacturing! 

 

FACEBOOK: @nonamesnacks

INSTAGRAM: @nonamesnacks

OUR WEBSITE: @nonamesnacks

 

Who are we?

Hi- my name is Abbey Dodge! I'm Boston based health and fitness advocate! I grew up on a farm in a small town in Maine. While growing up, my mom preached organic. We grew our own vegetables and raised our own meats. Alongside growing all of our own meats and produce, my family made everything we ate from scratch, including our own maple syrup (that will be used in our products!). She would use locally sourced, organic ingredients to make all of our snacks. This is what sparked my love and interest in fueling my body with whole-foods, and inspired me to share this love of health and nutrition with others.

 

THANK YOUs:

Ethan Abitz for our photographs and logo! 
Ram Cam Productions (esp Hannah Jope) for our campaign video!
story_txt:
Taste Test Testimonials
"It tastes like dessert" -  NPC Bikini Competitor, @breehenryy
"I don't even like granola bars and I LOVED this. It's sweet but it's salty and it's crunchy but it's chewy." - NPC Bikini Competitor and Lifestyle Coach, @tayfit_13

Why choose No Name?
Currently on the market there are next to NO completely whole food based, paleo compliant on the go snacks. Things that come in a package usually come with a laundry list of ingredients no one truly knows how to pronounce. You really have no idea what you're eating! 
For those people who are paleo-based eaters, vegan, or just choose to be health-conscious, it's extremely hard to find on-the-go snacks that you don't need to feel guilty about eating. That's where No Name Snacks comes in!


The No Bar says "NO" to 7 of the 8 major allergens!​ We understand how quickly these allergens are growing, and how many people may not even be aware they have an intolerance to some of these allergens. That's why we built a bar that left out nearly all of them. Milk, eggs, and wheat cause so many people stomach and digestion issues, and side effects don't set in for hours to days later, leaving people clueless as to what the issue is. By leaving it out, we're helping you to avoid all of these potential issues.


Full of healthy fats and proteins to provide you with long lasting energy! We've packed our snacks full of healthy fats to give you an added boost of energy and keep you full for hours.

Comprised of whole-foods and simple ingredients to provide a snack that will keep you full for hours. We believe that it's essential to fuel your body with only the necessities to provide optimal function of the brain and body all day long. By giving the body only what it needs we're giving you a snack that will keep you staying full for hours.

Paleo-friendly, Vegan, Whole30 compliant. We understand how hard it is to find easy, on-the-go snacks that are compliant with raw, whole-food diets. No Name Snacks only use simple ingredients, ensuring that it can be eaten by all diet followers. 

 
PERFECT for the #IIFYM lifestyle-

If you're a body building buff, a fitness competitor or just like to incorporate healthy, flexible dieting into your regular lifestyle, you've definitely heard of the "if it fits your macros" approach to eating. If you haven't, people who follow the IIFYM approach to dieting count their calories by counting how many carbs, proteins and fats they intake. They manipulate weight gain and loss by increasing or decreasing different macro nutrients based upon their goals. 
Whether you follow this type of lifestyle or not, No Name bar is the PERFECT snack to grab when you're heading out the door that will keep you full for hours and that you can still #IIFYM on instagram! 
So by now you're probably asking- What's in these bars?
No Name Cranberry Bars are comprised of 5 ingredients:

Almonds
Cashews
Cranberries
Maple Syrup
Cinnamon

Simple but FULL of flavor. You read the dessert testimonial, and we hold true to it!

What We Need & What You Get

An amount of $6000 will allow us to move to a larger manufacturer, finish filing our trademarks and lower our costs.
If we don't reach our entire goal, I'm still so passionate about this and want to see No Name bars in the hands of health and fitness advocates, CrossFit-ers, bodybuilders, hikers, competitors, and the general public, so I'll still be working my hardest to reach manufacturing! 


 
FACEBOOK: @nonamesnacks

INSTAGRAM: @nonamesnacks

OUR WEBSITE: @nonamesnacks

 

Who are we?Hi- my name is Abbey Dodge! I'm Boston based health and fitness advocate! I grew up on a farm in a small town in Maine. While growing up, my mom preached organic. We grew our own vegetables and raised our own meats. Alongside growing all of our own meats and produce, my family made everything we ate from scratch, including our own maple syrup (that will be used in our products!). She would use locally sourced, organic ingredients to make all of our snacks. This is what sparked my love and interest in fueling my body with whole-foods, and inspired me to share this love of health and nutrition with others. THANK YOUs:Ethan Abitz for our photographs and logo! Ram Cam Productions (esp Hannah Jope) for our campaign video!

story:
Germinados ChiaVida

______________________________________________________

Las semillas de chía están llenas de energía, con una buena cantidad de compuestos con potente actividad antioxidante. Normalmente el consumo de esta semilla suele ser como topping de postres, y en muchos casos el sabor y el gusto no es el mismo para todos.

Germinados ChíaVida ofrece otra forma de comer esta semilla tan nutritiva, con  brotes de la chía fresca, sin aditivos, recién cosechada y sin complicaciones, dentro de un paquete 100% ecológico elaborado de plástico reciclado y prensado al frío ofreciendo que los germinados se mantengan vigentes por más tiempo.

Te presentamos un cuadro comparativo con los nutrientes de la semilla.

 

¿A donde va lo recaudado?

Producir un nuevo producto siempre es más costoso al principio, hasta que podamos escalar y pedir volúmenes más grandes, por ello a cambio de tu apoyo, utilizaremos los fondos para respaldar la producción inicial de nuestros packs de germinados fresquitos, sin aditivos ni conservantes. También apoyar en la compra del empaque reciclado para su distribución.

Que beneficios especiales hay por adquirir ChíaVida a través de Indiegogo

Los interesados en adquirir Germinados ChíaVida por Indiegogo serán los embajadores de consumo de este gran alimento a bajo costo, además de tener recompensas únicas por un corto tiempo y con atractivos regalos.

¿Cuál es nuestro sueño?  

Queremos que más personas agreguen a su dieta diaria el consumo de los germinados, debido a que  es un alimento vivo ricos en vitaminas y nutrientes. Ofreciendo ChíaVida como germinado natural sin conservantes ni aditivos en su crecimiento.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Te pedimos por favor que difundas esta campaña. Ayúdanos a que llegue a la mayor cantidad de personas posibles e instituciones interesadas en la nutrición. ¡Logremos que genere ecos! Compártelo en  Facebook e Instagram. Y si tienes un contacto en el sector de nutrición apóyanos en contactarlo.

Apreciamos mucho tu ayuda. 

Quienes Somos?

 

SANDRA TORRES

Es una emprendedora apasionada en la herbolaría y en la germinación de semillas, es activista del cuidado del medio ambiente y le gusta investigar acerca de la nutrición natural.

 

ELIZABETH FLORES

Tiene un corazón para la enseñanza, también es activista del cuidado del medio ambiente y busca el desarrollo y planeamiento en el sector de educación.

 

 

PATRICIA VILLAVICENCIO

Emprendedora en el sector alimenticio, tiene experiencia en ferias gastronómicas en Lima. Lidera buenos equipos gracias a su comunicación asertiva y su empatía.

 

NATALI AVILA

Es una amante de la tecnología en redes y comunicaciones, es buena en gestión comercial y movimiento de redes sociales.

story:
With an effective blend of minimalist all-silicone ergonomic design. And award-winning technology that ensures effective clean. Nest Brush is THE toothbrush you need.  

Self-dispensing. So you do not need to carry your toothpaste with you. 

UV-C tech. To protect your toothbrush from germs and bacteria. 

With a lightweight travel case. And a minimalist magnetic stand. 

Now you can enjoy clean teeth anywhere.

Overstuffed toiletry bag that's almost a travel carry-on? Hate those tiny toothbrushes that barely clean your teeth? Or too bulky electric ones that you constantly forget to charge?    

The Nest Brush patent-pending toothpaste delivery system does not need electricity or a battery to dispense the toothpaste.  

You’re good to go for a month of traveling, without worrying about toothpaste or sterilization, with its built-in 30ml (1 fl. oz.) refillable toothpaste container in its silicone handle.  

Whether at home or at work, all you need is a single push, and you can squeeze a perfect-sized drop of toothpaste at the center of its silicone bristles.

Softly press the button under your thumb. A dentist-recommended drop of toothpaste is automatically delivered through internal channels to the brush head.

Fill the container with your favorite toothpaste, attach the head, and you’re good to go for 1 month.
The silicone valves prevent the paste from drying and leaking, and the hygiene-first design makes it easy to rinse out the brush from the inside between the refills.

4 month battery life | 20,000 VPM | 30-sec reminders

With 20,000 sonic vibrations per minute Nest Brush Electric gently brushes your gums and teeth. Effectively removing the plaque.

You can’t imagine how the built-in timer will help you perfect your daily teeth cleaning routine. The 2-minute timer briefly pauses every 30 seconds to indicate that it's time to jump to another area of your mouth. 

Did you know there are over 6 billion bacteria out there? Can you see them lurking in the air around and on your toothbrush?  We can’t either. But we know that they are there…    

Nest Brush is squeaky clean every single time you use it — sterilized and germ-free. The UV module has 2 powerful built-in UV-C LED lights that effectively sterilize your toothbrush in under a minute after every use.  And its head shield keeps your toothbrush protected from the air all day long.

Nest Brush’s modular design allows you to move the UV-C light between the travel case and the magnetic stand in under 3 seconds. And its 2-month battery life ensures you’ll never have to sacrifice clean oral care, even on those long trips.

 

 

Enjoy instant access to all your oral care needs with just one hand. The Nest Brush all-in-one set comes with a magnetic stand with built-in UV-C sterilization, for easy storage at home.

Slide your toothbrush inside the lightweight travel case with built-in UV-C sterilization and enjoy hygiene storage and protection anywhere.

Tired of painful, sore, swollen, or even bleeding gums when you brush?   

Made out of 100% food-grade hypoallergenic silicone, Nest Brush not only feels great to hold but is softer on your teeth. Its soft silicone bristles ONLY get rid of the nasty stuff and protect your teeth and gums. Silicone also naturally stays germ-free.

 

Nest Brush Full Set includes the toothbrush (refillable container and silicone head), a travel case, a magnetic stand, and UV-C sterilization module with the charge.

 

It’s Safe:

We've used food-grade hypoallergenic silicone and BPA-free ABS plastic for Nest Brush Junior. It's the same material used for the majority of high-quality baby bottles.

It’s Easy to Use:

It allows kids to easily dispense a pea-sized amount of toothpaste the moment they push the button, making it an extremely useful tool for both parents and children.

It saves your precious time:

With Nest Brush Junior you get a toothpaste built-in container of 0.0007 oz. (20 ml) capacity. That’s 3 weeks of peace of mind, or 20-30 free minutes a day for a cup of coffee or 7-10 hours total to relax. Just what each parent wants!

It’s fun:

Nest Brush Junior helps your kid develop good oral habits, making dental hygiene a game that they can play.

And it develops independence:

The integrated solutions help your child feel more independent — after all, every child is pleased to feel himself an independent and adult person!

Nest Brush Junior is available in natural green color. But we will give our backers chance to choose the second color. We will send you a survey and the color that will get the highest number of votes will be available as the second color of Nest Brush Junior.

You can get Nest Brush Junior as an add-on for only $25.

 

How can I get Nest Brush Junior?

1. Click on this link (you need to be logged in through your backer account)

2. Scroll down to the add-on section.

3. Choose Nest Brush Junior add-on

4. Add your desired quantity and click continue.

If you still have questions check out this step-by-step guide on getting add-ons.

 

 

 

 

How can I get the add-ons?

1. Click on this link (you need to be logged in through your backer account)

2. Scroll down to the add-on section.

3. Choose your preferred add-ons

4. Add your desired quantity and click continue.

If you still have questions check out this step-by-step guide.

Hi There!  
 

I'm Kirill the creator of Nest Brush.

Self-care has always been essential to me because I recognized the role it played in my mental and physical health. Early morning runs with my kids (they are in the image below), workouts at night, hiking, or cycling - I've always made sure that I set an example for my family and friends by engaging in these healthy activities.  

And I believe that taking good care of your teeth and gums is one of those forms of self-care. With the current speed of life, sometimes it's not that easy to maintain proper oral hygiene and the solutions at hand are not effective enough.   

So, some four years ago I decided to design and develop a self-dispensing toothbrush. We improved the brush with each 3D model, each new prototype. Eventually, we managed to create the self-dispensing toothbrush over 100K people loved and enjoyed using. But it had one core problem — it was not refillable.  

We already had a great experience with our previous version of Nest Brush, so now we had to rethink the concept, improve it and redesign it totally in accordance with our vision based on feedback from the previous product.   

It took us about 10 months, tens of prototypes, developing sampling molds,  just to make the "THE ONE”  working version of Nest Brush. And guess what? We did it!     

 

We are making a premium product for everyday life. So the raw materials must be of the highest quality. This is why all our suppliers and our manufacturers have passed the most rigorous selection procedure. We use hypoallergenic food-grade silicone which is suitable even for babies.

Inner parts of Nest Brush are made of food-grade BPA-free nylon by BAYER company which reliably and safely stores the toothpaste inside. Microbiological tests proved that. For the bristles, we use high-grade DUPONT nylon. To sterilize toothbrushes from bacteria we chose the most efficient UV-C LEDs. All this is to make the perfect durable and long-lasting product that brings comfort to our consumers.

I am excited that you liked our product!  
 

Cheers,
Kirill & Nest Brush Team

This project is boosted by BackerCrew

story:
Electrical Muscle Stimulator (EMS) is a wearable gear that attaches to your body via electrodes and stimulates your muscles with a small amount of electrical current. The technology was originally invented for NASA astronauts to be used to help preserve their muscle tone and strength while in outer space. Since 1990, the EMS technology has been applied in the exercise industry and has become a new trend for professional athletes to boost workout performances.
 

Real EMS Champion+ is the most powerful and complete home EMS device for core muscles. Champion+ features a unique technology that can send four different channels of electronic current (ranging from 20hz to 80hz) to the major parts of the front and back core muscles, helping optimize your exercise whether you’re seeking core muscle building, abs toning, workout performance-boosting, or weight loss. In addition, Special semi-permanent/sustainable pads made of 99.9% antibacterial silver yarn eliminates the need for things like gel sheets replacement.

 

 



Real EMS Champion+ ‘s output voltage is 50V which is extremely stronger than any other home EMS product out there. With the extremely powerful output, Champion+ assists core muscle building, boosting athletic performance, abs toning, and fat loss by providing intense and higher quality muscle stimulations on abs and back.

 


In case you didn't believe us, here are some reactions demonstrating the REAL EMS at Full Power

You are in control of the stimulation intensity with 12 power levels. Simply press the “UP” button to increase intensity. You will be surprised how powerfully Champion+ will stimulate your abs and core muscles when you reach max level!



Champion+ has four different modes/channels that generate different frequencies ranging from 20hz to 80hz. Each mode/channel assists your EMS training depending on your goal, be it building muscle, toning your body, calorie-burning, or relaxing your muscles.





Real EMS Champion  can significantly increase core strength, endurance, and functions which is extremely important in any athletic workout performance. Training with the Real EMS Champion+ for 20 minutes will achieve the same outcome as training through a traditional workout for 1 to 2 hours.







Real EMS Champion+ sends the electrical impulses that are transmitted to the abdominal muscles (Rectus Abdominis, Internal Obliques, External Obliques, and Transversus Abdominis) and back, causing strong muscle contractions in core muscles.





No more gel pads! And more importantly, no more wasting your money on gel pads like traditional EMS devices. Real EMS Champion+ does not require sticky gel pads. Just a little bit of water will do its job and conduct the electronic frequencies generated from the device to the pads. You don’t have to worry about the cost of replacing the gel pads, or the power of the stimulation that varies by the adhesiveness of the gel pads anymore. In addition, they are portable and washable as well.




Real EMS Champion+ pads are semi-permanent and made of special silver yarn. Our sustainable and semi-permanent pads are hygienic and 99.9% antibacterial which prevents skin problems caused by contamination that can happen with gel pad products.






Built-in band with two Iron core pins on the back which perfectly holds and supports your back and waist prevents injuries and allows you to move around dynamically during the session without it slipping or falling off from the waist.


Real EMS Champion+
Delivers outstanding performances in the most cost-efficient way possible.



 




 

 










SHIPPING DETAILS

 

*Notice: VAT and GST are not included in the price listed and will be determined by country on delivery. Backers are responsible for these costs (VAT, GST, duties, taxes, etc.) on delivery.

 


 


READY TO SHIP!

Give Us a Follow!






 

 

 

Challenge and Risks

We promise that we will deliver the product as soon as possible. However, global shipping conditions are constantly changing day by day due to the pandemic. This means there might be a delay in delivery depending on your location and any possible local delivery delays. We will constantly update you about this, and if we can’t deliver the product for whatever reason, we will definitely refund your money back.

And more importantly, no more wasting your money on gel pads like traditional EMS devices. Real EMS Champion+ does not require sticky gel pads. Just a little bit of water will do its job and conduct the electronic frequencies generated from the device to the pads. You don’t have to worry about the cost of replacing the gel pads, or the power of the stimulation that varies by the adhesiveness of the gel pads anymore. In addition, they are portable and washable as well.Real EMS Champion+ pads are semi-permanent and made of special silver yarn. Our sustainable and semi-permanent pads are hygienic and 99.9% antibacterial which prevents skin problems caused by contamination that can happen with gel pad products.Built-in band with two Iron core pins on the back which perfectly holds and supports your back and waist prevents injuries and allows you to move around dynamically during the session without it slipping or falling off from the waist.
Real EMS Champion+Delivers outstanding performances in the most cost-efficient way possible.
 

 
 
SHIPPING DETAILS
 *Notice: VAT and GST are not included in the price listed and will be determined by country on delivery. Backers are responsible for these costs (VAT, GST, duties, taxes, etc.) on delivery. 

 
READY TO SHIP!Give Us a Follow!
   Challenge and RisksWe promise that we will deliver the product as soon as possible. However, global shipping conditions are constantly changing day by day due to the pandemic. This means there might be a delay in delivery depending on your location and any possible local delivery delays. We will constantly update you about this, and if we can’t deliver the product for whatever reason, we will definitely refund your money back.

story:
The human back is a design disaster in which it was definitely not built for the modern lifestyle. Nowadays, most of us work every day in an office that sits on uncomfortable office chairs for at least 8 hours. 

Furthermore, the chairs are not conducive to our productivity or back muscles, and it is not surprising that an office chair without sufficient support can cause great stress to the lower back.

Statistics show that a sitting position without lumbar support increases IVD (Intervertebral Disc) pressure by almost 50% compared to sitting with lumbar support. If you have back pain and are unable to concentrate, this can have a negative impact on the quality of your work. Furthermore, sitting for long periods in an ordinary office chair leads to back pain - A serious problem affecting people's performance and personal life.

Back pain is common among adults and fortunately, the use of ergonomic office chairs can prevent these problems. Not only is the ergonomic chair a great investment during this renewed period of interest in remote work, but it can also alleviate back pain to ensure a better working experience.

                     

Meet NEWTRAL, the world's FIRST ergonomic chair that offers lower back support for all sitting positions. Whether you want to sit causally, work, or relax, this innovative chair can tackle it all with our special design. NEWTRAL is a feature-rich chair that has been manufactured with the highest craftsmanship and meets all your needs.

Poor posture? No problem! With the adaptive lower back support, NEWTRAL keeps you sitting up straight while working or relaxing to reduce pressure and back pain from sitting for a long period of time. Adjust the sitting position with 5 locking positions and experience a new way of sitting like you never had before.

Did you know that simple tasks such as looking up at your computer monitor can cause muscle pain or headaches when you work in this position for a prolonged time? This can be quickly resolved with the dynamic fully adjustable headrest, which can be adjusted from the top and bottom at any angle and helps to reduce the strain on the neck and shoulders when you lean back in the chair.

Equipped with 6-way adjustable armrests, you can adjust them to your preferred height and angle. Armrests protect your shoulders and back from undue strain. They also prevent elbow drooping to reduce fatigue on elbows, arms, shoulders, and spine.

The advanced 4D mesh provides excellent ventilation so you can make the most of your relaxation. In humid regions such as the coastal area, the responsive webbing is denser, with just the right flexibility to support the unique shape of your back. NEWTRAL ergonomic chair allows air to flow in and keep you cool and dry, even in warm climates. 

Designed for maximum comfort, the footrest extension provides the perfect angle to rest during breaks. By reducing pressure on your legs, a footrest can prevent blood clots associated with deep vein thrombosis, relieve pressure on your lower back, reduce swelling and prevent varicose veins.

Why put your health at risk every day when NEWTRAL can prevent back pain? The average office worker or student can sit at their desk for up to 8 hours a day. Sitting puts a lot of strain on the body and can lead to many serious health complications, including heart disease and diabetes. 

NEWTRAL ergonomic chairs are designed to allow you to sit comfortably for a long time at work. Our goal is to develop a product that increases your productivity and job satisfaction but also reduces the risk of musculoskeletal injuries such as back pain.

 

 
 

The NEWTRAL Ergonomic Chair is already in production, so you don't have to worry about those long crowdfunding waits. Our priority is to meet our commitments to you and provide our backers with the highest level of value, premium quality, and service.

NEWTRAL is an ergonomically oriented product company dedicated to improving people's health, comfort, and productivity through innovative product design. NEWTRAL ergonomic chair uses ergonomic design to bring wellness to the workplace and home office. With several planned innovations, NEWTRAL aims to develop more products that promote a healthier lifestyle and physical, mental, and emotional well-being.

story:
What is VX Pet Magic?

VX Pet Magic is a therapeutic PEMF device that drastically reduces health problems and helps in the treatment and rehabilitation of your pet.



 

What do professionals (vets) say
about VX Pet Magic?

 

- Dr. Amy Hanson, an associate veterinarian at Potwin Pet Clinic, Topeka, Kansas


- Lisa Gilmartin, VX Pet Magic early backer
 


- DeAnne Racz, Certified Veterinary Technician
 

- Dr. Neil N Floyd, VX Pet Magic early backer 

 

— Elena Busharova,  the chief veterinarian in TechnoMed veterinary clinic, Saint-Petersburg, Russia.

 I love the machine for my own old cat with multifocal arthritis. He asks for his treatment daily. I think this machine is great for all cats where we have few other long term anti-inflammatory options. Every owner of an older cat should have one!

— Tanya Cruz, DVM, is an emergency veterinarian at Veterinary Medical And Surgical Group–OC (VMSG-OC) in Orange County.


Breakthrough
in Pain Relief for Your Pet

Safe and drug-free relief for chronic pain, inflammation, and injury using a non-surgical and non-invasive next generation PEMF technology


 

 

Why does your pet need
VX Pet Magic?

Our pets are suffering from many ailments and pains just like us and they need our help!

VX Pet Magic helps with:

Other problems we face as pet owners:

What are the benefits of
VX Pet Magic?

Here are some of the features:

Direct treatment
Calming
Non invasive
Super safe
Easy to use
Compact & portable
 

How does VX Pet Magic work?

Just like PEMF, VX Pet Magic generates an electromagnetic field that has a regenerative effect on the cells of your pet’s body.

These are some of the advantages of the VX Pet Magic when applied to your pet:

Increases blood flow and circulation at the site of application
Accelerates cellular metabolism and growth of healthy cells
Reduces inflammation and boosts pet’s immune system
 

Why is VX Pet Magic better?

The most advanced PEMF technology!

Patented technology, inspired by
a 125-year-old Nikola Tesla invention!

 

Electromagnetic field increases the permeability of cell membranes, normalizes the energy state of the affected cells, accelerates cellular metabolism and accelerates the growth and division of healthy cells.

Has VX Pet Magic been validated?

Yes - with years of research behind it!

VX technology was originally designed as a portable PEMF device for professional athletes to help accelerate healing and reduce inflammation.

For close to three (3) years it was tested on human ailments and injuries, eventually leading to successful trials on pets.

We studied stem cell reparation and healing time of a wound on a dog and found up to 3X faster results with our targeted and focused approach! The left side is "untreated" and the right side is "treated with VX Pet Magic"

Experiment shows how fast the "scratch/wound" heals through the regeneration of new cells. Control cells are not exposed to anything.

Effectiveness studies of VRTX Technologies (VX Pet Magic) device by example of scratch on a fetal calf blood serum HyClone.

The studies show an increase in cell proliferation by 270% and increase in the degree of wound healing by more than 42%. Greater efficiency in wound healing was achieved 24 hours after the start of exposure and was more than two and a half times higher than the control cells.

VX Pet Magic Impact on a Wound
After 24 Hours of Treatment

Size of wound

In general, this indicates an increased oxygen availability and acceleration of metabolic processes in cells. This result turned out to be better (1.5x) than results of using one of the most popular pharmaceutical products, Actovegin.

% of wound healed in 24 hours

Conclusion

Based on the results from the pharmaceutical product and VX Pet Magic electromagnetic device, it was concluded that the use of this VRTX Technologies device is acceptable for relief of pain from various etiologies, inflammations, tumors and stimulation of wound healing, as well as provide relief from nervous disorders, depressive conditions and restore cognitive functions.

Arthritis and Arthrosis

A study of the use of this VRTX Technologies device for relieving pain in shoulder and/or knee arthritis, inflammation caused by sprains, bruises and injuries, post-operative inflammation was carried out in 100 patients of different ages (from 6 to 62 years). The working parameters of VX Pet Magic were as follows: duration of session was 2 times per day for 15 minutes for 3-7 days.

Results of the study from using VRTX Technologies are shown in the table below:

Conclusion

It has been shown that the use of VRTX Technologies (VX Pet Magic) device during several days (depending on the duration and degree of disease, age of patient, etc.) relieves chronic pain in all recorded cases without the use of pharmacological products, significantly accelerates healing of bruises and wounds, and also helps to reduce inflammation.

Design and Development of
VX Pet Magic

Our goal was to develop the safest natural healing aid. After years of technical development, research and testing, and dozens of sample iterations we achieved our goal – the VX Pet Magic!

How does VX Pet Magic compare?

Is there anything similar?

What do pet owners say
about VX Pet Magic?

A few months ago, my dog underwent a series of operations for a compound pelvic fracture. After prolonged immobilization, atrophy of the muscles of the hind legs developed, and my dog couldn’t walk. We were advised to use VX Pet Magic. This device really helped us. The procedures were performed twice a day for 15 minute,s for 30 days. The muscle movement was eventually restored and the hind legs became active again. Currently, there is only a slight limp, but for the most part our dog has returned to normal. Our dog is cheerful and vivacious again. We’re very pleased with the result. Thank you very much!

Last year our cat was diagnosed with a dislocated shoulder. She was in constant pain and limped. Drugs and shots didn't seem to have any real effect, only side effects. Finally we were asked to try VX Pet Magic and that helped! Simple to use and easy to apply painlessly - 30 minutes once a day for 14 days. My cat started feeling better after 7 days and was back to normal within two weeks. The limp is completely gone. And judging by her purring I can say the pain has disappeared too. We are very grateful to you for your help!

Unfortunately at the age of 11, our dog began suffering from a gallbladder inflammation. He started vomiting, had constant diarrhea, and had areas of grave sensitivity when touched (he would snap at us!). A strict diet was suggested, and the VX Pet Magic was immediately administered to the sensitive area. We applied it twice a day for 15 minutes, for 14 days. On the 4th day vomiting and diarrhea stopped. After 14 days the sensitivity and inflammation of the gallbladder was gone. Our dog’s condition was completely normalized without using surgical or invasive measures! Your device is amazing!

After surgery, our 9-year-old dog suffered a gastrostomy tube rejection - which meant he couldn't eat! It was terrible. My daughter was afraid that our dog would die. So the vet advised us to try the VX Pet Magic. We started applying the device 2 times a day for 15 minutes for 14 days. We noticed immediately that the feeding tube was being accepted, and our dog was on his way to recovery! Wow - we were happy. Thank you so much for this amazing device that saved our dog’s life!

My cat is already 22 years old. That is pretty old for a cat. She was doing well until a few months ago when I began to notice that she became irritated after eating and started to produce a weird odor. We went to the vet for some testing. Results showed increased levels in creatinine, amylase, and specific pancreatic lipase of cats. She was diagnosed with chronic pancreatitis and renal failure. We tried all the drugs - which she did not like and made her very lethargic. She was not herself and we thought she would die. During one vet visit we were given the option to try the VX Pet Magic. IT IS MAGIC! We stopped the drugs and switched to using VX Pet Magic immediately. We applied this device for 15 minutes 2 times a day for 16 days. As a result of consistent treatments for 2 weeks her biochemical parameters (creatinine, amylase, and specific pancreatic lipase of cats) became normal and her appetite returned! I am happy and grateful for this truly magical device!

Our cat experienced frequent seizures, ataxia, and an decreased appetite. Laboratory tests showed a tumor and sharp decrease in blood glucose. The veterinarian proposed surgery to remove the tumor. Our only other option was a trial of the VX Pet Magic before surgery. We decided to use the device for 15 minutes 2 times a day for 3 weeks. After 2 weeks we started seeing results with less frequent seizures. After 3 weeks lab test results showed normalized glucose levels and there were no more seizures. We avoided surgery!! We LOVE the VX Pet Magic!

How to use VX Pet Magic?

It’s as simple as one-two-three!

Can I try VX Pet Magic?

Yes! We are expecting to send pre-production devices to at least 20 locations in the next 30 days across the US where you can try the VX Pet Magic. Below are the initial recipients and professional partners who have our device already. If you have recommendations for Vets or breeders, we want to hear from you!

What does VX Pet Magic cost?


 

What's included with
VX Pet Magic?

(1) VX Pet Magic Device, (1) Travel Bag, (1) USB-C Charging Cable, (1) Real Time Magnetic Field Indicator

Dimensions / Size:

And traveling with VX Pet Magic is easy!

How do you know if the device is working?

After starting the device, just hold the "real time" magnetic field indicator directly above the disk. The indicator should "glow" when working properly! It's magic!

How long have we been working on VX Pet Magic?

Our journey

story:
According to statistics, the average time we spend on our phones is about 3 hours a day, not including work and studying.  

Too much screen time can result in digital eye strain, which can include burning, itchiness, headaches, fatigue, blurred or double vision, loss of focus, listlessness, and neck pain. Day after day, we keep adding to the burden on our eyes but never let our eyes fully rest.  

Ditch those eye drops and cheap eye-relief technology. This year, treat yourself to EyeDear - the effective eye care solution. EyeDear can relieve your eyes to the greatest extent, allowing you to easily eliminate fatigue and dark circles. The unique anti-blocking design allows you to work and rest simultaneously. 

EyeDear can relieve your eyes by eliminating fatigue and dark circles. The unique design won’t obscure your sight which allows you to work and rest simultaneously.

 

The EyeDear is only 45g, Put it on when you're at work, at home, or even outside, and enjoy comfortable eye care. It will not completely cover your eyes during use. 

You can enjoy an eye massage at any time during work or entertainment. Relax anywhere. Such as： 

 Exercising 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Reading

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Working

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Relaxing

The EyeDear resolves eye issues through 3 methods.

EMS is a full-scale contraction exercise of the eye; promoting blood circulation, repairing eye wrinkles, and preventing eye muscle aging 

 

The red light of EyeDear can penetrate the skin, activate cells, increase the natural production of supplemented collagen, and make the skin appear younger and healthier.

  • Removes blemishes and brightens skin around the eyes
  • Enhances skin collagen activity
  • Simple and easy, 10-minute sessions

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Working long hours or staying up late can make your eyes dry, sore, and red. Our hot compression is the ideal solution for those late nights.
  • Unlike a hot towel, the EyeDear can easily maintain a constant temperature and heating function. Turn on the hot compress function of the EyeDear with just the press of a button. Relieve eye discomfort with ease.

  • EyeDear only needs 40-60 seconds to heat up to a comfortable temperature of 104-105°F (40°C-42°C).
  • *The heating function can only be turned on or off when the EMS (power supply) is turned on, and it will turn off when the EMS (power supply) is turned off.

The EyeDear has five levels of EMS intensity to choose from. You can choose different levels according to the massage intensity you need.

After 60 days of constant use, the eye elasticity and compactness of the skin will be noticeable.  The appearance of aging around the eyes is significantly reduced.

EyeDear has passed strict safety certification, you can use EyeDear with peace of mind.

 

Select the eye massage mode you need using the buttons on the left and right sides of the EyeDear. The buttons on either side do not interfere with each other, and the heating function does not interfere with the red light rejuvenation and EMS functions.

 

The inner side of the EyeDear is made of aluminum alloy, which can quickly generate the most suitable temperature for you, plus a design that fits the contours of your eyes.

The EyeDear is ergonomically designed,  the elastic on both sides adjust to various sizes and face shapes.

During use, the EyeDear does not make any noise, allowing you to enjoy the eye massage quietly. It can also be used continuously for 72 hours. This means that on a full charge, the EyeDear can be used 216 times for an average of 20 minutes a day!

Our company provides the highest quality lifestyle and health products. We use the best in technology and design to improve the user experience for our clients. We’re hands-on, communicative, and provide unmatched customer support. Contact us anytime.
story_txt:
According to statistics, the average time we spend on our phones is about 3 hours a day, not including work and studying.  Too much screen time can result in digital eye strain, which can include burning, itchiness, headaches, fatigue, blurred or double vision, loss of focus, listlessness, and neck pain. Day after day, we keep adding to the burden on our eyes but never let our eyes fully rest.  Ditch those eye drops and cheap eye-relief technology. This year, treat yourself to EyeDear - the effective eye care solution. EyeDear can relieve your eyes to the greatest extent, allowing you to easily eliminate fatigue and dark circles. The unique anti-blocking design allows you to work and rest simultaneously. EyeDear can relieve your eyes by eliminating fatigue and dark circles. The unique design won’t obscure your sight which allows you to work and rest simultaneously. The EyeDear is only 45g, Put it on when you're at work, at home, or even outside, and enjoy comfortable eye care. It will not completely cover your eyes during use. You can enjoy an eye massage at any time during work or entertainment. Relax anywhere. Such as：  Exercising           Reading          Working          RelaxingThe EyeDear resolves eye issues through 3 methods.EMS is a full-scale contraction exercise of the eye; promoting blood circulation, repairing eye wrinkles, and preventing eye muscle aging  The red light of EyeDear can penetrate the skin, activate cells, increase the natural production of supplemented collagen, and make the skin appear younger and healthier.
Removes blemishes and brightens skin around the eyes
Enhances skin collagen activity
Simple and easy, 10-minute sessions
        
Working long hours or staying up late can make your eyes dry, sore, and red. Our hot compression is the ideal solution for those late nights.
Unlike a hot towel, the EyeDear can easily maintain a constant temperature and heating function. Turn on the hot compress function of the EyeDear with just the press of a button. Relieve eye discomfort with ease.

EyeDear only needs 40-60 seconds to heat up to a comfortable temperature of 104-105°F (40°C-42°C).
*The heating function can only be turned on or off when the EMS (power supply) is turned on, and it will turn off when the EMS (power supply) is turned off.
The EyeDear has five levels of EMS intensity to choose from. You can choose different levels according to the massage intensity you need.After 60 days of constant use, the eye elasticity and compactness of the skin will be noticeable.  The appearance of aging around the eyes is significantly reduced.EyeDear has passed strict safety certification, you can use EyeDear with peace of mind. Select the eye massage mode you need using the buttons on the left and right sides of the EyeDear. The buttons on either side do not interfere with each other, and the heating function does not interfere with the red light rejuvenation and EMS functions. The inner side of the EyeDear is made of aluminum alloy, which can quickly generate the most suitable temperature for you, plus a design that fits the contours of your eyes.The EyeDear is ergonomically designed,  the elastic on both sides adjust to various sizes and face shapes.During use, the EyeDear does not make any noise, allowing you to enjoy the eye massage quietly. It can also be used continuously for 72 hours. This means that on a full charge, the EyeDear can be used 216 times for an average of 20 minutes a day!Our company provides the highest quality lifestyle and health products. We use the best in technology and design to improve the user experience for our clients. We’re hands-on, communicative, and provide unmatched customer support. Contact us anytime.

story:
“Headphones for those who care about life safety, health, and style”

 

 
These are headphones with bone conduction technology, sound is transmitted by vibrating the temporal bone of the human skull, leaving the outer ear canal open. Sound through vibrations is directly transmitted to the inner ear through the bone.

It is not necessary to take it off during communication.

This is a process that laboratory testing has proven to be safe, the headphones themselves playing the role of your eardrums – so that you can protect and preserve your ears for the rest of your life.

 

  • Safety.
  • Small size and great possibilities.
  • The high-quality stable sound inside you. New sensations.
  • Use instead of a headset.
  • Wireless charging of the case and USB type-c.
  • IPX7 protection against sweat and water.
  • The outer microphone is covered with a mesh, which makes the conversation sound clear even in strong winds.
  • Possibility to use the headphones separately.
  • Universal size     
     

Listening to music, talking on the phone always feel safe. Do not isolate yourself from what is happening around you, leaving you with the possibility to react in time to the signal of a car, and the sound of others.

Magnet + Special sticker

Each headphone has a strong built-in Neodymium magnet. Another magnet is attached to the human body near the ear using a special patch. In the desired location of the headphones.

Patch ( one-off, replaceable, disposable material, complete set with headphones 365 pairs, which provides a one-year supply. If necessary, a new annual set can be purchased separately).

Magnet (reusable component, 3 pairs in the complete set).

Mechanical fixation

With a specially designed clasp, the earpiece can be attached to a helmet, baseball cap, glasses and sports bandage.

This solution will help you comfortably use the headphones while playing sports, without worrying about getting lost on the way.

This is a reliable mount, from which it can be easily fixed and will suit a wide number of buyers.

Permanent glue

Transparent permanent tack adhesive (PSA) based on synthetic rubber.

This glue is used in medicine and is absolutely safe for the skin. It securely fixes the earpiece, thereby making it possible to use the Bone Conduction technology to the maximum advantage.

At this stage, we are still testing this method of fastening, but the results are positive and our testers give positive feedback on the convenience of this solution.

Alternative arc fixation 

At the request of our backers.

Package

 

We are in the process of creating a smart assistant, for two Android and iOS platforms. In our application, many additional features have been implemented for the comfortable use of our headphones. Also, the smart assistant trained with the help of AI.

 
 

 Apps. functions

  • Private Office.
  • Device Connection.
  • Indication of connection and charge of the case and headphones.
  • Buttons for setting up and controlling the assistant, phone calls, location and device search, sound.
  • Other.

  • How do you listen to your music?
  • Do you take your headphones for a run and explore the local neighborhood?
  • Do you lounge around in the yard and breathe in the fresh air?
  • Do you stay inside and crash on your couch?
  • Do you want to listen to podcasts but still hear what your children are doing?
  • Do you want not to take off your headphones in the office each time someone is talking to you?

Your options are without end, of course, and however you choose to listen to your music, we want you to do so in style. We have selected a sleek overlay for our bone conduction headphones, and the magnetic mount is a perfect match – in convenience and in appearance. These are your headphones, and you are in charge. Discover your ultimate style through Ludbeat.

This is the power of incredible sound, the sort of sound that pulses inside you.

Wearing regular headphones behind the wheel poses a risk to drivers, occupants, and other road users by serving as a potential distraction.

Unhygienic use

It all started 1 year ago. We've got a vision and understanding that modern technologies are taking our breath away and that we are divided from our better life just by our fantasy.

Our aim is to make living with smart technologies a lifestyle. Our team of engineers, designers, and marketers worked tirelessly, through trial and error, prototypes and tests, and dreams about pure sound to create those headphones.  We believe that comfort and safety for people are key and we can make our impact on it. So that's why we’ve created headphones with alternative technology for passing the sound.

story:
Our Story.

The Manuva Board is a first of its kind, fixture free hangboard that makes training for rock climbing easier than ever before. 

 

 

Easy Installation.

The Manuva Board’s patent pending design is quick and easy to install and just as simple to take down, requiring no drilling, screwing or permanent fixturing

 

 

 

Adjustable fit.

Designed to be fully adjustable, the Manuva Board can fit a wide range of door widths. Set it to your desired width using the quick release clamp and tighten the screw at the rear to lock in place.

*Please check that your door width is within this range and that you have secure architrave on the front and back of the frame before ordering yours.

 

 

 

Functional.

A range of holds from 15mm through to 60mm, plus two 20° slopers up top, allow for incremental progression in your training.

 

 

 

 

 

Flexible.

The anodized aluminium frame can be separated from the board for travel and/or storage, as well as allowing for the board to be used on its own. Simply rope it up, hang it up and warm up before a day at the crag.

 

 

 

Design & Development.

Manuva has partnered with our co founders, WMP Creative, a leading international design firm with over 35 years of experience, to deliver a product that is simply designed, reliable, durable and most impotantly a product that we love using.

 

 

 

Thoughtfully Designed.

Made from Poplar wood, the Manuva Board is lightweight and strong, as well as having a consistent grain throughout, allowing for a hand sanded finish that delivers a natural feel whilst also being gentle on your skin. 

 

 

 

Sustainability.

We have conciously chosen materials for their sustainable qualities as well as their design strengths.  

The board has been made from Poplar wood, an incredibly fast growing tree that requires significantly less water than other growths. As with all fast-growing species, poplar trees have the ability to clean the air, removing between 70 and 140 litres of carbon dioxide per hour from the atmosphere and returning the equivalent amount of oxygen. Poplar sequesters carbon dioxide (carbon sink) even after its wood has been transformed into a finished product.  

The frame is made from aluminium, one of the most environmentally friendly metals in production. Did you know that aluminium is 100% recyclable and that 75% of the 1 billion tons of aluminium produced in the last 100 years is still in use today? So, after what we hope will be a long life span, the Manuva Board’s frame can eventually be disassembled and recycled.

 

Returns Policy.

While we are confident you will love your Manuva Board, we do not offer refunds, returns, or exchanges on items received as Indiegogo rewards.  The amazing support we get from our Indiegogo backers is what will allow us to develop our business, gather key customer feedback, design new products and improve on existing ones. In the Indiegogo community, the items that you receive after making a pledge are referred to as “rewards” and are not purchases in the traditional sense. The easiest way to imagine this is to think of the rewards as gifts—in our case, a Hangboard— sent to our supporters as a sign of our appreciation for supporting of our business.   We appreciate your understanding of our policy and the support you have given us. If your reward truly offers no value to you, here are a few things that you could do in the spirit of crowdfunding…   1. Give your reward to a friend. Our products might not work for you, but there are many folks out there who might find them very valuable. We’d love for you to share our gear with a friend of yours who is into climbing.  2. Sell your reward to somebody. Many Indiegogo rewards were purchased below the retail value – if you want to recuperate that value and possibly even more, you could list your product for sale.   3. Give your reward another chance. Maybe it doesn’t work for you right now, but perhaps you’ll find the right time and place in the future.   Thanks for your support and understanding.

story:
Check out our new website and order your DorsiFLEX HERE! 

 

Get ready for deeper, personalized, and more versatile foot stretches with DorsiFLEX.

This patented device allows for a variable and adjustable positioning of your foot to achieve a deeper and more effective stretch of all lower leg and foot muscles contributing to plantar fasciitis, Achilles tendonitis, and other lower leg injuries.

 

You can perform a variety of simultaneous, highly effective stretches with DorsiFLEX. The indexed design of DorsiFLEX also allows for accurate measurement and tracking of progressive improvement in your foot and ankle range of motion.

Adjust DorsiFLEX to meet your personal needs. There are two adjustable arms for you to selectively position depending on the foot you want to stretch, or the angle(s) you want to achieve while stretching. The greater the angle the deeper the stretch! 

DorsiFLEX is fabricated with 20 adjustable “fingers” that allow you to create a flat, upward incline or a 3-dimensional lateral incline.

Simply position your toes and forefoot laterally with our adjustable angles to achieve a novel 3-D stretch. The fingers have a rounded and smooth top surface for comfort and won’t bend under load. The fingers live on a twist axis that promises to give you repeatable and measurable angles every time you use DorsiFLEX. As an option, the sturdy base can be inclined an additional 10° with the incline legs.

DorsiFLEX’s patented design allows for specific targeting of the individual bands of the plantar fascia. Our design also utilizes the Windlass mechanism of biomechanics to properly position your foot for the best and most effective stretches and strengthening.

The patented variable and adjustable design deliver 3-dimensional weight-bearing exercises to stretch and strengthen the muscles in your lower leg and foot. DorsiFLEX's US Patent Number is #9,364,382.

DorsiFLEX features a sturdy base to provide you with stability and ease of use.  Made of FDA Grade material and designed for greater than 350 pounds of weight, the DorsiFLEX is light enough to carry anywhere.

A non-slip ring on the bottom grips any surface while the base provides a comfortable and padded surface for a socked foot or barefoot. 

 

PERKS GRAPHIC

 

Phoenix Foot Health, LLC is composed of two friends, both avid runners, who suffered from the same painful problem: plantar fasciitis. Not only was it ruining their quality of life, but it was also preventing them from doing what they love. After years of standing on tennis balls, rolling on frozen water bottles, and trying every foot and toe stretch under the sun, they knew they needed to create a better solution.

They wanted to create a product that would improve stretching to better target the muscles that were causing foot and heel pain. DorsiFLEX was born as a simple-to-use and incredibly effective solution. Phoenix Foot Health, LLC’s mission is to help other plantar fasciitis, and Achilles tendonitis sufferers with a product and method that works quickly, and easily.

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make DorsiFLEX a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a DorsiFLEX, if you’re a supporter of DorsiFLEX, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

 

 

 

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.
